SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_84 LANGUAGE: csv CODE: ``` name,uid,code,shortname,description "Women participated skill development training",,"D0001","Women participated in training" "Women participated community organizations",,"D0002","Women participated in organizations" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using the hasValue Function in a Program Indicator Filter DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use the d2:hasValue function in a program indicator filter to check if a data element or attribute has a value, which can help distinguish between zero values and missing values. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: expression CODE: ``` d2:hasValue(#{mCXR7u4kNBW.NFkjsNiQ9PH}) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Data Approval Audits by Organization Unit and Date Range DESCRIPTION: Example API request for retrieving data approval audits for a specific organization unit within a date range. Shows how to combine temporal and organizational filters. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/audit.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/33/audits/dataApproval?ou=DiszpKrYNg8&startDate=2021-01-01&endDate=2022-01-01 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Response Format for Event Clustering Analytics in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response from the /analytics/events/cluster endpoint. It includes headers describing the cluster properties and rows of clustered event data with count, center point, and extent. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_33 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "headers": [ { "name": "count", "column": "Count", "type": "java.lang.Long", "meta": false }, { "name": "center", "column": "Center", "type": "java.lang.String", "meta": false }, { "name": "extent", "column": "Extent", "type": "java.lang.String", "meta": false }, { "name": "points", "column": "Points", "type": "java.lang.String", "meta": false } ], "width": 3, "height": 4, "rows": [ [ "3", "POINT(-13.15818 8.47567)", "BOX(-13.26821 8.4St7215,-13.08711 8.47807)", "" ], [ "9", "POINT(-13.11184 8.66424)", "BOX(-13.24982 8.51961,-13.05816 8.87696)", "" ], [ "1", "POINT(-12.46144 7.50597)", "BOX(-12.46144 7.50597,-12.46144 7.50597)", "" ], [ "7", "POINT(-12.47964 8.21533)", "BOX(-12.91769 7.66775,-12.21011 8.49713)", "" ] ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Events for Specific Tracked Entity in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Example request to fetch events for a specific program, organization unit, and tracked entity using the DHIS2 tracker API. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_39 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/tracker/events?orgUnit=DiszpKrYNg8&program=M3xtLkYBlKI&trackedEntity=dNpxRu1mWG5 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Exporting ADX Data with cURL from DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Command to GET ADX data from the DHIS2 server using cURL. This example demonstrates how to retrieve ADX-formatted data from the demo server for a specific organization unit, dataset, and period. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_31 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -u admin:district -H "Accept: application/adx+xml" "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/dataValueSets?dataValueSets?orgUnit=M_CLINIC&dataSet=MALARIA&period=201501" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Data Approval Status in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to query the data approval status using the DHIS2 API. It shows the structure of the JSON response, including approval permissions, state, and approval details. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-approval.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "mayApprove": false, "mayUnapprove": false, "mayAccept": false, "mayUnaccept": false, "state": "APPROVED_HERE", "approvedBy": "User A", "approvedAt": "2022-01-13T12:56:07.005", "acceptedBy": "User A", "acceptedAt": "2022-01-13T12:56:07.005" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Current Metadata Version in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This endpoint retrieves the current metadata version of the DHIS2 system. It returns details like version name, creation date, type, and hash code. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_96 LANGUAGE: plain CODE: ``` /api/metadata/version ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "Version_4", "created": "2016-06-30T06:01:28.684+0000", "lastUpdated": "2016-06-30T06:01:28.685+0000", "externalAccess": false, "displayName": "Version_4", "type": "BEST_EFFORT", "hashCode": "848bf6edbaf4faeb7d1a1169445357b0", "id": "Ayz2AEMB6ry" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Single Tracked Entity in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Example of a GET request to the DHIS2 Tracker API for retrieving a single tracked entity by its UID. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_29 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/tracker/trackedEntities/PQfMcpmXeFE ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: User Login Request in DHIS2 API (JSON) DESCRIPTION: Example of a POST request to log in a user and obtain a session cookie. Requires username, password, and optional two-factor code. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_18 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "username": "username", "password": "password", "twoFactorCode": "two_factor_code" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing ADX Data with cURL in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Command to POST ADX data to the DHIS2 server using cURL. This example demonstrates how to import ADX-formatted data to the demo server with code as the identifier scheme for data elements and organization units. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_30 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -u admin:district -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/adx+xml" -d @data.xml "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/dataValueSets?dataElementIdScheme=code&orgUnitIdScheme=code" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Events with Organization Unit Children in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Example request to fetch events for children of a specific organization unit using the DHIS2 tracker API. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_34 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/tracker/events?orgUnit=YuQRtpLP10I&orgUnitMode=CHILDREN ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Manual Merge Payload for Potential Duplicates in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: JSON payload for a manual merge operation on potential duplicates. Specifies which data elements to move from the duplicate to the original tracked entity, including tracked entity attributes, enrollments, and relationships. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_56 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "trackedEntityAttributes": ["B58KFJ45L9D"], "enrollments": ["F61SJ2DhINO"], "relationships": ["ETkkZVSNSVw"] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running All Predictors in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: HTTP POST request endpoint for running all predictors to generate predicted values. This action applies all configured predictor rules and generates the resulting data values. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_78 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` POST /api/predictors/run ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating/Updating Translations Request DESCRIPTION: Example request payload for creating or updating translations of a DataElement using the translations endpoint. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/i18n.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "translations": [ { "property": "SHORT_NAME", "locale": "en_GB", "value": "ANC 1st visit" }, { "property": "NAME", "locale": "fr", "value": "Soin prénatal 1" }, { "property": "DESCRIPTION", "locale": "fr", "value": "description in french" }, { "property": "FORM_NAME", "locale": "fr", "value": "name in french" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example of Program Copy Request in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example of copying a program with a specific UID, which will create a new program with default prefix 'Copy of'. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_115 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` POST /api/programs/Program123a/copy ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Tomcat Connector for SSL in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: XML configuration snippet for Tomcat's server.xml file to properly handle HTTPS behind an SSL-enabled NGINX proxy. These parameters ensure that Tomcat generates correct HTTPS URLs in response headers. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_45 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Deploying DHIS2 WAR File to Tomcat DESCRIPTION: Move the downloaded DHIS2 WAR file to Tomcat's webapps directory and rename it to ROOT.war. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_23 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo mv dhis.war /home/dhis/tomcat-dhis/webapps/ROOT.war ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Organisation Unit Levels with POST Request in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example JSON payload for setting organisation unit levels via a POST request. The payload defines multiple organisation unit levels with properties including name, level number, and optional offline levels. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_74 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "organisationUnitLevels": [{ "name": "National", "level": 1, "offlineLevels": 3 }, { "name": "District", "level": 2 }, { "name": "Chiefdom", "level": 3 }, { "name": "Facility", "level": 4 }] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Analytics API with Dimensions and Filters DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use dimension and filter parameters in the DHIS2 Analytics API to retrieve specific data elements filtered by periods and organisation units. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: url CODE: ``` /api/analytics?dimension=dx:fbfJHSPpUQD;cYeuwXTCPkU&filter=pe:2014Q1;2014Q2&filter=ou:O6uvpzGd5pu;lc3eMKXaEfw ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Predictor Creation Payload Example in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example JSON payload for creating a malaria outbreak threshold predictor. The payload includes the output data element ID, generator expression, period type, sample counts, and organisation unit levels. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_77 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "AG10KUJCrRk", "name": "Malaria Outbreak Threshold Predictor", "shortName": "Malaria Outbreak Predictor", "description": "Computes the threshold for potential malaria outbreaks based on the mean plus 1.5x the std dev", "output": { "id": "nXJJZNVAy0Y" }, "generator": { "expression": "AVG(#{r6nrJANOqMw})+1.5*STDDEV(#{r6nrJANOqMw})", "description": "Maximum normal malaria case count", "missingValueStrategy": "NEVER_SKIP", "slidingWindow": false }, "periodType": "Monthly", "sequentialSampleCount": 4, "sequentialSkipCount": 1, "annualSampleCount": 3, "organisationUnitLevels": [4] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Nginx Proxy Configuration DESCRIPTION: Basic Nginx configuration for proxying requests to Tomcat running DHIS2. Includes gzip compression settings and proxy pass configuration with headers and buffer settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/reverse_proxy_nginx.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` http { gzip on; # Enables compression, incl Web API content-types gzip_types "application/json;charset=utf-8" application/json "application/javascript;charset=utf-8" application/javascript text/javascript "application/xml;charset=utf-8" application/xml text/xml "text/css;charset=utf-8" text/css "text/plain;charset=utf-8" text/plain; server { listen 80; client_max_body_size 10M; # Proxy pass to servlet container location / { proxy_pass http://localhost:8080/; proxy_redirect off; proxy_set_header Host $host; proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto http; proxy_buffer_size 128k; proxy_buffers 8 128k; proxy_busy_buffers_size 256k; proxy_cookie_path ~*^/(.*) "/$1; SameSite=Lax"; } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Response Format for Aggregate Event Analytics in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response from the /analytics/events/aggregate endpoint. It includes headers describing the dimensions, metadata, and rows of aggregated event data. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_31 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "headers": [ { "name": "oZg33kd9taw", "column": "Gender", "type": "java.lang.String", "meta": false }, { "name": "qrur9Dvnyt5", "column": "Age", "type": "java.lang.String", "meta": false }, { "name": "pe", "column": "Period", "type": "java.lang.String", "meta": false }, { "name": "ou", "column": "Organisation unit", "type": "java.lang.String", "meta": false }, { "name": "value", "column": "Value", "type": "java.lang.String", "meta": false } ], "metaData": { "names": { "eBAyeGv0exc": "Inpatient morbidity and mortality" } }, "width": 5, "height": 39, "rows": [ [ "Female", "95", "201605", "O6uvpzGd5pu", "2" ], [ "Female", "63", "201605", "O6uvpzGd5pu", "2" ], [ "Female", "67", "201605", "O6uvpzGd5pu", "1" ], [ "Female", "71", "201605", "O6uvpzGd5pu", "1" ], [ "Female", "75", "201605", "O6uvpzGd5pu", "14" ], [ "Female", "73", "201605", "O6uvpzGd5pu", "5" ] ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Data Approval Audits with DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Endpoint for retrieving audit records of data approval actions. This endpoint allows filtering by approval level, workflow, organization unit, and date ranges. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/audit.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/audits/dataApproval ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Geo Features for Organization Units at a Level Within a Boundary DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to retrieve geospatial features for organization units at a specific level within the boundary of another organization unit. This example retrieves level 4 units within a specific parent unit. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_62 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/geoFeatures.json?ou=ou:LEVEL-4;O6uvpzGd5pu ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Tracked Entity Attribute Value Change Logs Response in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: An example of a JSON response from the DHIS2 Tracker API for tracked entity attribute value change logs. The response includes a pager and an array of change logs with details about the changes made, including who made them and what values were changed. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_31 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "pager":{ "page":1, "pageSize":10 }, "changeLogs":[ { "createdBy":{ "uid":"AIK2aQOJIbj", "username":"tracker", "firstName":"Tracker demo", "surname":"User" }, "createdAt":"2024-06-20T14:51:16.433", "type":"UPDATE", "change":{ "dataValue":{ "dataElement":"bx6fsa0t90x", "previousValue":"true", "currentValue":"false" } } }, { "createdBy":{ "uid":"AIK2aQOJIbj", "username":"tracker", "firstName":"Tracker demo", "surname":"User" }, "createdAt":"2024-06-20T14:50:32.966", "type":"CREATE", "change":{ "dataValue":{ "dataElement":"ebaJjqltK5N", "currentValue":"0" } } } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Public Resource Access with nginx for DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This nginx configuration allows public access to specific DHIS2 resources without authentication. It uses basic authentication by injecting an Authorization header, removes cookies to avoid changing logged-in user states, and restricts access to GET requests only. This setup is useful for making data analysis resources available in a web portal. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/reverse_proxy_nginx.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` http { .. server { listen 80; server_name api.somedomain.com; location ~ ^/(api/(charts|chartValues|reports|reportTables|documents|maps|organisationUnits)|dhis-web-commons/javascripts|images|dhis-web-commons-ajax-json|dhis-web-mapping|dhis-web-visualizer) { if ($request_method != GET) { return 405; } proxy_pass http://localhost:8080; proxy_redirect off; proxy_set_header Host $host; proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto http; proxy_set_header Authorization "Basic YWRtaW46ZGlzdHJpY3Q="; proxy_set_header Cookie ""; proxy_hide_header Set-Cookie; } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Geo Features for Organization Units at a Specific Level DESCRIPTION: Shows how to retrieve geospatial features for all organization units at a specific level in the hierarchy. This example requests all level 3 organization units. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_61 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/geoFeatures.json?ou=ou:LEVEL-3 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Submitting Sharing Update via cURL DESCRIPTION: This bash command demonstrates how to submit a sharing update for a DHIS2 object using cURL, including the necessary headers and authentication. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/sharing.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -d @sharing.json "localhost/api/33/sharing?type=dataElement&id=fbfJHSPpUQD" -H "Content-Type:application/json" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: PostgreSQL Database Dump Command for DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Command to create a backup of a DHIS2 database, excluding system-generated tables like resource and analytics tables. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_55 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pg_dump {database} -U {user} -T "_*" -T "analytics*" -f {filename} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Marking Messages as Read in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to mark multiple messages as read for the current user using a POST request to the 'messageConversations/read' endpoint. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "https://play.dhis2.org/dev/api/messageConversations/read" -d '["ZrKML5WiyFm","Gc03smoTm6q"]' -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: User Update cURL Command in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: cURL command example for updating an existing user by PUTting the JSON payload. Uses the same payload format as creation but requires the user ID in the URL path. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -X PUT -d @u.json "http://server/api/33/users/ID" -u user:pass -H "Content-Type: application/json" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Environment Variable Configuration DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to use environment variables in the configuration file for sensitive data like database passwords. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/dhis.conf.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` connection.password = ${DB_PASSWD} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating File Resource with Data Value Reference DESCRIPTION: Example of uploading a file while simultaneously creating a data value that references it. This endpoint combines two operations (creating file resource and data value) in a single API call. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_93 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "https://server/api/dataValues/file?de=xPTAT98T2Jd &pe=201301&ou=DiszpKrYNg8&co=Prlt0C1RF0s" -X POST -F "file=@/path/to/file/name-of-file.png" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying DHIS2 Analytics API with Response Format Specification DESCRIPTION: Example of how to request analytics data in Excel format by appending the .xls file extension to the API URL. The query includes various dimensions such as organisation unit, data elements, and period. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_41 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/analytics/enrollments/query/WSGAb5XwJ3Y.xls?dimension=ou:ImspTQPwCqd &dimension=WZbXY0S00lP.de0FEHSIoxh&columns=w75KJ2mc4zz &dimension=WZbXY0S00lP.sWoqcoByYmD&dimension=pe:LAST_MONTH&stage=WZbXY0S00lP &pageSize=10&page=1&asc=ENROLLMENTDATE&ouMode=DESCENDANTS ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering Data Elements by Attribute Value in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates filtering data elements based on a specific attribute ID and value combination. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dataElements.json?filter=attributeValues.attribute.id:eq:n2xYlNbsfko&filter=attributeValues.value:eq:AFP ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Metadata Package with cURL in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Command to pull and install a metadata package from a remote URL using the metadataPull endpoint. The URL to the metadata package is sent as plain text in the request body. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_104 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "localhost:8080/api/synchronization/metadataPull" -X POST -d "https://dhis2.org/metadata-repo/221/trainingland-org-units/metadata.json" -H "Content-Type:text/plain" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a Route with Custom API Headers Authentication DESCRIPTION: JSON request for creating a route with custom API headers for authentication. This is useful for non-DHIS2 targets that require specific header-based authentication. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/route.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "Postman Echo", "code": "postman-get", "disabled": false, "url": "https://postman-echo.com/get", "auth": { "type": "api-headers", "headers": { "X-API-KEY": "aXJgm4Kwv1xk9UfFRYIIR8b6mEV1cQz3lcxMQlaQz9lwI35j4ZIUK5T2O2aQDfIY" } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Events with Multiple Data Element Filters in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Example request demonstrating the use of multiple operands and filters for a specific data element UID. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_41 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/tracker/events?orgUnit=g8upMTyEZGZ&program=M3xtLkYBlKI&filter=rFQNCGMYud2:GT:35&filter=rFQNCGMYud2:LT:50 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating DHIS2 Configuration File DESCRIPTION: Command to create the dhis.conf configuration file in the DHIS2_HOME directory for database connection settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo -u dhis touch /home/dhis/config/dhis.conf ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: User Invitation JSON Payload in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: Example JSON payload for inviting a user to create an account. Includes basic user information, credentials with username and roles, organization units, and user groups. The system will send an invitation email to the specified address. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "firstName": "John", "surname": "Doe", "email": "johndoe@mail.com", "userCredentials": { "username": "johndoe", "userRoles": [{ "id": "Euq3XfEIEbx" }] }, "organisationUnits": [ { "id": "ImspTQPwCqd" } ], "userGroups": [ { "id": "vAvEltyXGbD" }] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Sharing Status for a DHIS2 Object DESCRIPTION: This JSON payload demonstrates how to set the sharing status for a DHIS2 object, including public access, external access, and user group permissions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/sharing.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "object": { "publicAccess": "rw------", "externalAccess": false, "user": {}, "userGroupAccesses": [ { "id": "hj0nnsVsPLU", "access": "rw------" }, { "id": "qMjBflJMOfB", "access": "r-------" } ] } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Data Element Group Metadata Export with Dependencies DESCRIPTION: Endpoint for exporting a data element group with all its dependencies, which can be imported to another DHIS2 instance. The export is in JSON format and includes all related metadata. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_37 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dataElementGroups/{id}/metadata.json ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sending Bulk Data Values in XML Format DESCRIPTION: Example of sending multiple data values using XML format. Each data value specifies its own period and organization unit, allowing for varied time periods and locations in a single request. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Conditional Logic Using isNull in DHIS2 Expressions DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use if statement with isNull function to handle null values in DHIS2 predictor expressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_37 LANGUAGE: Expression Language CODE: ``` if(isNull(#{T7OyqQpUpNd}), 0, 1) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Tracker Relationships in JSON DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response for a tracker relationships query, showing pager information and relationship details including types and linked entities. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_47 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "pager": { "page": 1, "pageSize": 2 }, "relationships": [ { "relationship": "oGtgtJpp6fG", "relationshipType": "Mv8R4MPcNcX", "from": { "trackedEntity": { "trackedEntity": "neR4cmMY22o" } }, "to": { "trackedEntity": { "trackedEntity": "DsSlC54GNXy" } } }, { "relationship": "SSfIicJKbh5", "relationshipType": "Mv8R4MPcNcX", "from": { "trackedEntity": { "trackedEntity": "neR4cmMY22o" } }, "to": { "trackedEntity": { "trackedEntity": "rEYUGH97Ssd" } } } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Aggregated Usage Analytics Report (GET) DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to retrieve monthly aggregated usage analytics data using specific date ranges. This request requires startDate, endDate, and interval parameters to specify the period and type of aggregation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_53 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/dataStatistics?startDate=2014-01-02&endDate=2016-01-01&interval=MONTH ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: User Replication Request in DHIS2 API (JSON) DESCRIPTION: Example of a JSON payload for replicating a user. Requires a new username and password for the replicated user. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_26 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "username": "user_replica", "password": "SecretPassword" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Monitoring All Tasks in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: This JSON snippet shows the response format when requesting a list of all currently running tasks in the DHIS2 system. It includes various task categories and their corresponding status information. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/maintenance.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ { "EVENT_IMPORT": {}, "DATA_STATISTICS": {}, "RESOURCE_TABLE": {}, "FILE_RESOURCE_CLEANUP": {}, "METADATA_IMPORT": {}, "CREDENTIALS_EXPIRY_ALERT": {}, "SMS_SEND": {}, "MOCK": {}, "ANALYTICSTABLE_UPDATE": {}, "COMPLETE_DATA_SET_REGISTRATION_IMPORT": {}, "DATAVALUE_IMPORT": {}, "DATA_SET_NOTIFICATION": {}, "DATA_INTEGRITY": { "OB1qGRlCzap": [{ "uid": "LdHQK0PXZyF", "level": "INFO", "category": "DATA_INTEGRITY", "time": "2018-03-26T15:02:32.171", "message": "Data integrity checks completed in 38.31 seconds.", "completed": true }] }, "PUSH_ANALYSIS": {}, "MONITORING": {}, "VALIDATION_RESULTS_NOTIFICATION": {}, "REMOVE_EXPIRED_RESERVED_VALUES": {}, "DATA_SYNC": {}, "SEND_SCHEDULED_MESSAGE": {}, "DATAVALUE_IMPORT_INTERNAL": {}, "PROGRAM_NOTIFICATIONS": {}, "META_DATA_SYNC": {}, "ANALYTICS_TABLE": {}, "PREDICTOR": {} } ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Personal Access Token via API DESCRIPTION: POST request to create a new Personal Access Token, requiring basic authentication and returning a token response. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/overview.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` POST https://play.dhis2.org/dev/api/apiToken Content-Type: application/json Authorization: Basic admin district {} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Redis Cache Invalidation in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Configuration properties required in dhis.conf file to enable Redis-based cache invalidation across DHIS2 cluster instances. Includes host, port, password and SSL settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/how-to/tomcat-clustering.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` # Cache invalidation config redis.cache.invalidation.enabled = on # Shared Redis configuration redis.host = REDIS_HOST redis.port = REDIS_PORT redis.password = PASSWORD (Optional, only if enabled on Redis server) redis.use.ssl = true (Optional, only if enabled on Redis server) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Restoring Compressed DHIS2 Database Backup DESCRIPTION: Command to restore a compressed DHIS2 database backup without manually extracting it first. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_59 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` gunzip -c dhis2.sql.gz | psql -d dhis2 -U dhis ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying DHIS2 Tracker Import Validation Error Example in JSON DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates the structure of a validation error report within an import summary. It shows how errors are reported, including the error message, error code, tracker type, and the UID of the problematic object. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_17 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "validationReport": { "errorReports": [ { "message": "Could not find TrackedEntityType: `Q9GufDoplCL`.", "errorCode": "E1005", "trackerType": "TRACKED_ENTITY", "uid": "Kj6vYde4LHh" } ], "warningReports" : [ ... ] } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: User with Settings JSON Example in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: Example JSON payload showing how to include user settings when creating a user. The settings are added as a 'settings' object to the root object with key-value pairs for each setting. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "Mj8balLULKp", "firstName": "John", "surname": "Doe", "settings": { "keyUiLocale": "de" }, //... } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Deleting Event Data Values in DHIS2 Tracker API DESCRIPTION: Deletes data values from a specific event by setting the value to null in the POST request to /api/tracker endpoint. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "events": [ { "event": "ZwwuwNp6gVd", "dataValues": [ { "dataElement": "bx6fsa0t90x", "value": null } ], "attributeOptionCombo": "HllvX50cXC0", "attributeCategoryOptions": "xYerKDKCefk", "enrollment": "MNWZ6hnuhSw", "enrollmentStatus": "ACTIVE", "occurredAt": "2019-08-01T00:00:00.000", "orgUnit": "y77LiPqLMoq", "program": "IpHINAT79UW", "programStage": "A03MvHHogjR", "scheduledAt": "2019-08-19T13:59:13.688", "status": "ACTIVE", "trackedEntity": "Kj6vYde4LHh" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Dashboard Layout in JSON DESCRIPTION: This JSON object defines the layout for a dashboard, specifying spacing and column configurations. It includes attributes for column and row spacing, as well as column index and span values. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "layout": { "spacing": { "column": 5, "row": 5 }, "columns": [{ "index": 0, "span": 2 }, { "index": 1, "span": 1 }] } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: User Lookup by ID Pattern in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: API request pattern for looking up a user by their identifier. The request will match the provided ID against user's UID, UUID, or username in that order. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` GET /api/userLookup/{id} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: User Invitation cURL Command in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: cURL command example for sending a user invitation by POSTing the JSON payload to the invite endpoint. Specifies the content type as JSON and includes basic authentication. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -d @invite.json "localhost/api/33/users/invite" -u admin:district -H "Content-Type:application/json" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Analytics Data with Multiple Dimensions in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: This API call demonstrates how to query analytics data using multiple dimensions including data elements, reporting rates, and custom data elements. It specifies a time period and an organization unit filter. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/analytics.json?dimension=dx:Uvn6LCg7dVU;BfMAe6Itzgt.REPORTING_RATE;IpHINAT79UW.a3kGcGDCuk6&dimension=pe:LAST_12_MONTHS&filter=ou:ImspTQPwCqd ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sample Payload for Tracker Notes in JSON DESCRIPTION: This JSON snippet demonstrates the structure for including notes at both the enrollment and event levels in the Tracker API. It shows how to add multiple notes to an enrollment and its associated events. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "trackedEntity": "oi3PMIGYJH8", "enrollments": [ { "enrollment": "EbRsJr8LSSO", "notes": [ { "note": "vxmCvYcPdaW", "value": "Enrollment note 1" }, { "value": "Enrollment note 2." } ], "events": [ { "event": "zfzS9WeO0uM", "notes": [ { "note": "MAQFb7fAggS", "value": "Event Note 1." }, { "value": "Event Note 2." } ] } ] } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Chaining datimutils with tidyverse Commands in R DESCRIPTION: Shows how to combine datimutils metadata retrieval with tidyverse filtering and selection operations using pipe operators. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/dhis2-and-r-integration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: r CODE: ``` datimutils::getMetadata("dataElementGroups", fields = "id,name,shortName") %>% dplyr::filter(grepl("ART",`shortName`)) %>% dplyr::select(name) name 1 ART 2 ART enrollment 3 ART entry points 4 ART pediatric 1st line 5 ART staging 6 ART treatment 7 New on ART 8 Prev month on ART 9 Shift from ART reg. 10 Shift to ART reg. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring a Console Target for DHIS2 Event Hooks DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration for a simple console target that prints events to the system log, useful for testing and debugging event hooks. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/event-hooks.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "type": "console" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Program Copy with Custom Prefix in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example of copying a program with a custom prefix parameter, which will be applied to the name and other properties. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_117 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` POST /api/programs/{uid}/copy?prefix=my prefix ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing OpenJDK 17 DESCRIPTION: Command to install OpenJDK 17, the recommended Java version for DHIS2 2.40 and later SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo apt-get install -y openjdk-17-jdk ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Combined Filtering of Indexable and Named Tracked Entity Attributes in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates filtering tracked entity attributes that are both indexable and match a specific name pattern. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_19 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/trackedEntityAttributtes.json?filter=name:like:ANC&indexableOnly=true ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating an External Aggregate Data Exchange with Basic Authentication in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This JSON payload shows how to create an external aggregate data exchange with basic authentication, where data is pushed to an external DHIS2 instance. It uses the 'code' ID scheme for the target instance. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-exchange.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "External data exchange with basic authentication", "source": { "requests": [ { "name": "ANC", "visualization": null, "dx": [ "fbfJHSPpUQD", "cYeuwXTCPkU", "Jtf34kNZhzP" ], "pe": [ "LAST_12_MONTHS", "202201" ], "ou": [ "ImspTQPwCqd" ], "inputIdScheme": "UID", "outputIdScheme": "CODE" } ] }, "target": { "type": "EXTERNAL", "api": { "url": "https://play.dhis2.org/2.38.2.1", "username": "admin", "password": "district" }, "request": { "idScheme": "CODE" } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Rate Limiting for DHIS2 Analytics API with NGINX DESCRIPTION: NGINX configuration to apply rate limiting to the computationally intensive DHIS2 analytics API. This setup limits requests to 5 per second per IP address with a burst queue of 20 requests, returning 503 errors for excessive requests. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_47 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` http { .. limit_req_zone $binary_remote_addr zone=limit_analytics:10m rate=5r/s; server { .. location ~ ^/api/(\d+/)?analytics(.*)$ { limit_req zone=limit_analytics burst=20; proxy_pass http://localhost:8080/api/$1analytics$2$is_args$args; .. } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring JWT Token Authentication with Google OIDC DESCRIPTION: Configuration properties for enabling JWT bearer token authentication with Google as OIDC provider, including multiple client definitions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/oauth.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` oidc.oauth2.login.enabled = on oidc.provider.google.client_id = oidc.provider.google.client_secret = oauth2.authorization.server.enabled = off oidc.jwt.token.authentication.enabled = on oidc.provider.google.ext_client.0.client_id = oidc.provider.google.ext_client.1.client_id = ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Program Rule Actions in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This snippet explains how to define actions for a program rule in DHIS2, including selecting an action type and entering required information. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_32 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` 5. Click **Define program rule actions** and create the actions executed when the expression is true. 1. Click the add button, select an **Action** and enter the required information. Depending on the action type, you'll have to perform different types of settings. For some action types, you must also enter free text or create expressions. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Partial Update Examples DESCRIPTION: Various JSON patch examples for updating metadata objects including updating names, adding/removing elements from groups, and changing properties. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_29 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ {"op": "remove-by-id", "path": "/test", "id": "u6CvKyF0Db5"} ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Bulk Data Value Follow-up JSON Request in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: JSON payload example for marking multiple data values for follow-up in DHIS2 in a single request. This demonstrates how to structure a batch update with an array of data values to be marked for follow-up. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_34 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "values": [ { "dataElement": "s46m5MS0hxu", "period": "202005", "orgUnit": "DiszpKrYNg8", "categoryOptionCombo": "psbwp3CQEhs", "attributeOptionCombo": "HllvX50cXC0", "followup": true } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Dataset Notification Template Request DESCRIPTION: JSON payload format for creating dataset notification templates. Configures notification triggers, recipients, and delivery channels. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_72 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "dataSetNotificationTemplate1", "dataSetNotificationTrigger": "DATA_SET_COMPLETION", "relativeScheduledDays": 0, "notificationRecipient": "ORGANISATION_UNIT_CONTACT", "dataSets": [{ "id": "eZDhcZi6FLP" }], "deliveryChannels": ["SMS","EMAIL"], "subjectTemplate": "V{data_set_name}", "messageTemplate": "V{data_set_name}V{registration_period}", "sendStrategy": "SINGLE_NOTIFICATION" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Program Messages in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Examples of using the DHIS2 API to retrieve program messages. Shows how to get all messages, query sent messages by enrollment or event UID, retrieve specific messages by UID, and delete messages. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_59 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` GET /api/messages ``` LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` GET /api/messages/scheduled/sent?enrollment={uid} GET /api/messages/scheduled/sent?event={uid} ``` LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` GET /api/messages/{uid} ``` LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` DELETE /api/messages/{uid} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a New Message with Attachments in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the JSON payload structure for creating a new message with attachments, recipients, and content in the DHIS2 API. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_20 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "subject": "Hey", "text": "How are you?", "users": [ { "id": "OYLGMiazHtW" }, { "id": "N3PZBUlN8vq" } ], "userGroups": [ { "id": "ZoHNWQajIoe" } ], "organisationUnits": [ { "id": "DiszpKrYNg8" } ], "attachments": [ "fTpI4GOmujz", "h2ZsOxMFMfq" ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sending data values with attribute category combinations using cURL in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to associate a data value with an attribute option combination using the cc (category combination) and cp (category options) parameters in the DHIS2 Web API. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_25 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/dataValues?de=s46m5MS0hxu&ou=DiszpKrYNg8 &pe=201308&cc=dzjKKQq0cSO&cp=wbrDrL2aYEc;btOyqprQ9e8&value=26" -X POST -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sample JSON Response from DHIS2 Analytics API DESCRIPTION: This JSON object represents a typical response from the DHIS2 Analytics API. It includes headers describing the data structure, metadata with dimension details, and rows containing the actual data values. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_17 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "headers": [ { "name": "dx", "column": "Data", "meta": true, "type": "java.lang.String" }, { "name": "pe", "column": "Period", "meta": true, "type": "java.lang.String" }, { "name": "value", "column": "Value", "meta": false, "type": "java.lang.Double" } ], "height": 4, "metaData": { "pe": [ "2016Q1", "2016Q2" ], "ou": [ "ImspTQPwCqd" ], "names": { "2016Q1": "Jan to Mar 2016", "2016Q2": "Apr to Jun 2016", "FbKK4ofIv5R": "Measles Coverage <1 y", "ImspTQPwCqd": "Sierra Leone", "eTDtyyaSA7f": "Fully Immunized Coverage" } }, "rows": [ [ "eTDtyyaSA7f", "2016Q2", "81.1" ], [ "eTDtyyaSA7f", "2016Q1", "74.7" ], [ "FbKK4ofIv5R", "2016Q2", "88.9" ], [ "FbKK4ofIv5R", "2016Q1", "84.0" ] ], "width": 3 } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Option Set Metadata Export with Dependencies DESCRIPTION: Endpoint for exporting an option set with all its dependencies, which can be imported to another DHIS2 instance. The export is in JSON format and includes all related metadata. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_36 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/optionSets/{id}/metadata.json ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Response for Asynchronous Data Value Import in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This JSON response is returned when initiating an asynchronous data value import. It includes details about the import job such as its ID, creation time, and the endpoint for monitoring its status. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "OK", "httpStatusCode": 200, "status": "OK", "message": "Initiated dataValueImport", "response": { "name": "dataValueImport", "id": "YR1UxOUXmzT", "created": "2018-08-20T14:17:28.429", "jobType": "DATAVALUE_IMPORT", "relativeNotifierEndpoint": "/api/system/tasks/DATAVALUE_IMPORT/YR1UxOUXmzT" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Calculating Pregnancy Weeks Using d2:floor Function DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to calculate the number of completed weeks of pregnancy by dividing the gestational age in days by 7 and rounding down using the d2:floor function. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_45 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2:floor(#{gestationalAgeDays}/7) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Multiple Token Identifiable Filtering on Data Elements in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use multiple tokens for filtering across identifiable properties of data elements. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dataElements.json?filter=identifiable:token:ANC visit ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Organisation Units with CSV in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Minimal example for importing organisation units with a parent unit. The CSV file includes two provinces with their names, codes, and parent organisation unit UID. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_85 LANGUAGE: csv CODE: ``` name,uid,code,parent "West province",,"WESTP","ImspTQPwCqd" "East province",,"EASTP","ImspTQPwCqd" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example User Lookup Query in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: Example of an API request for looking up users with 'John' in their details. Searches across first name, surname, email, and username fields. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` /api/userLookup?query=John ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Breaking the Glass for Tracker Ownership Override in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: POST request to temporarily override ownership privileges for a protected program. This endpoint requires the tracked entity ID, program ID, and a reason for access. Access is granted for 3 hours. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_48 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/tracker/ownership/override?trackedEntity=DiszpKrYNg8&program=eBAyeGv0exc&reason=patient+showed+up+for+emergency+care ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Checking Disk Performance in Bash DESCRIPTION: Commands to check disk latency and throughput performance. These are essential for ensuring optimal database performance for DHIS2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/how-to/PostgreSQL-setup.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` dd if=/dev/zero of=/tmp/testfile bs=512 count=1000 oflag=direct ``` LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` dd if=/dev/zero of=/tmp/test1.img bs=1G count=1 oflag=dsync ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Bulk Querying Data Approval Status in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the JSON response structure for bulk querying of data approval statuses. It includes multiple approval records with their respective parameters, permissions, and states. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-approval.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ { "aoc": "HllvX50cXC0", "pe": "201801", "level": "KaTJLhGmU95", "ou": "YuQRtpLP10I", "permissions": { "mayApprove": false, "mayUnapprove": true, "mayAccept": true, "mayUnaccept": false, "mayReadData": true, "approvedBy": "User A", "approvedAt": "2022-01-13T12:56:07.005", "acceptedBy": "User A", "acceptedAt": "2022-01-13T12:56:07.005" }, "state": "APPROVED_HERE", "wf": "rIUL3hYOjJc" }, { "aoc": "HllvX50cXC0", "pe": "201802", "ou": "YuQRtpLP10I", "permissions": { "mayApprove": true, "mayUnapprove": false, "mayAccept": false, "mayUnaccept": false, "mayReadData": true }, "state": "UNAPPROVED_READY", "wf": "rIUL3hYOjJc" } ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Single Data Value Follow-up JSON Request in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: JSON payload example for marking a single data value for follow-up in DHIS2. This shows a complete request with all possible fields including data element, period, organization unit, category option combo, attribute option combo, and the follow-up flag. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_32 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "dataElement": "s46m5MS0hxu", "period": "202005", "orgUnit": "DiszpKrYNg8", "categoryOptionCombo": "psbwp3CQEhs", "attributeOptionCombo": "HllvX50cXC0", "followup": true } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating an Analytics Table Job Configuration in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the JSON structure for creating an analytics table job configuration in DHIS2. It includes job parameters such as the number of years to process and table types to skip. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "Analytics tables last two years", "jobType": "ANALYTICS_TABLE", "cronExpression": "0 * * ? * *", "jobParameters": { "lastYears": "2", "skipTableTypes": [], "skipResourceTables": false } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: User Invitation Confirmation Request in DHIS2 API (JSON) DESCRIPTION: Example of a POST request to confirm a user invitation. Includes user details, password, and a Base64-encoded token. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_20 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "username": "TestUser", "firstName": "Test", "surname": "User", "password": "Test123!", "email": "test@test.com", "phoneNumber": "123456789", "g-recaptcha-response": "recaptchaResponse", "token": "aWRUb2tlbjpJRHJlc3RvcmVUb2tlbg==" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating DHIS2 System User in Ubuntu DESCRIPTION: Commands to create a dedicated non-root user for running DHIS2 and setting a secure password for enhanced security. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo useradd -d /home/dhis -m dhis -s /bin/false ``` LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo passwd dhis ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing OpenJDK 17 for DHIS2 2.41 DESCRIPTION: Command to install OpenJDK 17, which is required for DHIS2 version 2.41 and recommended for 2.40 and above. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo apt-get install -y openjdk-17-jdk ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Combined Identifiable and Property-Based Filtering in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Illustrates combining identifiable token filtering with specific property filtering on data elements. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_16 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dataElements.json?filter=identifiable:token:ANC visit&filter=displayName:ilike:tt1 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding PostgreSQL Repository and Installing PostgreSQL 16 in Bash DESCRIPTION: Commands to add the PostgreSQL repository, update the package cache, and install PostgreSQL 16 along with required extensions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/how-to/PostgreSQL-setup.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo apt install curl ca-certificates gnupg curl https://www.postgresql.org/media/keys/ACCC4CF8.asc | gpg --dearmor | sudo tee /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/apt.postgresql.org.gpg >/dev/null ``` LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo sh -c 'echo "deb http://apt.postgresql.org/pub/repos/apt $(lsb_release -cs)-pgdg main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.list' ``` LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo apt update ``` LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo apt install postgresql-16 postgresql-client-16 libdbd-pg-perl postgresql-16-postgis-3 ``` LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo systemctl start postgresql ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: ADX data format example for DHIS2 data exchange DESCRIPTION: Example of an ADX (Aggregate Data Exchange) XML message for DHIS2. This shows how data values can be grouped by orgUnit, period, and dataSet, with each dataValue containing category option values as attributes. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_29 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: CURL Commands for Data Import DESCRIPTION: Examples of using curl to send data values in XML and CSV formats to the DHIS2 API. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -d @datavalueset.xml "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/dataValueSets" -H "Content-Type:application/xml" -u admin:district ``` LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl --data-binary @datavalueset.csv "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/24/api/dataValueSets" -H "Content-Type:application/csv" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Validation Rules for a Data Set in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Makes a GET request to retrieve validation rules that are relevant for a specific data set, where all data elements in the validation rule formulas are part of the specified data set. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/validationRules?dataSet= ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Asynchronous Task Status in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates the JSON response format when retrieving the status of an asynchronous task in DHIS2. It includes information such as the task UID, level, category, timestamp, message, and completion status. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/maintenance.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ { "uid": "hpiaeMy7wFX", "level": "INFO", "category": "DATAVALUE_IMPORT", "time": "2015-09-02T07:43:14.595+0000", "message": "Import done", "completed": true } ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Replying to a Message Conversation with cURL DESCRIPTION: cURL command to reply to an existing message conversation in DHIS2 by sending plain text to a specific conversation ID endpoint, authenticating as the mobile user. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -d "Yes the Mortality data set has been reported" "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/messageConversations/ZjHHSjyyeJ2" -H "Content-Type:text/plain" -u mobile:district -X POST ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Requesting Filled Organisation Unit Levels in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: HTTP GET request endpoint for retrieving filled organisation unit levels. This endpoint provides an ordered list of organisation unit levels with generated levels injected into positions without a persisted level. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_73 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` GET /api/33/filledOrganisationUnitLevels ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: API Endpoints for UI File Management in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: API endpoints for managing custom JavaScript and CSS files in DHIS2. Supports POST, GET, and DELETE operations for both script and style files. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/settings-and-configuration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` POST GET DELETE /api/33/files/script POST GET DELETE /api/33/files/style ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Dashboard Metadata Export with Dependencies DESCRIPTION: Endpoint for exporting a dashboard with all its dependencies, which can be imported to another DHIS2 instance. The export is in JSON format and includes all related metadata. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_35 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dashboards/{id}/metadata.json ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: PostgreSQL Performance Tuning Settings DESCRIPTION: Configures various PostgreSQL settings for optimal performance with DHIS2. Includes memory allocation, connection limits, and query optimization parameters. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/postgresql.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` jit = off max_connections = 200 shared_buffers = 3GB work_mem = 24MB maintenance_work_mem = 1GB temp_buffers = 16MB effective_cache_size = 8GB checkpoint_completion_target = 0.8 synchronous_commit = off wal_writer_delay = 10s random_page_cost = 1.1 max_locks_per_transaction = 96 track_activity_query_size = 8192 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Generic HTTP Gateway in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration for a generic HTTP gateway. Includes configuration template, URL template, content type, HTTP method parameters, and header options for API requests. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/sms.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "type": "http", "name": "Generic", "configurationTemplate": "username=${username}&password=${password}&to=${recipients}&countrycode=880&message=${text$}&messageid=0", "useGet": false, "sendUrlParameters":false, "contentType": "APPLICATION_JSON", "urlTemplate":"https://samplegateway.com/messages", "parameters": [ { "header": true, "encode": false, "key": "username", "value": "user_uio", "confidential": true }, { "header": true, "encode": false, "key": "password", "value": "123abcxyz", "confidential": true }, { "header": false, "encode": false, "key": "deliveryReport", "value": "yes", "confidential": false } ], "isDefault": false } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Category Combo Metadata Export with Dependencies DESCRIPTION: Endpoint for exporting a category combo with all its dependencies, which can be imported to another DHIS2 instance. The export is in JSON format and includes all related metadata. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_34 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/categoryCombos/{id}/metadata.json ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Custom Data Integrity Check Example - User Email Check DESCRIPTION: Example YAML configuration for a custom data integrity check that verifies if users have email addresses configured SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_24 LANGUAGE: yaml CODE: ``` --- name: users_should_have_emails description: Users should have emails. section: Users section_order: 6 summary_sql: > WITH users_no_email as ( SELECT uid,username from userinfo where email IS NULL) SELECT COUNT(*) as value, 100*COUNT(*) / NULLIF( ( select COUNT(*) from userinfo), 0) as percent from users_no_email; details_sql: > WITH users_no_email as ( SELECT uid,username from userinfo where email IS NULL) SELECT uid,username as from users_no_email; severity: WARNING introduction: > Users should have defined emails. This is important for password recovery and to be able to send notifications to users. recommendation: > Make sure that all users have defined emails. details_id_type: users ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting System Settings in Bulk with JSON DESCRIPTION: Shows the JSON format for setting multiple system settings at once using a POST request. This example sets application notification, intro, and footer text. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/settings-and-configuration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "keyApplicationNotification": "Welcome", "keyApplicationIntro": "DHIS2", "keyApplicationFooter": "Read more at dhis2.org" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering Indexable Tracked Entity Attributes in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Shows how to retrieve only the tracked entity attributes that are trigram indexable for better lookup performance. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_18 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/trackedEntityAttributtes.json?indexableOnly=true ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Predictors in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: HTTP POST request endpoint for creating new predictors. Predictors allow generation of data values based on expressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_76 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` POST /api/predictors ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Checking User Role Using d2:hasUserRole Function DESCRIPTION: This example shows how to check if the current user has a specific role using the d2:hasUserRole function with a role ID. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_46 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2:hasUserRole('UYXOT4A3ASA') ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Users with Gist API in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows a Gist API query for users, including id, userGroups size, organisationUnits size, and apiEndpoints. It demonstrates how complex objects are transformed into simple values and linked via apiEndpoints. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata-gist.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "rWLrZL8rP3K", "userGroups": 0, "organisationUnits": 1, "apiEndpoints": { "organisationUnits": "/users/rWLrZL8rP3K/organisationUnits/gist", "userGroups": "/users/rWLrZL8rP3K/userGroups/gist" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Making POST Request to Merge Indicators DESCRIPTION: The endpoint to merge indicators via a POST request to the DHIS2 API. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_60 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` POST /api/indicators/merge ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: New Sharing Object Format in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This JSON structure illustrates the new sharing object format introduced in DHIS2 2.36, which includes both old and new sharing properties for backward compatibility. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/sharing.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "ANC 1st visit", "publicAccess": "rw------", "externalAccess": false, "userGroupAccesses": [ { "access": "r-r-----", "userGroupUid": "Rg8wusV7QYi", "displayName": "HIV Program Coordinators", "id": "Rg8wusV7QYi" } ], "userAccesses": [], "user": { "displayName": "Tom Wakiki", "name": "Tom Wakiki", "id": "GOLswS44mh8", "username": "system" }, "sharing": { "owner": "GOLswS44mh8", "external": false, "users": {}, "userGroups": { "Rg8wusV7QYi": { "access": "r-r-----", "id": "Rg8wusV7QYi" } }, "public": "rw------" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Counting Previous Pregnancy Outcomes Using d2:count Function DESCRIPTION: This example shows how to count the number of values entered for a source field (previousPregnancyOutcome) in a repeatable program stage using the d2:count function. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_40 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2:count('previousPregnancyOutcome') ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating DHIS2 User in Ubuntu DESCRIPTION: Commands to create a dedicated user 'dhis' for running DHIS2 and set its password. This ensures DHIS2 is not run with root privileges. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo useradd -d /home/dhis -m dhis -s /bin/false sudo passwd dhis ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring SMPP Gateway in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration for the SMPP (Short Message Peer-to-Peer) gateway. Includes connection parameters like system ID, host, system type, bind type, port, password, and messaging options. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/sms.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "type": "smpp", "name": "smpp gateway2", "systemId": "smppclient1", "host": "localhost", "systemType": "cp", "numberPlanIndicator": "UNKNOWN", "typeOfNumber": "UNKNOWN", "bindType": "BIND_TX", "port": 2775, "password":"password", "compressed": false } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying DHIS2 Analytics Outlier Detection API using HTTP GET DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to make a GET request to the DHIS2 Analytics Outlier Detection API. It includes various query parameters such as data set, organisation unit, date range, algorithm, and sorting options to retrieve outlier data. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_67 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET api/analytics/outlierDetection?ds=BfMAe6Itzgt&ou=ImspTQPwCqd&startDate=2022-07-26&endDate=2022-10-26&algorithm=Z_SCORE&maxResults=30&orderBy=value&threshold=3.0&sortOrder=asc&outputIdScheme=code ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Checking User Credentials via DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: HTTP GET request with basic authentication to check if a username and password combination is correct. The response status code indicates the outcome. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/maintenance.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: HTTP CODE: ``` /api/33/system/ping ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Restoring DHIS2 Database DESCRIPTION: Restores a DHIS2 database from a SQL dump file. Requires an empty database to be created beforehand. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/postgresql.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` psql -d dhis2 -U dhis -f dhis2.sql ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Import Summary for Aggregate Data Exchange in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the JSON response structure for an import summary after performing a data exchange operation. It includes details such as the response type, status, and counts of imported, updated, deleted, and ignored data values. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-exchange.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "responseType": "ImportSummaries", "status": "SUCCESS", "imported": 36, "updated": 0, "deleted": 0, "ignored": 0, "importSummaries": [""] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Data Integrity Check Information in JSON DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the JSON response format when listing available data integrity checks. It includes details such as the check name, display name, section, severity, description, and performance characteristics. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ { "name": "data_elements_without_groups", "displayName": "Data elements lacking groups", "section": "Data Elements", "severity": "WARNING", "description": "Lists all data elements that have no data element groups", "issuesIdType": "dataElements", "isSlow": false } ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Reading Interpretations with GET Request in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: A GET request example for fetching interpretations with field filtering to include comments, IDs, text, user information, and mentions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` GET /api/interpretations?fields=*,comments[id,text,user,mentions] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Permission Error Response for Program Copy in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Error response when a user doesn't have the required permissions to copy a program. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_120 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Forbidden", "httpStatusCode": 403, "status": "ERROR", "message": "You don't have write permissions for Program Program123a", "errorCode": "E1006" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: CSV Response for Data Value Set DESCRIPTION: Example CSV response from DHIS2 when retrieving a data value set. It includes headers for data elements, periods, organization units, and other attributes, followed by rows of corresponding data values. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_23 LANGUAGE: csv CODE: ``` dataelement,period,orgunit,catoptcombo,attroptcombo,value,storedby,lastupdated,comment,flwup f7n9E0hX8qk,201401,DiszpKrYNg8,bRowv6yZOF2,bRowv6yZOF2,12,system,2015-04-05T19:58:12.000,comment1,false Ix2HsbDMLea,201401,DiszpKrYNg8,bRowv6yZOF2,bRowv6yZOF2,14,system,2015-04-05T19:58:12.000,comment2,false eY5ehpbEsB7,201401,DiszpKrYNg8,bRowv6yZOF2,bRowv6yZOF2,16,system,2015-04-05T19:58:12.000,comment3,false FTRrcoaog83,201401,DiszpKrYNg8,bRowv6yZOF2,bRowv6yZOF2,12,system,2014-03-02T21:45:05.519,comment4,false ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sending Outbound SMS with JSON Payload DESCRIPTION: Example JSON payload for sending SMS to multiple recipients. The message field contains the text to be sent and the recipients field contains an array of phone numbers. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/sms.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "message":"Sms Text", "recipients": [ "004712341234", "004712341235" ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: PostgreSQL Performance Settings DESCRIPTION: Collection of PostgreSQL configuration settings for optimal DHIS2 performance, including memory allocation, connection limits, and query optimization parameters SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` jit = off max_connections = 200 shared_buffers = 3GB work_mem = 24MB maintenance_work_mem = 1GB temp_buffers = 16MB effective_cache_size = 8GB checkpoint_completion_target = 0.8 synchronous_commit = off wal_writer_delay = 10s random_page_cost = 1.1 max_locks_per_transaction = 96 track_activity_query_size = 8192 jit = off ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Metadata Version in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This API creates a new metadata version with the specified type. The 'type' parameter determines how strict the version will be during metadata import (BEST_EFFORT or ATOMIC). SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_100 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -X POST -u admin:district "https://play.dhis2.org/dev/api/metadata/version/create?type=BEST_EFFORT" ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "Version_1", "created": "2016-06-30T05:54:41.139+0000", "lastUpdated": "2016-06-30T05:54:41.333+0000", "externalAccess": false, "publicAccess": "--------", "user": { "name": "John Traore", "created": "2013-04-18T17:15:08.407+0000", "lastUpdated": "2016-04-06T00:06:06.571+0000", "externalAccess": false, "displayName": "John Traore", "id": "xE7jOejl9FI" }, "displayName": "Version_1", "type": "BEST_EFFORT", "hashCode": "fd1398ff7ec9fcfd5b59d523c8680798", "id": "SjnhUp6r4hG" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Allowed Remote Servers in DHIS2 Configuration DESCRIPTION: Configuration for allowed remote servers in dhis.conf file. This setting controls which URLs can be used with the Route API to prevent server-side request forgery attacks. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/route.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` route.remote_servers_allowed = https://server1.com/,https://server2.com/ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Organization Units by Category Options DESCRIPTION: API response format for retrieving associations between category options and organization units. Returns organization unit UIDs mapped to category option IDs. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_68 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "": [ "", "" ], "": [ "", "" ], "": [] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Paginating Tracked Entity Query Results in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example demonstrating how to implement paging in tracked entity queries by specifying page number and page size parameters. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_46 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/41/analytics/trackedEntities/query/nEenWmSyUEp?program=IpHINAT79UW,WSGAb5XwJ3Y&dimension=IpHINAT79UW.w75KJ2mc4zz:eq:James &pageSize=10&page=2 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Response Format for Event Count and Extent Analytics in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response from the /analytics/events/count endpoint. It provides the count of events and the extent (bounding box) of the events matching the query. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_35 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { extent: "BOX(-13.2682125910096 7.38679562779441,-10.4261178860988 9.90401290212795)", count: 59 } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Redis for DHIS2 Shared Data Store DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates the configuration properties needed in dhis.conf to enable Redis as a shared data store for DHIS2 clustering, including leader election settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_32 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` # Redis Configuration redis.enabled = on # Shared Redis configuration redis.host = REDIS_HOST redis.port = REDIS_PORT redis.password = PASSWORD (Optional, only if enabled on Redis server) redis.use.ssl = true (Optional, only if enabled on Redis server) # Optional, defaults to 2 minutes leader.time.to.live.minutes=4 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Outlier Values with Z-Score Algorithm DESCRIPTION: Examples of HTTP GET requests to fetch outlier values using various parameters like z-score algorithm, thresholds, ordering, and result limits.
