SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/36/outlierDetection?ds=BfMAe6Itzgt&ds=QX4ZTUbOt3a &ou=O6uvpzGd5pu&ou=fdc6uOvgoji&startDate=2020-01-01&endDate=2020-12-31 ``` LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/36/outlierDetection?ds=BfMAe6Itzgt&ds=QX4ZTUbOt3a &ou=O6uvpzGd5pu&startDate=2020-01-01&endDate=2020-12-31 &algorithm=Z_SCORE&threshold=2.5 ``` LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/36/outlierDetection?ds=BfMAe6Itzgt &ou=O6uvpzGd5pu&startDate=2020-01-01&endDate=2020-12-31 &orderBy=Z_SCORE ``` LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/36/outlierDetection?ds=BfMAe6Itzgt &ou=O6uvpzGd5pu&startDate=2020-01-01&endDate=2020-12-31 &maxResults=10 ``` LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/36/outlierDetection?ds=BfMAe6Itzgt &ou=O6uvpzGd5pu&startDate=2020-01-01&endDate=2020-12-31 &dataStartDate=2018-01-01&dataEndDate=2020-12-31 ``` LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/36/outlierDetection?ds=BfMAe6Itzgt&ds=QX4ZTUbOt3a &ou=O6uvpzGd5pu&ou=fdc6uOvgoji&startDate=2020-01-01&endDate=2020-12-31 &algorithm=MIN_MAX ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Making POST Request to Merge Indicator Types DESCRIPTION: The endpoint to merge indicator types via a POST request to the DHIS2 API. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_64 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` POST /api/indicatorTypes/merge ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Job Configuration JSON Structure in DHIS2 Scheduler DESCRIPTION: This JSON structure represents a job configuration in the scheduler listing. It includes details such as name, type, cron expression, next execution time, status, and a sequence containing the job configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_23 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "User account expiry alert", "type": "ACCOUNT_EXPIRY_ALERT", "cronExpression": "0 0 2 ? * *", "nextExecutionTime": "2023-03-15T02:00:00.000", "status": "SCHEDULED", "enabled": true, "configurable": false, "sequence": [ { "id": "fUWM1At1TUx", "name": "User account expiry alert", "type": "ACCOUNT_EXPIRY_ALERT", "cronExpression": "0 0 2 ? * *", "nextExecutionTime": "2023-03-15T02:00:00.000", "status": "SCHEDULED" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Organization Units by Programs DESCRIPTION: API response format for retrieving associations between programs and organization units. Maps program IDs to arrays of organization unit UIDs. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_69 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "": [ "", "" ], "": [ "", "" ], "": [] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring a JMS Target for DHIS2 Event Hooks DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration for sending event hook messages to an Apache Artemis JMS instance, supporting asynchronous event handling with optional queue functionality. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/event-hooks.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "type": "jms", "brokerUrl": "tcp://localhost:61616", "useQueue": false, "username": "guest", "password": "guest" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Minimal Data Value Follow-up JSON Request in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Minimal JSON payload example for marking a data value for follow-up in DHIS2. This shows only the required fields: data element, period, organization unit, and the follow-up flag set to false to remove the mark. connection limits, buffer sizes, and memory allocation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/post-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: ini CODE: ``` pg_max_connections: 400 pg_shared_buffers: 8GB pg_work_mem: 20MB pg_maintenance_work_mem: 3GB pg_effective_cache_size: 10GB ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Single Data Element with datimutils in R DESCRIPTION: Shows how to fetch a specific data element by ID with selected fields using the getDataElements function. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/dhis2-and-r-integration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: r CODE: ``` datimutils::getDataElements("hCVSHjcml9g",fields = "name,shortName,id") name shortName id 1 Albendazole given at ANC (2nd trimester) Albendazole at ANC hCVSHjcml9g ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Redis Server on Ubuntu DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to install Redis server on Ubuntu using the APT package manager. It includes adding the Redis Labs repository, updating packages, installing Redis, and ensuring the service is enabled and running. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/how-to/installing_redis.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo add-apt-repository ppa:redislabs/redis ``` LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo apt update ``` LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo apt install redis-server ``` LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo systemctl enable redis-server sudo systemctl start redis-server ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating an External Aggregate Data Exchange with PAT Authentication in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This JSON payload demonstrates how to create an external aggregate data exchange using Personal Access Token (PAT) authentication. It pushes data to an external DHIS2 instance using the 'code' ID scheme. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-exchange.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "External data exchange with PAT authentication", "source": { "requests": [ { "name": "ANC", "dx": [ "fbfJHSPpUQD", "cYeuwXTCPkU", "Jtf34kNZhzP" ], "pe": [ "LAST_12_MONTHS", "202201" ], "ou": [ "ImspTQPwCqd" ], "inputIdScheme": "UID", "outputIdScheme": "CODE" } ] }, "target": { "type": "EXTERNAL", "api": { "url": "https://play.dhis2.org/2.38.2.1", "accessToken": "d2pat_XIrqgAGjW935LLPuSP2hXSZwpTxTW2pg3580716988" }, "request": { "idScheme": "CODE" } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Data Value Sets in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Basic GET request to retrieve data value sets from the DHIS2 API. This endpoint allows fetching data values in XML, JSON, CSV, and ADX formats. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_18 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/dataValueSets ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a Route with OAuth2 Client Credentials Flow DESCRIPTION: JSON request for creating a route with OAuth2 Client Credentials flow authentication. DHIS2 will obtain an access token from the specified token URI and add it to requests. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/route.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "Postman Echo", "code": "postman-get", "disabled": false, "url": "https://postman-echo.com/get", "auth": { "type": "oauth2-client-credentials", "clientId": "alice", "clientSecret": "passw0rd", "tokenUri": "https://token-service/token" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Data Quality and Surveillance Tasks via DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: HTTP endpoint to trigger the monitoring task for data quality and surveillance in DHIS2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/maintenance.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: HTTP CODE: ``` /api/33/resourceTables/monitoring ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Response for Nested Fields Query DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response when extracting nested properties from entries using bracket or parenthesis notation in the fields parameter. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ { "key": "key1", "name": "name1", "root": {"child1": 1, "child2": []}}, { "key": "key2", "name": "name2", "root": {"child1": 2, "child2": []}} ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Event Count and Extent Analytics in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example of querying the /analytics/events/count endpoint for retrieving the count and extent (bounding box) of events for a specific query. This query specifies program, date range, and organisation unit. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_34 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/analytics/events/count/eBAyeGv0exc?startDate=2016-01-01 &endDate=2016-10-31&dimension=ou:O6uvpzGd5pu ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Analytics Execution Plan in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Example GET request to the analytics/explain endpoint for retrieving query execution plan and performance metrics. The request includes dimensions, filters, and various display options. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_70 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/analytics/explain?displayProperty=NAME &dimension=dx:Uvn6LCg7dVU;sB79w2hiLp8,ou:USER_ORGUNIT &filter=pe:THIS_YEAR&includeNumDen=false&skipMeta=false &skipData=true&includeMetadataDetails=true ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Searching for Jobs with Errors in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This endpoint allows searching for jobs with errors based on various criteria such as user, time range, error codes, object IDs, and job types. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/jobConfigurations/errors ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a Tracker Working List in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: JSON payload for creating a tracker working list, including program details, query criteria, and various filtering options such as event status, dates, enrollment status, and attribute filters. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_52 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "Test WL", "description": "Test WL definition", "program": { "id": "uy2gU8kT1jF" }, "programStage": { "id": "oRySG82BKE6" }, "programStageQueryCriteria": { "eventStatus": "VISITED", "eventCreatedAt": { "type": "ABSOLUTE", "startDate": "2020-03-01", "endDate": "2022-12-30" }, "eventScheduledAt": { "type": "RELATIVE", "period": "TODAY" }, "enrollmentStatus": "COMPLETED", "followUp": true, "enrolledAt": { "type": "RELATIVE", "period": "THIS_MONTH" }, "enrollmentOccurredAt": { "type": "RELATIVE", "period": "THIS_MONTH" }, "orgUnit": "Rp268JB6Ne4", "ouMode": "SELECTED", "assignedUserMode": "PROVIDED", "assignedUsers": [ "DXyJmlo9rge" ], "order": "w75KJ2mc4zz:asc", "displayColumnOrder": [ "w75KJ2mc4zz", "zDhUuAYrxNC" ], "dataFilters": [ { "dataItem": "GXNUsigphqK", "ge": "10", "le": "20" } ], "attributeValueFilters": [ { "attribute": "ruQQnf6rswq", "eq": "15" } ] } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Complete Translation Request Payload in JSON DESCRIPTION: This example shows the complete JSON payload structure for updating translations of an object. The payload contains a translations array with a single translation entry, which would be sent to the translations endpoint via a PUT request. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "translations": [ { "property": "NAME", "locale": "fr", "value": "Paralysie Flasque Aiguë (Décès <5 ans)" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Generating Resource Tables via DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: HTTP POST or PUT request to generate resource tables used for analysis functions in DHIS2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/maintenance.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: HTTP CODE: ``` /api/33/resourceTables ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Complex Normal Distribution Calculation in DHIS2 Expressions DESCRIPTION: Shows calculating the probability density function for a median value using statistics from a different data element in DHIS2 predictor expressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_45 LANGUAGE: Expression Language CODE: ``` normDistDen( median(#{T7OyqQpUpNd}), avg(#{IKahz1Quie3}), stddev(#{IKahz1Quie3}) ) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring DHIS2 System Settings in dhis.conf DESCRIPTION: Configuration options for DHIS2 including system update notifications, logging settings, App Hub URLs, session limitations, metadata model constraints, and route API settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_51 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` # System update notifications, such as new DHIS 2 releases becoming available system.update_notifications_enabled = on # Max size for log files, default is 100MB logging.file.max_size = 200MB # Max number of rolling log archive files, default is 0 logging.file.max_archives = 1 # DHIS 2 log level (level can be TRACE, DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR) logging.level.org.hisp.dhis = INFO # Spring log level (refers to Java class package names) logging.level.org.springframework = INFO # Base URL to the DHIS2 App Hub service apphub.base.url = https://apps.dhis2.org # Base API URL to the DHIS2 App Hub service, used for app updates apphub.api.url = https://apps.dhis2.org/api # Number of possible concurrent sessions across different clients per user max.sessions.per_user = 10 # The maximum number of category options in a single category metadata.categories.max_options = 31 # The maximum number of categories per category combo metadata.categories.max_per_combo = 5 # The maximum for the product of the number of options of the categories in a category combo # Must always be >= metadata.categories.max_options metadata.categories.max_combinations = 500 # Remote servers allowed to call from the route endpoint. Default is any HTTPS URL. Wildcards are allowed. # e.g. route.remote_servers_allowed = https://server1.com/,https://server2.com/,https://192.168.*.* route.remote_servers_allowed = https://* ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Indicators in CSV Format DESCRIPTION: Example CSV file format for importing indicators into DHIS2. The first row contains headers and is ignored during import. The file includes essential fields like name, UID, code, descriptions, and calculation formulas. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_89 LANGUAGE: csv CODE: ``` Name,UID,Code,Description,shortName,denominator,denominatorDescription,numerator,numeratorDescription,annualized,decimals,indicatorType Indicator A,yiAKjiZVoOU,CodeA,Indicator A description,Indicator A shortname,#{fbfJHSPpUQD},denominatorDescription,#{h0xKKjijTdI},numeratorDescription,false,2,sqGRzCziswD Indicator B,Uvn6LCg7dVU,CodeB,Indicator B description,Indicator B shortname,#{fbfJHSPpUQD},denominatorDescription,#{h0xKKjijTdI},numeratorDescription,false,2,sqGRzCziswD ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a Dependent SQL View in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: SQL query that references another SQL view to determine if there are more than 100 data elements. It uses the _view_ prefix to access the previously created Data Element Count view. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_57 LANGUAGE: sql CODE: ``` select case when count > 100 then 1 else 0 end as result from _view_data_element_count; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Requesting Usage Analytics in JSON Format DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to request usage analytics data in the default JSON format. The request includes startDate, endDate, and interval parameters to specify the time period and aggregation level. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_57 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dataStatistics?startDate=2016-02-01&endDate=2016-02-14&interval=WEEK ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Available Job Types in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the JSON response structure when querying available job types in the DHIS2 API. It includes information about job names, types, keys, and scheduling types. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "jobTypes": [ { "name": "Data integrity", "jobType": "DATA_INTEGRITY", "key": "dataIntegrityJob", "schedulingType": "CRON" }, { "name": "Resource table", "jobType": "RESOURCE_TABLE", "key": "resourceTableJob", "schedulingType": "CRON" }, { "name": "Continuous analytics table", "jobType": "CONTINUOUS_ANALYTICS_TABLE", "key": "continuousAnalyticsTableJob", "schedulingType": "FIXED_DELAY" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Nginx Load Balancer for DHIS2 Cluster DESCRIPTION: Nginx configuration for load balancing across DHIS2 cluster instances, including upstream server definitions and proxy settings with sticky sessions enabled. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/how-to/tomcat-clustering.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` http { # Upstream element with sticky sessions upstream dhis_cluster { ip_hash; server 193.157.199.131:8080; server 193.157.199.132:8080; } # Proxy pass to backend servers in cluster server { listen 80; location / { proxy_pass http://dhis_cluster/; } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: XML Response for Data Value Set DESCRIPTION: Example XML response from DHIS2 when retrieving a data value set. It includes the data set, period, organization unit, and individual data values with their respective elements and attributes. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_21 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Personal Access Token Response Format DESCRIPTION: JSON response format when creating a Personal Access Token, containing the token key and related metadata. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/overview.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Created", "httpStatusCode": 201, "status": "OK", "response": { "responseType": "ApiTokenCreationResponse", "key": "d2pat_5xVA12xyUbWNedQxy4ohH77WlxRGVvZZ1151814092", "uid": "jJYrtIVP7qU", "klass": "org.hisp.dhis.security.apikey.ApiToken", "errorReports": [] } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Getting Minimum Value Using d2:minValue Function DESCRIPTION: This example shows how to get the minimum value of a specific data element (blood-pressure) across the entire enrollment using the d2:minValue function. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_50 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2:minValue( 'blood-pressure' ) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a Visualization using POST request in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This JSON payload example demonstrates how to create a new visualization through a POST request to the /api/visualizations endpoint. It includes various configuration options such as dimensions, filters, display settings, and access controls. ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting DHIS2 Instance DESCRIPTION: Start the DHIS2 instance using the Tomcat startup script. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_24 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo -u dhis /home/dhis/tomcat-dhis/bin/startup.sh ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Message for Multiple Users in XML DESCRIPTION: XML payload format for sending a message to multiple users in DHIS2. This structure includes subject, text content, and a list of user IDs to receive the message. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` This is the subject This is the text ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sending Program Messages with JSON Payload in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example JSON payload for sending program messages in DHIS2. The payload specifies recipients (tracked entity, organization unit, phone numbers, email addresses), message content, delivery channels, and related program elements. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_58 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "programMessages": [{ "recipients": { "trackedEntity": { "id": "UN810PwyVYO" }, "organisationUnit": { "id": "Rp268JB6Ne4" }, "phoneNumbers": [ "55512345", "55545678" ], "emailAddresses": [ "johndoe@mail.com", "markdoe@mail.com" ] }, "enrollment": { "id": "f3rg8gFag8j" }, "event": { "id": "pSllsjpfLH2" }, "deliveryChannels": [ "SMS", "EMAIL" ], "notificationTemplate": "Zp268JB6Ne5", "subject": "Outbreak alert", "text": "An outbreak has been detected", "storeCopy": false }] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Counting Specific Previous Pregnancy Outcomes Using d2:countIfValue Function DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to count the number of previous pregnancies that ended with a specific outcome (Abortion) using the d2:countIfValue function. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_41 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2:countIfValue('previousPregnancyOutcome','Abortion') ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example Data Value Set in XML for Mortality Data DESCRIPTION: A practical example of a data value set in XML format for the 'Mortality < 5 years' data set. Contains actual identifiers and values for measles, dysentery, and cholera cases in Ngelehun CHC. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: DHIS2 Validation Error Response for Type Mismatch DESCRIPTION: Sample error response showing validation failure due to mismatched value types when attempting to merge data elements. The response highlights that source value types must match the target value type. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_57 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Conflict", "httpStatusCode": 409, "status": "WARNING", "message": "One or more errors occurred, please see full details in merge report.", "response": { "mergeReport": { "mergeErrors": [ { "message": "All source ValueTypes must match target ValueType: `TEXT`. Other ValueTypes found: `NUMBER`", "errorCode": "E1550", "args": [] } ], "mergeType": "DataElement", "sourcesDeleted": [], "message": "DataElement merge has errors" } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Self-Registered Users in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: API endpoint for retrieving all user accounts that were initially self-registered. Uses the 'selfRegistered' query parameter with a value of 'true'. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` /api/users?selfRegistered=true ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Merging Category Options API Request in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the JSON payload structure for merging category options. It specifies the source category options to be merged, the target category option, and whether to delete the sources after merging. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_46 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "sources": [ "FbLZS3ueWbQ", "dPSWsKeAZNw" ], "target": "rEq3Hkd3XXH", "deleteSources": true } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Time Field Filtering in DHIS2 Events Query DESCRIPTION: Examples of using the timeField parameter to filter events based on last updated or scheduled date instead of the default event date. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_27 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` &timeField=LAST_UPDATED ``` LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` &timeField=SCHEDULED_DATE ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Default Audit Settings in dhis.conf DESCRIPTION: Default configuration for the DHIS2 audit system in the dhis.conf file. This setup enables CREATE, UPDATE, and DELETE auditing for METADATA, TRACKER, and AGGREGATE scopes. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/concepts/audit.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` audit.metadata = CREATE;UPDATE;DELETE audit.tracker = CREATE;UPDATE;DELETE audit.aggregate = CREATE;UPDATE;DELETE ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Custom Attributes in DHIS2 Gist API DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to include custom attribute values in a Gist API response. It shows a data element with id, name, and a custom attribute 'unit-of-measure', illustrating how to rename and include specific attributes. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata-gist.md#2025-04-22_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "qrur9Dvnyt5", "name": "Age in years", "unit-of-measure": "years" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: User Registration Request in DHIS2 API (JSON) DESCRIPTION: Example of a POST request for user self-registration. Includes user details and reCAPTCHA response. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_22 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "username": "testSelfReg", "firstName": "test", "surname": "selfReg", "password": "P@ssword123", "email": "test@test.com", "phoneNumber": "12345oooo", "g-recaptcha-response": "recap response" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining DHIS2 Log File Locations DESCRIPTION: Specifies the locations of various DHIS2 log files under the DHIS2_HOME directory, including the main log and specific background process logs. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/logging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` /logs/dhis.log /logs/dhis-analytics-table.log /logs/dhis-data-exchange.log /logs/dhis-data-sync.log ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Icon Information Response Example in JSON DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response when fetching information about an icon through the DHIS2 API. The response includes the icon's key, description, keywords, creation timestamp, last update timestamp, and a direct URL to the icon SVG file. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_40 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { key: "mosquito_outline", description: "Mosquito outline", keywords: [ "malaria", "mosquito", "dengue" ], "created": "2024-02-12T09:50:11.794", "lastUpdated": "2024-02-12T09:50:11.794", href: "/api/icons/mosquito_outline/icon.svg" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Ordering Analytics API Results DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use the order parameter to sort the analytics data in descending order of values. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: url CODE: ``` /api/analytics?dimension=dx:fbfJHSPpUQD&dimension=pe:LAST_12_MONTHS&dimension=ou:O6uvpzGd5pu&order=DESC ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sending individual data values as JSON payload in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example of sending a data value using JSON payload format to the DHIS2 API. This demonstrates how to specify dataElement, categoryOptionCombo, period, orgUnit, value, and comment in the payload. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_27 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "dataElement": "fbfJHSPpUQD", "categoryOptionCombo": "PT59n8BQbqM", "period": "202201", "orgUnit": "DiszpKrYNg8", "value": "10", "comment": "OK" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Clickatell Gateway in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration for the Clickatell SMS gateway. Includes the gateway type, name, username, authentication token, and URL template for API requests. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/sms.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "type" : "clickatell", "name" : "clickatell", "username": "clickatelluser", "authToken": "XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX", "urlTemplate": "https://platform.clickatell.com/messages" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating a DHIS2 Job Configuration DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the JSON structure for updating an existing job configuration in DHIS2. It includes modifications to the job name, enabled status, cron expression, and job parameters. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "analytics last two years", "enabled": true, "cronExpression": "0 0 3 ? * MON", "jobType": "ANALYTICS_TABLE", "jobParameters": { "lastYears": "3", "skipTableTypes": [], "skipResourceTables": false } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Specifying Data Element Dimension with Offset in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Examples showing how to reference data elements in repeatable events using offset notation to target specific event repetitions based on chronological order. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_48 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` IpHINAT79UW.ZzYYXq4fJie.GQY2lXrypjO -- refers to the last repetition IpHINAT79UW.ZzYYXq4fJie[-1].GQY2lXrypjO -- refers to the second last repetition IpHINAT79UW.ZzYYXq4fJie[2].GQY2lXrypjO -- refers to the second repetition ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Tracked Entity Audits for a Specific Entity DESCRIPTION: Example API request for retrieving audit logs for a specific tracked entity identified by its UID. Shows targeted audit retrieval for a single entity. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/audit.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/33/audits/trackedEntity.json?trackedEntities=wNiQ2coVZ39 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Aggregate Data Value Audits by Data Element and Organization Unit DESCRIPTION: Example API request for retrieving audits for a specific data element, organization unit, and category option combination. Shows how to combine multiple filters for precise audit retrieval. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/audit.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/33/audits/dataValue?de=BOSZApCrBni&ou=DiszpKrYNg8&co=TkDhg29x18A ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: OAuth2 Token Response Format DESCRIPTION: JSON response format for OAuth2 token requests containing access token and refresh token details. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/overview.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "expires_in": 43175, "scope": "ALL", "access_token": "07fc551c-806c-41a4-9a8c-10658bd15435", "refresh_token": "a4e4de45-4743-481d-9345-2cfe34732fcc", "token_type": "bearer" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring a Webhook Target with HTTP Basic Authentication DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration for a webhook target that uses HTTP Basic authentication to send event data to a specified URL. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/event-hooks.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "type": "webhook", "url": "http://localhost:3000/api/gateway", "auth": { "type": "http-basic", "username": "admin", "password": "admin" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Events CSV Response in DHIS2 Tracker API DESCRIPTION: Example CSV response when retrieving events from the DHIS2 Tracker API. Requires administrator credentials and the specific version name to sync. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_102 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -u admin:district "https://play.dhis2.org/dev/api/metadata/sync?versionName=Version_6" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Stopping DHIS2 Instance DESCRIPTION: Stop the DHIS2 instance using the Tomcat shutdown script. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_26 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo -u dhis /home/dhis/tomcat-dhis/bin/shutdown.sh ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving File Resource Metadata DESCRIPTION: Example of retrieving metadata for a specific file resource. This request returns the file resource object containing metadata like name, content type, and storage status without downloading the actual file content. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_94 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "https://server/api/fileResources/xm4JwRwke0i" -H "Accept: application/json" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sending System Email Notification via cURL DESCRIPTION: cURL command to send a system email notification by posting JSON data to the DHIS2 API endpoint. Requires authentication and proper content-type headers. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/email.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -d @email.json "localhost/api/33/email/notification" -X POST -H "Content-Type:application/json" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Calculating Pregnancy Due Date Using d2:addDays Function DESCRIPTION: This example shows how to calculate the pregnancy due date by adding 283 days to the last menstrual period date using the d2:addDays function. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_38 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2:addDays(#{lastMenstrualDate},'283') ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring DHIS 2 for Okta OIDC Authentication DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows the necessary configuration properties to be added to the dhis.conf file for enabling OIDC authentication with Okta in DHIS 2. It includes settings for client ID, client secret, and various OIDC endpoints. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/configure-oidc-with-okta.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` # Enable OIDC oidc.oauth2.login.enabled = on # Okta OIDC settings oidc.provider.okta.client_id = {client_id} oidc.provider.okta.client_secret = {client_secret} oidc.provider.okta.mapping_claim = email oidc.provider.okta.display_alias = Sign in with Okta oidc.provider.okta.enable_logout = on oidc.provider.okta.scopes = email oidc.provider.okta.authorization_uri = https://{client_domain}/oauth2/v1/authorize oidc.provider.okta.token_uri = https://{client_domain}/oauth2/v1/token oidc.provider.okta.user_info_uri = https://{client_domain}/oauth2/v1/userinfo oidc.provider.okta.jwk_uri = https://{client_domain}/oauth2/v1/keys oidc.provider.okta.end_session_endpoint = https://{client_domain}/oauth2/v1/logout ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Program Stage Notification Message Template Example in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: An example of a program stage notification message template in DHIS2 that includes parameter placeholders to personalize appointment reminders. The template addresses the tracked entity instance by name and includes their scheduled appointment date. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` Dear A{w75KJ2mc4zz}, please come to your appointment the V{due_date}. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Message in JSON Format DESCRIPTION: JSON payload example for sending a message to multiple recipients including individual users, a user group, and an organisation unit in DHIS2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "subject": "Hey", "text": "How are you?", "users": [ { "id": "OYLGMiazHtW" }, { "id": "N3PZBUlN8vq" } ], "userGroups": [ { "id": "ZoHNWQajIoe" } ], "organisationUnits": [ { "id": "DiszpKrYNg8" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Constant in JSON Format DESCRIPTION: Example JSON payload for creating a new constant with name and value properties in DHIS2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_20 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "PI", "value": "3.14159265359" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Data Validation Summary for a Data Set in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Makes a GET request to retrieve validation summary for a specific data set, period and organization unit. This endpoint is optimized for data entry clients validating a form. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/33/validation/dataSet/QX4ZTUbOt3a.json?pe=201501&ou=DiszpKrYNg8 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering Metadata Change Proposals by Status in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Examples of filtering metadata change proposals by their status, either showing only accepted proposals or only open proposals. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_112 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/metadata/proposals?filter=status:eq:ACCEPTED ``` LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/metadata/proposals?filter=status:eq:PROPOSED ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Synchronization Endpoint for Metadata Pull in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: API endpoint for initiating metadata pull from a remote JSON document. The request requires a POST method with a URL as the request payload. The URL must match against servers allowed in the dhis.conf configuration file. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/synchronization.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/33/synchronization/metadataPull ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Bulk Data Approval Payload in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: This JSON payload structure is used for bulk approval, unapproval, acceptance, or unacceptance of data records. It specifies workflows, periods, and a list of organisation units with attribute option combinations. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-approval.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "wf": [ "pBOMPrpg1QX", "lyLU2wR22tC" ], "pe": [ "201601", "201602" ], "approvals": [ { "ou": "cDw53Ej8rju", "aoc": "ranftQIH5M9" }, { "ou": "cDw53Ej8rju", "aoc": "fC3z1lcAW5x" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving DHIS2 Metadata with R DESCRIPTION: R script that creates functions for authentication and retrieving data element metadata from DHIS2 via the Web API, returning results as a data frame. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/dhis2-and-r-integration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: r CODE: ``` #Get the list of data elements. Turn off paging and only get a few attributes. require(httr) username<-"admin" password<-"district" base.url<-"https://play.dhis2.org/dev/" login<-function(username,password,base.url) { url<-paste0(base.url,"api/me") r<-GET(url,authenticate(username,password)) if(r$status == 200L) { print("Logged in successfully!")} else {stop("Could not login")} } getDataElements<-function(base.url) { url<-paste0(base.url,"api/dataElements?fields=id,name,shortName") r<-content(GET(url,authenticate(username,password)),as="parsed") do.call(rbind.data.frame,r$dataElements) } login(username,password,base.url) data_elements<-getDataElements(base.url) head(data_elements) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Synchronization Endpoint for Data Value Push in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: API endpoint for initiating a data value push to a remote DHIS2 server. Before using this endpoint, the URL and credentials for the remote server must be configured in System settings > Synchronization. Requires a POST request. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/synchronization.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/33/synchronization/dataPush ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Tracked Entities using TE Query Analytics Endpoint in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the basic structure of a tracked entity query analytics request. This endpoint allows querying for tracked entities with dimension and filter parameters. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_44 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/41/analytics/trackedEntities/query/?dimension=ou:;& dimension=&dimension=:: ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Proportional Target Calculation in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Calculates a proportional target for the current period based on an annual target, distributing the target evenly across periods. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_25 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` #{b} * [periodInYear] / [yearlyPeriodCount] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Completed Jobs Overview in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This endpoint provides an overview of completed jobs, showing the most recent execution state for each job type. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/scheduling/completed ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Analytics Execution Plan Response in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: JSON response from the analytics/explain endpoint, containing headers, metadata, and performance metrics. DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to retrieve multiple specific system settings by repeating the key query parameter in the request URL. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/settings-and-configuration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "play.dhis2.org/demo/api/33/systemSettings?key=keyApplicationNotification&key=keyApplicationIntro" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Data Element with Translation Array Filtered on User Locale Example in JSON DESCRIPTION: This example shows a data element JSON representation with the translations array filtered to show only translations for the current user's locale. The example includes the object identifier, display name, and relevant translations for French locale. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "FTRrcoaog83", "displayName": "Accute French", "translations": [ { "property": "SHORT_NAME", "locale": "fr", "value": "Accute French" }, { "property": "NAME", "locale": "fr", "value": "Accute French" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Generic OIDC Provider Configuration for DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Configuration example for generic OIDC providers using HelseID as an example, including all required and optional settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_24 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` # Enables OIDC login oidc.oauth2.login.enabled = on # Required variables: oidc.provider.helseid.client_id = CLIENT_ID oidc.provider.helseid.client_secret = CLIENT_SECRET oidc.provider.helseid.mapping_claim = helseid://claims/identity/email oidc.provider.helseid.authorization_uri = https://helseid.no/connect/authorize oidc.provider.helseid.token_uri = https://helseid.no/connect/token oidc.provider.helseid.user_info_uri = https://helseid.no/connect/userinfo oidc.provider.helseid.jwk_uri = https://helseid.no/.well-known/openid-configuration/jwks oidc.provider.helseid.end_session_endpoint = https://helseid.no/connect/endsession oidc.provider.helseid.scopes = helseid://scopes/identity/email # [Optional] Authorized redirect URI, the as set in Azure portal # If your public hostname is different from what the server sees internally, # you need to provide your full public url, like the example below. oidc.provider.helseid.redirect_url = https://mydhis2-server.org/oauth2/code/helseid # [Optional], defaults to 'on' oidc.provider.helseid.enable_logout = on # [Optional] Where to redirect after logging out. # If your public hostname is different from what the server sees internally, # you need to provide your full public URL, like the example below. oidc.logout.redirect_url = https://mydhis2-server.org # [Optional] PKCE support, see: https://oauth.net/2/pkce/), default is 'false' oidc.provider.helseid.enable_pkce = on # [Optional] Extra variables appended to the request. # Must be key/value pairs like: "KEY1 VALUE1,KEY2 VALUE2,..." oidc.provider.helseid.extra_request_parameters = acr_values lvl4,other_key value2 # [Optional] This is the alias/name displayed on the login button in the DHIS2 login page oidc.provider.helseid.display_alias = HelseID # [Optional] Link to an url for a logo. (Can use absolute or relative URLs) oidc.provider.helseid.logo_image = ../security/btn_helseid.svg # [Optional] CSS padding for the logo image oidc.provider.helseid.logo_image_padding = 0px 1px ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Merging Organization Units Request DESCRIPTION: JSON payload format for merging multiple source organization units into a target unit. Includes merge strategy options for data values and approvals. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_71 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "sources": [ "jNb63DIHuwU", "WAjjFMDJKcx" ], "target": "V9rfpjwHbYg", "dataValueMergeStrategy": "LAST_UPDATED", "dataApprovalMergeStrategy": "LAST_UPDATED", "deleteSources": true } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Upgrading DHIS2 Process Table DESCRIPTION: Markdown table outlining the step-by-step process for upgrading DHIS2, including tasks, descriptions, and status tracking. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/concepts/Upgrade-Guide.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Step | Task | Description | Status | |---|-----|--------|---| | 1 | Getting Started | Identification of all national systems and critical custom applications, versions for the different instances:

- Custom applications
- Software versions (Java, Tomcat, DHIS2, PostgreSQL, nginx/apache2 proxy, etc.)
- Resources - Test server availability.
- Scope - Does it include OS and the database? | Pending
- Ongoing
- Completed | | 2 | Backup Current System | Identify backup environment and required specifications. Perform backups for at least the following:

- DHIS2 database
- Configuration files
- Custom apps
- External integrations

Backup documentation
- Note the time taken for backup dumps | - Pending
- Ongoing
- Completed | | 3 | Review DHIS2 Release Notes | Review the release notes of the new version to understand:

- New features
- Fixes
- Potential breaking changes | | | 4 | Set Up Staging Environment | Replicate the production setup in a environment. Create test cases and test the environment on the staging setup:

- Keep versions as they are on prod
- Restore the prod database; note the restore time
- Ensure staging works as expected | | | 5 | Test Upgrade on Staging | Execute the upgrade on the staging environment to identify and address any issues or conflicts before implementing in production:

- Involve users during testing
- Perform metadata cleanup using the tool [here](https://github.com/dhis2/metadata-assessment)
- Implement test cases created
- Validate applications and functionalities
- Resolve identified issues | | | 6 | Notify Stakeholders | Inform all DHIS2 users about the planned upgrade and expected downtime to ensure preparedness. | | | 7 | Create Roll-back Plan | Backup the DHIS2 instance (both application and database) as a rollback strategy in case of any issues during the upgrade. | | | 8 | Upgrade Production | Once satisfied with the staging tests, apply the upgrade to the production system. | | | 9 | Post-Upgrade Testing | Test the main functions in the production environment to ensure everything works correctly. | | | 10 | Monitor System | Continuously monitor system performance and logs to catch any unexpected issues early. | | | 11 | Document Process | Document the upgrade process, challenges faced, solutions used, and lessons learned for future reference. | | | 12 | Gather User Feedback | Collect feedback from DHIS2 users on the performance and features of the new version, as well as any potential issues they face post-upgrade. | | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Reloading DHIS2 Apps via cURL DESCRIPTION: Forces a reload of all installed apps using PUT request. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/apps.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -X PUT -u user:pass "http://server.com/api/33/apps" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Tomcat Instance for DHIS2 in Bash DESCRIPTION: Commands to create a new Tomcat instance for DHIS2 and set appropriate ownership. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_16 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo tomcat8-instance-create /home/dhis/tomcat-dhis sudo chown -R dhis:dhis /home/dhis/tomcat-dhis/ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Aggregation Operators for Data Elements in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This snippet provides a table of aggregation operators that can be applied to data elements in DHIS2. It includes descriptions for each operator, helping users understand how data will be aggregated across different dimensions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Aggregation operator | Description | |---|---| | Average | Average the values in both the period as and the organisation unit dimensions. | | Average (sum in organisation unit hierarchy) | Average of data values in the period dimension, sum in the organisation unit dimensions. | | Count | Count of data values. | | Min | Minimum of data values. | | Max | Maximum of data values. | | None | No aggregation is performed in any dimension. | | Sum | Sum of data values in the period and organisation unit dimension. | | Standard deviation | Standard deviation (population-based) of data values. | | Variance | Variance (population-based) of data values. | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Tracked Entity Instance Variable in Message Template DESCRIPTION: Example of a message template that includes a tracked entity instance parameter. This demonstrates how to incorporate variables in notification messages sent to program participants. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` Dear A{w75KJ2mc4zz}, You're now enrolled in V{program_name}. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Resource Table Analytics Hook - JSON DESCRIPTION: Example of creating an analytics table hook that runs after resource tables are populated. The hook updates the 'Area' field in the organization unit group set structure table. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_64 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "Update 'Area' in org unit group set resource table", "phase": "RESOURCE_TABLE_POPULATED", "resourceTableType": "ORG_UNIT_GROUP_SET_STRUCTURE", "sql": "update _organisationunitgroupsetstructure_temp set \"uIuxlbV1vRT\" = 'b0EsAxm8Nge'" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: POST Request to Create Constant DESCRIPTION: cURL command example for creating a new constant by sending a POST request with JSON payload to the DHIS2 API. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_22 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -d @constant.json "http://server/api/constants" -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -u user:password ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Queueable Jobs for Specific Queue in DHIS2 Scheduler API DESCRIPTION: This endpoint retrieves a list of job configurations that can be added to a specific queue. It excludes jobs already part of the named queue. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_26 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/scheduler/queueable?name={queue} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Data Integrity Summary Response in JSON DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates the JSON response format for a data integrity summary. It includes information about each check performed, such as name, display name, start and finish times, section, severity, description, count of issues, and percentage affected. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_16 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "": { "name": "", "displayName": "", "startTime": "2023-01-11T06:12:56.436", "finishedTime": "2023-01-11T06:12:57.021", "section": "...", "severity": "WARNING", "description": "...", "count": 12, "percentage": 2.3 }, "": { "name": "", "displayName": "", "startTime": "2023-01-11T06:12:57.345", "finishedTime": "2023-01-11T06:12:58.007", "section": "...", "severity": "WARNING", "description": "...", "count": 4, "percentage": 5.1 } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Organisation Unit Profile with POST Request in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: API endpoint for creating an organisation unit profile using a POST request. The F_ORG_UNIT_PROFILE_ADD authority is required to perform this action. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/organisation-unit-profile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` POST /api/organisationUnitProfile ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Delete User Data Store Namespace DESCRIPTION: Deletes an entire namespace and all its keys from the user data store using DELETE request. Requires authentication. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_24 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -X DELETE -u admin:district "play.dhis2.org/api/33/userDataStore/foo" ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus":"OK", "httpStatusCode":200, "status":"OK", "message":"All keys from namespace 'foo' deleted." } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering Data Elements by ID in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to filter data elements by their ID property using the 'eq' operator. This example retrieves data elements with IDs 'ID1' or 'ID2'. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dataElements?filter=id:eq:ID1&filter=id:eq:ID2 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Relationship Structure in JSON for DHIS2 Tracker API DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates the structure of a Relationship object in the DHIS2 Tracker API. It shows how to define the 'from' and 'to' properties, which represent links to other tracker objects like events or tracked entities. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "from": { "event": { "event": "ABCDEF12345" } }, "to": { "trackedEntity": { "trackedEntity": "FEDCBA12345" } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sending XML Data Values with cURL DESCRIPTION: Command-line example using cURL to send XML data values to DHIS2. Specifies content type as application/xml and uses basic authentication. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -d @datavalueset.xml "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/dataValueSets" -H "Content-Type:application/xml" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Error Response for Indicator Type Merge DESCRIPTION: Example of an error response when merging indicator types fails, showing validation errors with specific error codes and messages. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_67 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Conflict", "httpStatusCode": 409, "status": "WARNING", "message": "One or more errors occurred, please see full details in merge report.", "response": { "mergeReport": { "mergeErrors": [ { "message": "At least one source IndicatorType must be specified", "errorCode": "E1530", "args": [] }, { "message": "Target IndicatorType does not exist: `abcdefg1221`", "errorCode": "E1533", "args": [ "Target", "abcdefg1221" ] } ], "mergeType": "IndicatorType", "sourcesDeleted": [], "message": "IndicatorType merge has errors" } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a Basic DHIS2 Job Configuration DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates the JSON structure for creating a basic job configuration in DHIS2 without any parameters. It includes the job name, type, and cron expression. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "", "jobType": "JOBTYPE", "cronExpression": "0 * * ? * *" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Blocking Android App Versions with nginx User-Agent Filtering DESCRIPTION: This nginx configuration demonstrates how to block specific DHIS2 Android app versions based on User-Agent strings. It shows examples for blocking both newer versions that haven't been tested and older versions running on outdated Android API levels. The configuration uses regular expressions to match specific patterns in the User-Agent header. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_49 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` http { server { listen 80; server_name api.somedomain.com; # Block the latest Android App as it has not been tested if ( $http_user_agent ~ 'com\.dhis2/1\.2\.1/2\.2\.1/' ) { return 403; } # Block Android 4.4 (API is 19) as all users should have received new tablets if ( $http_user_agent ~ 'com\.dhis2/.*/.*/Android_19' ) { return 403; } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a Route with API Token Authentication and Static Headers DESCRIPTION: JSON request for creating a route with API Token Authentication. This example also includes static headers that will be included in every request sent to the target URL. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/route.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "Postman Echo", "code": "postman-get", "disabled": false, "url": "https://postman-echo.com/get", "headers": { "a": "1", "b": "2", "c": "3" }, "auth": { "type": "api-token", "token": "74478F79-7B85-424A-9C93-8A6F924AA9F9" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Keyboard Shortcuts in DHIS2 Data Entry App DESCRIPTION: Keyboard shortcuts for navigating between cells in the data entry form. Includes shortcuts for moving forward and backward between cells, and opening the data details sidebar. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/using-the-aggregate-data-entry-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` - to move on to the next cell, press ++tab++ or ++arrow-down++. - to go back to the previous cell, press ++shift+tab++ or ++arrow-up++. - Use the ++ctrl+enter++ or ++cmd+enter++ keyboard shortcut to open data details sidebar ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving DHIS2 System Information via Web API DESCRIPTION: HTTP GET request to retrieve system information including context path, user agent, calendar, date format, server details, and more. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/maintenance.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: HTTP CODE: ``` /api/33/system/info ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Data Integrity Check Error Response in JSON DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the JSON response format when a data integrity check fails due to an error. It includes the check name, display name, finish time, section, severity, description, and an error message explaining what went wrong. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_17 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "": { "name": "", "displayName": "", "finishedTime": "2022-02-15 14:55", "section": "...", "severity": "WARNING", "description": "...", "error": "what has happened", "issues": [] } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Handling Error Responses from DHIS2 Analytics Outlier Detection API DESCRIPTION: This JSON snippet shows the structure of an error response from the DHIS2 Analytics Outlier Detection API. It includes the HTTP status, error code, and a descriptive message about the error encountered. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_69 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Conflict", "httpStatusCode": 409, "status": "ERROR", "message": "Start date and end date or relative period must be specified", "errorCode": "E2201" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Successful Category Option Merge Response in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates the JSON response structure for a successful category option merge operation. It includes the HTTP status, merge report details, and information about deleted source category options. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_47 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "OK", "httpStatusCode": 200, "status": "OK", "response": { "mergeReport": { "mergeErrors": [], "mergeType": "CategoryOption", "sourcesDeleted": [ "FbLZS3ueWbQ", "dPSWsKeAZNw" ], "message": "CategoryOption merge complete" } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Tomcat Environment Variables in Bash DESCRIPTION: Environment variable configuration for Tomcat, including Java home, JVM options, and DHIS2 home directory. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_17 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` JAVA_HOME='/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64/' JAVA_OPTS='-Xms4000m -Xmx7000m' DHIS2_HOME='/home/dhis/config' ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Logging Properties in DHIS2 Configuration File DESCRIPTION: Shows supported logging properties that can be set in the dhis.conf configuration file, including max log file size and number of archive files. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/logging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` # Max size for log files, default is '100MB' logging.file.max_size = 250MB # Max number of rolling log archive files, default is 0 logging.file.max_archives = 2 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating an Event Visualization with JSON in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: Example JSON payload for creating a new event visualization through a POST request to the '/api/eventVisualizations' endpoint. "items": [ { "id": "LAST_12_MONTHS" } ] } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Ansible Playbook for PostgreSQL Installation DESCRIPTION: Comprehensive Ansible playbook for installing and configuring PostgreSQL with PostGIS extension, including repository setup and service configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/how-to/PostgreSQL-setup.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: yaml CODE: ``` - hosts: 127.0.0.1 become: true gather_facts: true vars: postgresql_version: 16 tasks: - name: "Update and upgrade database" ansible.builtin.apt: upgrade: true update_cache: true cache_valid_time: 86400 # Adding postgresql signing key - name: "Adding postgresql repo signing key" ansible.builtin.get_url: url: "https://www.postgresql.org/media/keys/ACCC4CF8.asc" dest: /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/postgresql.asc owner: root group: root mode: '0600' # adding apt signing key - name: "Adding postgres apt repository to sources list" ansible.builtin.apt_repository: repo: "deb [arch={{ guest_os_arch|default('amd64') }} signed-by=/etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/postgresql.asc] https://apt.postgresql.org/pub/repos/apt {{ hostvars[inventory_hostname]['ansible_facts']['distribution_release'] }}-pgdg main" update_cache: true filename: apt_postgresql_org state: present # Install postgresql and python module for Postgres - name: "Installing postgres version {{ postgresql_version }}" ansible.builtin.apt: name: - ca-certificates - postgresql-{{ postgresql_version }} - postgresql-client-{{ postgresql_version }} - postgresql-{{ postgresql_version }}-postgis-{{ '2.5' if guest_os == '20.04' else '3' }} - python3-psycopg2 - libdbd-pg-perl # sometimes postgres is installed but not started - name: "Ensure postgresql is running" become: true ansible.builtin.service: name: postgresql state: started enabled: true ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Custom Aggregation Expression in DHIS2 Program Indicators DESCRIPTION: Example of a program indicator expression using custom aggregation type with inline aggregation operators. This expression calculates a percentage based on summed values. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: SQL CODE: ``` (sum(#{mCXR7u4kNBW.K0A4BauXJDl} * #{mCXR7u4kNBW.NFkjsNiQ9PH}) / sum(#{mCXR7u4kNBW.NFkjsNiQ9PH})) * 100 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating DHIS2 Configuration Directory DESCRIPTION: Commands to create and set ownership for the DHIS2 configuration directory. This directory will store configuration files, apps, and logs. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo mkdir /home/dhis/config sudo chown dhis:dhis /home/dhis/config ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Google OIDC Configuration for DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Configuration properties for enabling Google OIDC authentication in DHIS2's dhis.conf file. Includes client ID, secret, redirect URLs and login settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_22 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` # Enables OIDC login oidc.oauth2.login.enabled = on # Client id, given to you in the Google developer console oidc.provider.google.client_id = my client id # Client secret, given to you in the Google developer console oidc.provider.google.client_secret = my client secret # [Optional] Authorized redirect URI, the same as set in the Google developer console # If your public hostname is different from what the server sees internally, # you need to provide your full public url, like the example below. oidc.provider.google.redirect_url = https://mydhis2-server.org/oauth2/code/google # [Optional] Where to redirect after logging out. # If your public hostname is different from what the server sees internally, # you need to provide your full public url, like the example below. oidc.logout.redirect_url = https://mydhis2-server.org ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Data Element with Unfiltered Translations Array in JSON DESCRIPTION: This example demonstrates a data element with translations turned off, showing the complete unfiltered translations array. It includes translations for multiple properties (FORM_NAME, SHORT_NAME, NAME, DESCRIPTION) across different locales (en_FK, en_GB, fr). SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "FTRrcoaog83", "displayName": "Accute Flaccid Paralysis (Deaths < 5 yrs)", "translations": [ { "property": "FORM_NAME", "locale": "en_FK", "value": "aa" }, { "property": "SHORT_NAME", "locale": "en_GB", "value": "Accute Flaccid Paral" }, { "property": "SHORT_NAME", "locale": "fr", "value": "Accute French" }, { "property": "NAME", "locale": "fr", "value": "Accute French" }, { "property": "NAME", "locale": "en_FK", "value": "aa" }, { "property": "DESCRIPTION", "locale": "en_FK", "value": "aa" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Deleting Validation Results with Filters in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Makes a DELETE request to remove validation results that match the specified filters. Requires the 'Perform maintenance tasks' authority. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` DELETE /api/36/validationResults? ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Dimension Items with Pagination DESCRIPTION: Endpoint to retrieve dimensional items for a specific dimension with optional pagination support. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dimensions/J5jldMd8OHv/items?paging=true ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Program Copy Response in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Successful response from a program copy operation, showing the HTTP status, message, and the UID of the newly created program. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_116 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Created", "httpStatusCode": 201, "status": "OK", "message": "Program created: 'Program456b'" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Recipients to a Message Conversation in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Illustrates the JSON payload structure for adding recipients (users, user groups, and organisation units) to an existing message conversation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_17 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "users": [ { "id": "OYLGMiazHtW" }, { "id": "N3PZBUlN8vq" } ], "userGroups": [ { "id": "DiszpKrYNg8" } ], "organisationUnits": [ { "id": "DiszpKrYNg8" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Asynchronous Task Summary in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: This JSON snippet illustrates the response format when retrieving a summary of an asynchronous task invocation in DHIS2. It includes details such as response type, status, import options, and import counts. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/maintenance.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "responseType": "ImportSummary", "status": "SUCCESS", "importOptions": { "idSchemes": {}, "dryRun": false, "async": true, "importStrategy": "CREATE_AND_UPDATE", "reportMode": "FULL", "skipExistingCheck": false, "sharing": false, "skipNotifications": false, "datasetAllowsPeriods": false, "strictPeriods": false, "strictCategoryOptionCombos": false, "strictAttributeOptionCombos": false, "strictOrganisationUnits": false, "requireCategoryOptionCombo": false, "requireAttributeOptionCombo": false, "skipPatternValidation": false }, "description": "Import process completed successfully", "importCount": { "imported": 0, "updated": 431, "ignored": 0, "deleted": 0 }, "dataSetComplete": "false" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Google OIDC Provider in DHIS2 properties file DESCRIPTION: Example dhis.conf configuration for enabling OIDC login with Google as the identity provider. Includes settings for client ID, client secret, redirect URL, and logout redirect URL. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/oauth.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` # Enables OIDC login oidc.oauth2.login.enabled = on # Client id, given to you in the Google developer console oidc.provider.google.client_id = # Client secret, given to you in the Google developer console oidc.provider.google.client_secret = # [Optional] Authorized redirect URI, the same as set in the Google developer console # If your public hostname is different from what the server sees internally, # you need to provide your full public url, like the example below. oidc.provider.google.redirect_url = https://mydhis2-server.org/oauth2/code/google # [Optional] Where to redirect after logging out. # If your public hostname is different from what the server sees internally, # you need to provide your full public url, like the example below. oidc.logout.redirect_url = https://mydhis2-server.org ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Complete Data Set Registrations in DHIS2 using Bash DESCRIPTION: An example HTTP GET request to retrieve complete data set registrations by specifying a data set, date range, organization units, and including children in the hierarchy. The request targets version 33 of the DHIS2 API. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_27 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` GET /api/33/completeDataSetRegistrations?dataSet=pBOMPrpg1QX &startDate=2014-01-01&endDate=2014-01-31&orgUnit=YuQRtpLP10I &orgUnit=vWbkYPRmKyS&children=true ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: API Error Message Format DESCRIPTION: Standard JSON format for API error messages including HTTP status, code and descriptive message. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/overview.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Forbidden", "message": "You don't have the proper permissions to read objects of this type.", "httpStatusCode": 403, "status": "ERROR" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Triggering Validation Result Notifications in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Makes a POST request to manually send validation result notifications to appropriate users. Only unsent results will be processed, avoiding duplicate notifications. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` POST /api/33/validation/sendNotifications ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Single User to Sharing with JSON Patch DESCRIPTION: This JSON Patch payload demonstrates how to add a single user to the sharing settings of a DHIS2 object using a specific path. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/sharing.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ { "op": "add", "path": "/sharing/users/NOOF56dveaZ", "value": { "access": "rw------", "id": "NOOF56dveaZ" } } ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Response Format for Usage Analytics API DESCRIPTION: Shows the structure of the JSON response from the usage analytics API.
