---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting User Settings Using Curl DESCRIPTION: Example of setting a user setting value using curl with plain text content SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/settings-and-configuration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/33/userSettings/my-key" -d "My long value" -H "Content-Type: text/plain" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Message for Organisation Units in XML DESCRIPTION: XML payload format for sending a message to all users connected to multiple organisation units in DHIS2. This structure includes subject, text content, and a list of organisation unit IDs. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` This is the subject This is the text ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sending XML Message with cURL DESCRIPTION: cURL command to send an XML message stored in 'message.xml' to the DHIS2 API, authenticating as the admin user. The command posts to the messageConversations endpoint. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -d @message.xml "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/messageConversations" -H "Content-Type:application/xml" -u admin:district -X POST ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Option Group Sets with CSV in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Sample CSV payload for importing option group sets. The example shows how to create two option group sets (optiongroupsetA and optiongroupsetB) and associate them with specific option sets using option set UIDs. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_88 LANGUAGE: csv CODE: ``` name,uid,code,description,datadimension,optionsetuid optiongroupsetA,,,,,xmRubJIhmaK optiongroupsetB,,,,false,QYDAByFgTr1 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Error Response for Indicator Merge DESCRIPTION: Example of an error response when merging indicators fails, showing validation errors with specific error codes and messages. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_63 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Conflict", "httpStatusCode": 409, "status": "WARNING", "message": "One or more errors occurred, please see full details in merge report.", "response": { "mergeReport": { "mergeErrors": [ { "message": "At least one source Indicator must be specified", "errorCode": "E1530", "args": [] }, { "message": "Target Indicator does not exist: `abcdefg1221`", "errorCode": "E1533", "args": [ "Target", "abcdefg1221" ] } ], "mergeType": "Indicator", "sourcesDeleted": [], "message": "Indicator merge has errors" } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Data Value Set Structure in CSV DESCRIPTION: The CSV structure for sending data values to DHIS2. Includes headers for dataelement, period, orgunit, catoptcombo, attroptcombo, value, and other fields. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: csv CODE: ``` "dataelement","period","orgunit","catoptcombo","attroptcombo","value","strby","lstupd","cmt" "dataElementID","period","orgUnitID","cocID","aocID","1","username","2015-04-01","comment1" "dataElementID","period","orgUnitID","cocID","aocID","2","username","2015-04-01","comment2" "dataElementID","period","orgUnitID","cocID","aocID","3","username","2015-04-01","comment3" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Checking Orgunit Code in DHIS2 Program Rules DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows how to check if an organization unit code starts with a specific prefix using the V{orgunit_code} variable and the d2:left function in a DHIS2 program rule expression. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_66 LANGUAGE: dhis2 CODE: ``` d2:left(V{orgunit_code},3) == 'WB_' ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding and Removing Objects in Single Request DESCRIPTION: JSON payload structure for simultaneously adding and removing objects from a collection using additions and deletions arrays. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_26 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "additions": [{ "id": "IDA" }, { "id": "IDB" }, { "id": "IDC" } ], "deletions": [{ "id": "IDD" }, { "id": "IDE" }, { "id": "IDF" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Bulk Data Values with cURL DESCRIPTION: cURL command to fetch a larger set of data values from DHIS2. It demonstrates using multiple data sets, organization units, and a date range for bulk data retrieval. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_20 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/dataValueSets?dataSet=pBOMPrpg1QX&dataSet=BfMAe6Itzgt &startDate=2013-01-01&endDate=2013-01-31&orgUnit=YuQRtpLP10I&orgUnit=vWbkYPRmKyS&children=true" -H "Accept:application/xml" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a Route with Query Parameter Authentication DESCRIPTION: JSON request for creating a route with authentication via query parameters. This adds specified query parameters to the request when the route is run. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/route.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "Postman Echo", "code": "postman-get", "disabled": false, "url": "https://postman-echo.com/get", "auth": { "type": "api-query-params", "queryParams": { "token": "aXJgm4Kwv1xk9UfFRYIIR8b6mEV1cQz3lcxMQlaQz9lwI35j4ZIUK5T2O2aQDfIY" } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating Full DataElement Object with Translations DESCRIPTION: Example request payload for updating a complete DataElement object including its translations. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/i18n.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "fbfJHSPpUQD", "created": "2010-02-05T10:58:43.646", "name": "ANC 1st visit", "shortName": "ANC 1st visit", "translations": [ { "property": "SHORT_NAME", "locale": "en_GB", "value": "ANC 1st visit" }, { "property": "NAME", "locale": "fr", "value": "Soin prénatal 1" }, { "property": "NAME", "locale": "en_GB", "value": "ANC 1st visit" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: CSV Data Value Format Example for DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This CSV snippet demonstrates the format used for importing data values into DHIS2. It includes columns for data element, period, organization unit, category option combo, attribute option combo, value, stored by user, and timestamp. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_16 LANGUAGE: csv CODE: ``` "dataelement","period","orgunit","catoptcombo","attroptcombo","value","storedby","timestamp" "DUSpd8Jq3M7","201202","gP6hn503KUX","Prlt0C1RF0s",,"7","bombali","2010-04-17" "DUSpd8Jq3M7","201202","gP6hn503KUX","V6L425pT3A0",,"10","bombali","2010-04-17" "DUSpd8Jq3M7","201202","OjTS752GbZE","V6L425pT3A0",,"9","bombali","2010-04-06" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Payload Structure for Single Object Type Sharing in DHIS2 API (JSON) DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates the payload structure for sharing a single object type using the '/api/{object-type}/sharing' endpoint. It includes examples of adding and removing user access for datasets. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/sharing.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "dataSets":[ "cYeuwXTCPkU", "aYeuwXTCPkU" ], "patch":[ { "op":"add", "path":"/sharing/users/DXyJmlo9rge", "value":{ "access":"rw------", "id":"DXyJmlo9rge" } }, { "op":"remove", "path":"/sharing/users/N3PZBUlN8vq" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Paging Events Query in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example of applying paging to an events query, specifying the page number and page size for the response. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_25 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/analytics/events/query/eBAyeGv0exc?startDate=2016-01-01&endDate=2016-10-31 &dimension=ou:O6uvpzGd5pu&dimension=qrur9Dvnyt5&page=3&pageSize=20 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: App Store Response Format DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response structure from the DHIS2 App Store API showing app metadata including versions and images. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/apps.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { [ { "name": "Tabular Tracker Capture", "description": "Tabular Tracker Capture is an app that makes you more effective.", "sourceUrl": "https://github.com/dhis2/App-repository", "appType": "DASHBOARD_WIDGET", "status": "PENDING", "id": "NSD06BVoV21", "developer": { "name": "DHIS", "organisation": "Uio", "address": "Oslo", "email": "dhis@abc.com", }, "versions": [ { "id": "upAPqrVgwK6", "version": "1.2", "minDhisVersion": "2.17", "maxDhisVersion": "2.20", "downloadUrl": "https://dhis2.org/download/appstore/tabular-capture-12.zip", "demoUrl": "http://play.dhis2.org/demo" } ], "images": [ { "id": "upAPqrVgwK6", "logo": "true", "imageUrl": "https://dhis2.org/download/appstore/tabular-capture-12.png", "description": "added feature snapshot", "caption": "dialog", } ] } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Performing Maintenance Tasks via DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: Various HTTP POST or PUT requests to perform maintenance tasks such as clearing analytics tables, removing expired invitations, and pruning periods in DHIS2. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Prometheus Service Configuration DESCRIPTION: Systemd service configuration for Prometheus, defining service parameters and startup options. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/monitoring.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` [Unit] Description=Prometheus Wants=network-online.target After=network-online.target [Service] Type=simple User=prometheus Group=prometheus ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/prometheus \ --config.file=/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml \ --storage.tsdb.path="/data/prometheus" \ --web.console.templates=/etc/prometheus/consoles \ --web.console.libraries=/etc/prometheus/console_libraries \ --web.listen-address=0.0.0.0:9090 \ --web.enable-admin-api Restart=always [Install] WantedBy=multi-user.target ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Data Summary Statistics - JSON Response DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response from the /api/dataSummary endpoint showing various system metrics including object counts and active user statistics. The response includes counts of different metadata objects and user activity metrics. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/maintenance.md#2025-04-22_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "objectCounts": { "indicator": 77, "trackedEntity": 73125, "visualization": 292, "period": 384, "programStageInstance": 372987, "organisationUnit": 1332, "validationRule": 37, "dataValue": 4934284, "dataElement": 1037, "program": 14, "organisationUnitGroup": 18, "enrollment": 73133, "trackedEntityInstance": 73125, "programInstance": 73133, "indicatorType": 5, "eventVisualization": 50, "event": 372987, "indicatorGroup": 17, "map": 91, "user": 131, "userGroup": 34, "dataSet": 26, "dataElementGroup": 84, "dashboard": 28 }, "activeUsers": { "0": 2, "1": 2, "2": 2, "7": 2, "30": 3 } .... } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a Wildcard Route for Sub-path Support DESCRIPTION: JSON request for creating a wildcard route that supports sub-path requests. The route URL ends with /** which allows appending sub-paths when the route is run to access different endpoints on the target service. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/route.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "Postman Wildcard", "code": "postman-wildcard", "disabled": false, "url": "https://postman-echo.com/**" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Authenticating with DHIS2 using datimutils in R DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to authenticate with a DHIS2 instance using the loginToDATIM function. Creates a d2_default_session object for subsequent API calls. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/dhis2-and-r-integration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: r CODE: ``` loginToDATIM(username = "admin",password = "district",base_url = "https://play.dhis2.org/dev/") ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: CSS Variables for Login Dialog Customization DESCRIPTION: List of available CSS variables for customizing the appearance of the DHIS2 login dialog, including margins, colors, and typography settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/settings-and-configuration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` --form-container-margin-block-start --form-container-margin-block-end --form-container-margin-inline-start, auto --form-container-margin-inline-end --form-container-default-width --form-container-padding --form-container-background-color --form-container-box-border-radius --form-container-box-shadow --form-container-font-color --form-title-font-size --form-title-font-weight --form-container-title-color ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Downloading Metadata for Specific Version in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This endpoint downloads the actual metadata for a specific version. The version name is provided as a path parameter, allowing access to the complete metadata snapshot for that version. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_101 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -u admin:district "https://play.dhis2.org/dev/api/metadata/version/Version_5/data" ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "date": "2016-06-30T06:10:23.120+0000", "dataElements": [ { "code": "ANC 5th Visit", "created": "2016-06-30T06:10:09.870+0000", "lastUpdated": "2016-06-30T06:10:09.870+0000", "name": "ANC 5th Visit", "id": "sCuZKDsix7Y", "shortName": "ANC 5th Visit ", "aggregationType": "SUM", "domainType": "AGGREGATE", "zeroIsSignificant": false, "valueType": "NUMBER", "categoryCombo": { "id": "p0KPaWEg3cf" }, "user": { "id": "xE7jOejl9FI" } } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a Route with Custom Authority DESCRIPTION: JSON request for creating a route with HTTP Basic authentication and a custom authority. Custom authorities allow DHIS2 clients without route management rights to still run specific routes. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/route.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "Postman Echo", "code": "postman-post", "disabled": false, "url": "https://postman-echo.com/post", "auth": { "type": "http-basic", "username": "admin", "password": "admin" }, "authorities": ["MY_CUSTOM_APP"] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Bulk GeoJSON Import Structure Using Organisation Unit Code DESCRIPTION: Example of a GeoJSON file structure for bulk import where a feature property is used to refer to the organisation unit code. This structure is used when 'geoJsonId' is false and 'geoJsonProperty' is set to a specific property name. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/geo-json.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "type": "FeatureCollection", "features": [ { "type": "Feature", "properties": { "code": "OU1_CODE" }, "geometry": { ... } }, ... ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating an Interpretation Comment with cURL in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: cURL command example for adding a comment to an existing interpretation using a POST request with the comment text in the request body. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_19 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -d "An intervention is needed" -X POST "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/interpretations/j8sjHLkK8uY/comments" -H "Content-Type:text/plain" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Analytics Debug SQL DESCRIPTION: HTTP GET request to retrieve SQL statement showing data value source of aggregated analytics response. Supports text/html or text/plain content types. Uses dimension and filter parameters similar to regular analytics queries. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_19 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/analytics/debug/sql?dimension=dx:fbfJHSPpUQD;cYeuwXTCPkU&filter=pe:2016Q1;2016Q2&filter=ou:O6uvpzGd5pu ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Single GeoJSON Import Structure DESCRIPTION: Example of a GeoJSON geometry structure for single organisation unit import. This structure is used when updating the geometry of a single organisation unit via the API. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/geo-json.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "type": "Polygon", "coordinates": [...] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Events with Organization Unit Descendants in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Example request to fetch events for all descendants of a specific organization unit using the DHIS2 tracker API. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_35 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/tracker/events?orgUnit=O6uvpzGd5pu&orgUnitMode=DESCENDANTS ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example Personal Access Token Format in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example format of a generated Personal Access Token (PAT) for API authentication SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/overview.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2pat_5xVA12xyUbWNedQxy4ohH77WlxRGVvZZ1151814092 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Events API Endpoint in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Basic structure of the API endpoint for querying events in DHIS2. It allows specifying program ID, date range, dimensions, and filters. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_21 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/analytics/events/query/?startDate=yyyy-MM-dd&endDate=yyyy-MM-dd &dimension=ou:;&dimension=&dimension=:: ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing CSV Metadata Using cURL in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example demonstrating how to import data elements in CSV format using cURL. The request uses the --data-binary option to preserve line breaks and includes authentication. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_83 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl --data-binary @data_elements.csv "http://localhost/api/metadata?classKey=DATA_ELEMENT" -H "Content-Type:application/csv" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Organisation Unit Profile Data in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: API endpoint for retrieving the organisation unit profile data for a specific organisation unit and period. The org-unit-id path variable is required, while the iso-period query parameter is optional (defaults to 'this year'). SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/organisation-unit-profile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` GET /api/organisationUnitProfile/{org-unit-id}/data?period={iso-period} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Aggregation Type in Analytics API Query DESCRIPTION: Shows how to override the default aggregation type and specify a custom aggregation operator (COUNT in this example) for the analytics query. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: url CODE: ``` /api/analytics?dimension=dx:fbfJHSPpUQD&dimension=pe:2014Q1&dimension=ou:O6uvpzGd5pu&aggregationType=COUNT ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Generating DHIS2 Identifiers via Web API DESCRIPTION: HTTP GET request to generate random DHIS2 identifiers. The 'limit' parameter specifies the number of identifiers to return. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/maintenance.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: HTTP CODE: ``` /api/33/system/id?limit=3 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Program Indicator Expression in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example of a program indicator expression that includes attributes, data elements, and constants. This expression demonstrates the basic structure and syntax used in DHIS2 program indicators. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: SQL CODE: ``` (A{GPkGfbmArby} + #{mCXR7u4kNBW.NFkjsNiQ9PH}) * C{bCqvfPR02Im} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Detailed Data Values with Categories in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This markdown table demonstrates how data values are stored when using data element categories 'Place of Service' and 'Age' in DHIS2. It shows a more detailed breakdown of the data. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/about-data-dimensions.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Organisation Unit | Data Element | Place of service | Age | Period | Value | |---|---|---|---|---|---| | Gerehun CHC | Measles doses given | Fixed | \<1 y | Dec-09 | 12 | | Gerehun CHC | Measles doses given | Outreach | \<1 y | Dec-09 | 4 | | Gerehun CHC | Measles doses given | Fixed | \>1 y | Dec-09 | 4 | | Gerehun CHC | Measles doses given | Outreach | \>1 y | Dec-09 | 2 | | Tugbebu CHP | Measles doses given | Fixed | \<1 y | Dec-09 | 10 | | Tugbebu CHP | Measles doses given | Outreach | \<1 y | Dec-09 | 4 | | Tugbebu CHP | Measles doses given | Fixed | \>1 y | Dec-09 | 3 | | Tugbebu CHP | Measles doses given | Outreach | \>1 y | Dec-09 | 1 | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: User Registration Response in DHIS2 API (JSON) DESCRIPTION: Example of a successful response to a user registration request. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_23 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Created", "httpStatusCode": 201, "status": "OK", "message": "Account created" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Job Queue JSON Structure in DHIS2 Scheduler DESCRIPTION: This JSON structure represents a job queue in the scheduler listing. It includes details about the queue itself and a sequence of job configurations that are part of the queue. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_24 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "myQ", "type": "Sequence", "cronExpression": "0 0 1 ? * *", "nextExecutionTime": "2023-03-15T01:00:00.000", "status": "SCHEDULED", "enabled": true, "configurable": true, "sequence": [ { "id": "FgAxa6eRSzQ", "name": "test Q1", "type": "ANALYTICS_TABLE", "cronExpression": "0 0 1 ? * *", "nextExecutionTime": "2023-03-15T01:00:00.000", "status": "SCHEDULED" }, { "id": "BeclVERfWbg", "name": "est Q2", "type": "DATA_INTEGRITY", "status": "SCHEDULED" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Static Content Retrieval Example DESCRIPTION: Example of retrieving static content with text/html accept header SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/settings-and-configuration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/33/staticContent/logo_front" -H "Accept: text/html" -L -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Identifiable Token Filtering on Data Elements in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates token-based filtering across identifiable properties (id, code, name, shortName) of data elements. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dataElements.json?filter=identifiable:token:2nd ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Read Replicas in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example configuration for setting up read replicas in the DHIS2 configuration file (dhis.conf). Demonstrates how to specify connection details for multiple read replicas. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/postgresql.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` # Read replica 1 configuration # Database connection URL, username and password read1.connection.url = jdbc:postgresql://127.0.0.11/dbread1 read1.connection.username = dhis read1.connection.password = xxxx # Read replica 2 configuration # Database connection URL, username and password read2.connection.url = jdbc:postgresql://127.0.0.12/dbread2 read2.connection.username = dhis read2.connection.password = xxxx # Read replica 3 configuration # Database connection URL, fallback to master for username and password read3.connection.url = jdbc:postgresql://127.0.0.13/dbread3 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: PUT Request to Update Constant DESCRIPTION: cURL command example for updating an existing constant by sending a PUT request with JSON payload to the DHIS2 API. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_23 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -X PUT -d @pi.json -H "Content-Type: application/json" -u user:password "http://server/api/constants/ID" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving a DHIS2 Job Configuration DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates the JSON response structure when retrieving a job configuration in DHIS2. It includes detailed information about the job, including its status, parameters, and access settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "lastUpdated": "2018-02-22T15:15:34.067", "id": "KBcP6Qw37gT", "href": "http://localhost:8080/api/jobConfigurations/KBcP6Qw37gT", "created": "2018-02-22T15:15:34.067", "name": "analytics last two years", "jobStatus": "SCHEDULED", "displayName": "analytics last two years", "enabled": true, "externalAccess": false, "jobType": "ANALYTICS_TABLE", "nextExecutionTime": "2018-02-26T03:00:00.000", "cronExpression": "0 0 3 ? * MON", "jobParameters": { "lastYears": 2, "skipTableTypes": [], "skipResourceTables": false }, "favorite": false, "configurable": true, "access": { "read": true, "update": true, "externalize": true, "delete": true, "write": true, "manage": true }, "lastUpdatedBy": { "id": "GOLswS44mh8" }, "favorites": [], "translations": [], "userGroupAccesses": [], "attributeValues": [], "userAccesses": [] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Data Integrity Details Response Format DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response format for data integrity details checks showing the structure including check metadata and issues. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_19 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "": { "name": "", "displayName": "", "startTime": "2023-01-11T06:12:56.436", "finishedTime": "2023-01-11T06:12:57.021", "section": "...", "severity": "WARNING", "description": "...", "issuesIdType": "", "isSlow": false, "issues": [{ "id": "", "name": "", "comment": "optional plain text description or hint of the issue", "refs": ["", ""] }] }, "": { "name": "", "displayName": "", "startTime": "2023-01-11T06:12:57.345", "finishedTime": "2023-01-11T06:12:58.007", "section": "...", "severity": "WARNING", "description": "...", "issuesIdType": "", "isSlow": false, "issues": [] } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Generating Multiple Reserved Tracked Entity Attribute Values DESCRIPTION: API response for generating and reserving multiple unique tracked entity attribute values with a 60-day reservation period. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_22 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ { "ownerObject": "TRACKEDENTITYATTRIBUTE", "ownerUid": "Gs1ICEQTPlG", "key": "RANDOM(X)-OSL", "value": "B-OSL", "created": "2018-03-02T13:22:35.175", "expiryDate": "2018-05-01T13:22:35.174" }, { "ownerObject": "TRACKEDENTITYATTRIBUTE", "ownerUid": "Gs1ICEQTPlG", "key": "RANDOM(X)-OSL", "value": "Q-OSL", "created": "2018-03-02T13:22:35.175", "expiryDate": "2018-05-01T13:22:35.174" }, { "ownerObject": "TRACKEDENTITYATTRIBUTE", "ownerUid": "Gs1ICEQTPlG", "key": "RANDOM(X)-OSL", "value": "S-OSL", "created": "2018-03-02T13:22:35.175", "expiryDate": "2018-05-01T13:22:35.174" } ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Skip Test Expression with Logical OR Operator in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates combining two conditions with a logical OR operator in a skip test expression for DHIS2 predictors. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_51 LANGUAGE: Expression Language CODE: ``` #{FTRrcoaog83} > #{M62VHgYT2n0} || #{uF1DLnZNlWe} > 0 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Analytics API Error Response Format DESCRIPTION: Example of the error response format returned when analytics API constraints are violated. Shows the structure including HTTP status, code, error message and machine-readable error code. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_18 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Conflict", "httpStatusCode": 409, "status": "ERROR", "message": "Only a single indicator can be specified as filter", "errorCode": "E7108" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using d2:validatePattern Function in DHIS2 - Numeric Pattern Validation DESCRIPTION: Validates if a text matches a specific regular expression pattern. This example checks if a number follows the pattern 9999/99/9, using escaped regex syntax. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_56 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` !d2:validatePattern(A{nrc},'\\d{6}\/\\d{2}\/\\d') ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering by Non-Null Values Using NV Keyword in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Shows how to filter for non-null values using the NV keyword with the NE operator. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_39 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` &dimension=qrur9Dvnyt5:NE:NV ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Single Event JSON Response in DHIS2 Tracker API DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response when retrieving a single event by UID from the DHIS2 Tracker API. It includes detailed event information and associated data values. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_45 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "event": "rgWr86qs0sI", "status": "ACTIVE", "program": "kla3mAPgvCH", "programStage": "aNLq9ZYoy9W", "enrollment": "Lo3SHzCnMSm", "orgUnit": "DiszpKrYNg8", "occurredAt": "2024-10-12T00:00:00.000", "followUp": false, "deleted": false, "createdAt": "2018-10-20T12:09:19.492", "createdAtClient": "2017-10-20T12:09:19.492", "updatedAt": "2018-10-20T12:09:19.492", "attributeOptionCombo": "amw2rQP6r6M", "attributeCategoryOptions": "RkbOhHwiOgW", "dataValues": [ { "createdAt": "2015-10-20T12:09:19.640", "updatedAt": "2015-10-20T12:09:19.640", "storedBy": "system", "providedElsewhere": false, "dataElement": "HyJL2Lt37jN", "value": "12" } ], "notes": [], "followup": false } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Response for Uploading Message Attachment in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Illustrates the JSON response format when successfully uploading a message attachment. The response includes details about the uploaded attachment, including its ID. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_19 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "created": "2018-07-20T16:54:18.210", "lastUpdated": "2018-07-20T16:54:18.212", "externalAccess": false, "publicAccess": "--------", "user": { "name": "John Traore", "created": "2013-04-18T17:15:08.407", "lastUpdated": "2018-03-09T23:06:54.512", "externalAccess": false, "displayName": "John Traore", "favorite": false, "id": "xE7jOejl9FI" }, "lastUpdatedBy": { "id": "xE7jOejl9FI", "name": "John Traore" }, "favorite": false, "id": "fTpI4GOmujz" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Server Firewall for DHIS2 Installation DESCRIPTION: Commands to enable the UFW firewall and limit SSH connections on a specific port before DHIS2 installation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-automated-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo ufw limit {ssh_port}/tcp sudo ufw enable ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Accessing the DHIS2 Analytics API Resource DESCRIPTION: The API endpoint for accessing the DHIS2 analytics resource. This resource allows users to query and retrieve aggregated data across various dimensions of the DHIS2 system. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/analytics ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring OAuth2 Clients in DHIS2 System Settings DESCRIPTION: Steps to create, edit, and delete OAuth2 clients in the DHIS2 System Settings app. This process includes setting the Client ID, Client secret, selecting Grant types, and entering Redirect URIs. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/system-settings.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` 1. Open the **System Settings** apps and click **OAuth2 clients**. 2. Click the add button. 3. Enter **Client ID** and **Client secret**. 4. Select **Grant types**: Refresh token, or Authorization code. 5. Enter **Redirect URIs**. If you've multiple URIs, separate them with a line. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sending individual data values via POST request in DHIS2 Web API using cURL DESCRIPTION: Example of sending individual data values to DHIS2 using a POST request to the dataValues resource. This demonstrates how to specify data element, period, organisation unit, category option combo and value. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_24 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/dataValues?de=s46m5MS0hxu &pe=201301&ou=DiszpKrYNg8&co=Prlt0C1RF0s&value=12" -X POST -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Specific Fields from Event Visualization in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to retrieve only specific fields (in this case, interpretations) from an event visualization using the DHIS2 Web API. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "interpretations": [ { "id": "Lfr8I2RPU0C" }, { "id": "JuwgdJlJPGb" }, { "id": "WAoU2rSpyZp" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Initiating Asynchronous Data Value Import in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the API endpoint for initiating an asynchronous data value import in DHIS2. It includes the query parameter 'async=true' to trigger the asynchronous process. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dataValueSets?async=true ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Sharing Status for a DHIS2 Object DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates the JSON response structure when requesting the sharing status of a DHIS2 object using the sharing API endpoint. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/sharing.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "meta": { "allowPublicAccess": true, "allowExternalAccess": false }, "object": { "id": "fbfJHSPpUQD", "name": "ANC 1st visit", "publicAccess": "rw------", "externalAccess": false, "user": {}, "userGroupAccesses": [ { "id": "hj0nnsVsPLU", "access": "rw------" }, { "id": "qMjBflJMOfB", "access": "r-------" } ] } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Users with Absolute URLs in DHIS2 Gist API DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates a Gist API query for users with absolute URLs. It includes id, userGroups size, organisationUnits size, and apiEndpoints with full URLs, useful for external integrations. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata-gist.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "rWLrZL8rP3K", "userGroups": 0, "organisationUnits": 1, "apiEndpoints": { "organisationUnits": "http://{host}/api/users/rWLrZL8rP3K/organisationUnits/gist?absoluteUrls=true", "userGroups": "http://{host}/api/users/rWLrZL8rP3K/userGroups/gist?absoluteUrls=true" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Import Response XML Format DESCRIPTION: Example of the XML response received after a successful data import, showing import statistics. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` false ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Executing Jobs Manually in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This endpoint allows manual execution of jobs using their configuration ID. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` POST /api/jobConfigurations/{id}/execute ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: CORS Allowlist Configuration DESCRIPTION: JSON array of URLs for configuring CORS allowlist SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/settings-and-configuration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` ["www.google.com", "www.dhis2.org", "www.who.int"] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rounding to Specific Decimal Places Using d2:round Function DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to round a number to a specific number of decimal places (in this case, one decimal place) using the d2:round function. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_53 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2:round(1.25, 1) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Specific Metadata Version in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This endpoint retrieves details for a specific metadata version by name. The query parameter 'versionName' specifies which version to retrieve. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_97 LANGUAGE: plain CODE: ``` /api/metadata/version?versionName=Version_2 ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "Version_2", "created": "2016-06-30T05:59:33.238+0000", "lastUpdated": "2016-06-30T05:59:33.239+0000", "externalAccess": false, "displayName": "Version_2", "type": "BEST_EFFORT", "hashCode": "8050fb1a604e29d5566675c86d02d10b", "id": "SaNyhusVxBG" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Organisation Unit Profile Definition in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: API endpoint for retrieving the organisation unit profile definition using a GET request. The response will be in JSON format containing the configured profile elements. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/organisation-unit-profile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` GET /api/organisationUnitProfile ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a New Potential Duplicate in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: JSON payload for creating a new potential duplicate. Requires specifying the original and duplicate tracked entity UIDs. New potential duplicates are created with an OPEN status by default. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_55 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "original": "", "duplicate": "" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Copying a Program in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: API endpoint for creating a copy of an existing program, which creates a new program with the same characteristics but a new UID. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_114 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` POST /api/programs/{uid}/copy ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Birth Program Stage Events in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example query for retrieving events from the 'Birth' program stage of the 'Child programme', including date range, organization unit, and filtered data element. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_23 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/analytics/events/query/IpHINAT79UW?stage=A03MvHHogjR&startDate=2016-03-01 &endDate=2016-12-31&dimension=ou:O6uvpzGd5pu&dimension=UXz7xuGCEhU:GT:2000 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Data Element Rendering Type Configuration in JSON DESCRIPTION: JSON payload for configuring detailed rendering properties of a data element or tracked entity attribute. This example configures a SLIDER rendering type with minimum, maximum, step values, and decimal point precision. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_44 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "renderingType": { "type": "SLIDER", "min": 0, "max": 1000, "step": 50, "decimalPoints": 0 } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Metadata Repository JSON Response Format in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example response from the metadata repository API showing available metadata packages. Each package entry contains an identifier, name, description, version, and a URL to download the package. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_103 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "packages": [ { "id": "sierre-leone-demo", "name": "Sierra Leone demo", "description": "Sierra Leone demo database", "version": "0.1", "href": "https://dhis2.org/metadata-repo/221/sierra-leone-demo/metadata.json" }, { "id": "trainingland-org-units", "name": "Trainingland organisation units", "description": "Trainingland organisation units with four levels", "version": "0.1", "href": "https://dhis2.org/metadata-repo/221/trainingland-org-units/metadata.json" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using the daysBetween Function with Dates DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates calculating the number of days between a data element date and a static date using the d2:daysBetween function, which returns a positive number if the first date is before the second date. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_18 LANGUAGE: expression CODE: ``` d2:daysBetween(#{mCXR7u4kNBW.k8ja2Aif1Ae},'2015-06-01') ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Tracked Entity Instance Audits with DHIS2 API (Deprecated) DESCRIPTION: Deprecated endpoint for accessing audit logs for tracked entity instances. This endpoint functions similarly to the trackedEntity endpoint and is available when auditing is enabled. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/audit.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/audits/trackedEntityInstance ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: CSV Import Format for Events in DHIS2 Tracker API DESCRIPTION: Example of CSV format for importing events with their data values. Each row represents an event and its associated data value. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: csv CODE: ``` event,status,program,programStage,enrollment,orgUnit,occurredAt,scheduledAt,geometry,latitude,longitude,followUp,deleted,createdAt,createdAtClient,updatedAt,updatedAtClient,completedBy,completedAt,updatedBy,attributeOptionCombo,attributeCategoryOptions,assignedUser,dataElement,value,storedBy,providedElsewhere,storedByDataValue,updatedAtDataValue,createdAtDataValue A7rzcnZTe2T,ACTIVE,eBAyeGv0exc,Zj7UnCAulEk,RiLEKhWHlxZ,DwpbWkiqjMy,2023-02-12T23:00:00Z,2023-02-12T23:00:00Z,"POINT (-11.468912037323042 7.515913998868316)",7.515913998868316,-11.468912037323042,false,false,2017-09-08T19:40:22Z,,2017-09-08T19:40:22Z,,,,,HllvX50cXC0,xYerKDKCefk,,F3ogKBuviRA,"[-11.4880220438585,7.50978830548003]",admin,false,,2016-12-06T17:22:34.438Z,2016-12-06T17:22:34.438Z ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Organisation Unit Image Reference with PUT Request in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: API endpoint and JSON payload for assigning a file resource image to an organisation unit using a PUT request. This approach requires sending the full organisation unit payload including the image reference. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/organisation-unit-profile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` PUT /api/organisationUnits/{id} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Event Data Value Change Logs JSON Response in DHIS2 Tracker API DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response when retrieving change logs for event data values. It includes information about changes made to data values over time, including the type of change, user who made the change, and the values before and after the change. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_46 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "pager":{ "page":1, "pageSize":10 }, "changeLogs":[ { "createdBy":{ "uid":"AIK2aQOJIbj", "username":"tracker", "firstName":"Tracker demo", "surname":"User" }, "createdAt":"2024-06-20T15:43:36.342", "type":"DELETE", "change":{ "dataValue":{ "dataElement":"UXz7xuGCEhU", "previousValue":"12" } } }, { "createdBy":{ "uid":"AIK2aQOJIbj", "username":"tracker", "firstName":"Tracker demo", "surname":"User" }, "createdAt":"2024-06-20T15:43:27.175", "type":"CREATE", "change":{ "dataValue":{ "dataElement":"UXz7xuGCEhU", "currentValue":"12" } } }, { "createdBy":{ "uid":"AIK2aQOJIbj", "username":"tracker", "firstName":"Tracker demo", "surname":"User" }, "createdAt":"2024-06-20T14:51:16.433", "type":"UPDATE", "change":{ "dataValue":{ "dataElement":"bx6fsa0t90x", "previousValue":"true", "currentValue":"false" } } } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Failed Category Option Merge Response in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the JSON response structure for a failed category option merge operation. It includes error details, such as error codes and messages, along with the HTTP status and merge report information. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_48 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Conflict", "httpStatusCode": 409, "status": "WARNING", "message": "One or more errors occurred, please see full details in merge report.", "response": { "mergeReport": { "mergeErrors": [ { "message": "At least one source CategoryOption must be specified", "errorCode": "E1530", "args": [] }, { "message": "Target CategoryOption does not exist: `abcdefg1221`", "errorCode": "E1533", "args": [ "Target", "abcdefg1221" ] } ], "mergeType": "CategoryOption", "sourcesDeleted": [], "message": "CategoryOption merge has errors" } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring DHIS2 Log Settings DESCRIPTION: Log configuration options for DHIS2 including file size limits, archive management, and setting log levels for specific packages. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_53 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` # Max size for log files, default is '100MB' logging.file.max_size = 250MB # Max number of rolling log archive files, default is 0 logging.file.max_archives = 2 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating and Upgrading Ubuntu Server in Bash DESCRIPTION: Commands to update and upgrade the Ubuntu server before PostgreSQL installation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/how-to/PostgreSQL-setup.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo apt update -y sudo apt upgrade -y ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Stock Balance Predictor Expression in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This expression calculates the stock balance at the beginning of the next period by adding starting balance and restock, then subtracting used and lost items for each data element in a group. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_53 LANGUAGE: code CODE: ``` forEach ?de in :DEG:aIMu0nieph7 --> sum( #{?de.Gvoecom5muL} + #{?de.CWa6eew5uco} - #{?de.nthohhie8Ba} - #{?de.Faey8Iphooy} ) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Deleting Data Store Key - BASH/JSON DESCRIPTION: Example of deleting a specific key from the DHIS2 data store using curl. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_19 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "play.dhis2.org/demo/api/33/dataStore/foo/key_1" -X DELETE -u admin:district ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "OK", "httpStatusCode": 200, "status": "OK", "message": "Key 'key_1' deleted from namespace 'foo'." } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Server Timezone and Locale DESCRIPTION: Commands to configure server timezone to match the DHIS2 deployment location and set up proper locale settings for PostgreSQL. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo dpkg-reconfigure tzdata ``` LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` locale -a sudo locale-gen en_US.utf8 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring a Webhook Event Hook with API Token Authentication in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: A JSON configuration example for setting up an event hook that listens for metadata changes in dataElements and sends notifications to a webhook endpoint with API token authentication. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/event-hooks.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "webhook-api-token", "disabled": false, "source": { "path": "metadata.dataElement", "fields": "id,code,name" }, "targets": [ { "type": "webhook", "url": "http://localhost:3000/api/gateway", "auth": { "type": "api-token", "token": "EB3F6799-AA5A-47E8-B6B7-97EA54EB3873" } } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Current Date Variable in DHIS2 Program Rule Expression DESCRIPTION: An example of using the current_date system variable in a DHIS2 program rule expression to calculate if a symptom date is in the future (invalid date). SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_64 LANGUAGE: expression CODE: ``` d2:daysBetween(#{symptomDate},V{current_date}) < 0 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Managing Tracked Entity Working Lists in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: API endpoint for creating, updating, and deleting tracked entity working lists. Working lists are metadata that help users organize workflow by saving filters and sorting preferences. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_50 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/trackedEntityInstanceFilters ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Fetching Source Data for Aggregate Data Exchange in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates the GET request endpoint for retrieving source data of an aggregate data exchange in the analytics data format. It includes the API endpoint and the accept header for JSON response. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-exchange.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/aggregateDataExchanges/{id}/sourceData Accept: application/json ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Tracked Entity Audits by Date Range and Audit Type DESCRIPTION: Example API request for retrieving tracked entity audits within a specific date range and of a specific audit type (READ). Demonstrates pagination with pageSize parameter. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/audit.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/33/audits/trackedEntity.json?startDate=2021-03-01&endDate=2022-04-24&auditType=READ&pageSize=5 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Validation Response Example DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response from the validation endpoint showing required missing properties. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_28 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ { "message" : "Required property missing.", "property" : "type" }, { "property" : "aggregationOperator", "message" : "Required property missing." }, { "property" : "domainType", "message" : "Required property missing." }, { "property" : "shortName", "message" : "Required property missing." } ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Successful Response for Data Element Merge in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the structure of a successful response after merging data elements. It includes the HTTP status, merge report details, and information about deleted sources. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_55 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "OK", "httpStatusCode": 200, "status": "OK", "response": { "mergeReport": { "mergeErrors": [], "mergeType": "DataElement", "sourcesDeleted": [ "vQ0dGV9EDrw" ], "message": "DataElement merge complete" } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Indicator Period Offset Examples - DHIS2 Expressions DESCRIPTION: Examples demonstrating how to use the periodOffset function to reference data from periods before or after the current reporting period, including nested period offsets. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` #{FH8ab5Rog83}.periodOffset(-1) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Counting Zero and Positive Values with zpvc Function DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to count the number of zero and positive values among multiple arguments using the d2:zpvc function in a program indicator expression. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_22 LANGUAGE: expression CODE: ``` d2:zpvc(A{GPkGfbmArby}),#{mCXR7u4kNBW.NFkjsNiQ9PH}),4,-1) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Restoring DHIS2 Database from Backup DESCRIPTION: Command to restore a DHIS2 database from a SQL backup file. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_58 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` psql -d dhis2 -U dhis -f dhis2.sql ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring HelseID OIDC Provider Settings in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Configuration properties for setting up HelseID as an OIDC provider in DHIS2, including required endpoints, client credentials, and optional display settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/oauth.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` oidc.provider.helseid.client_id = oidc.provider.helseid.client_secret = oidc.provider.helseid.mapping_claim = helseid://claims/identity/email oidc.provider.helseid.authorization_uri = https://helseid.no/connect/authorize oidc.provider.helseid.token_uri = https://helseid.no/connect/token oidc.provider.helseid.user_info_uri = https://helseid.no/connect/userinfo oidc.provider.helseid.jwk_uri = https://helseid.no/.well-known/openid-configuration/jwks oidc.provider.helseid.end_session_endpoint = https://helseid.no/connect/endsession oidc.provider.helseid.scopes = helseid://scopes/identity/email oidc.provider.helseid.redirect_url = https://mydhis2-server.org/oauth2/code/helseid oidc.provider.helseid.enable_logout = on oidc.logout.redirect_url = https://mydhis2-server.org oidc.provider.helseid.enable_pkce = on oidc.provider.helseid.extra_request_parameters = acr_values lvl4,other_key value2 oidc.provider.helseid.display_alias = HelseID oidc.provider.helseid.logo_image = ../security/btn_helseid.svg oidc.provider.helseid.logo_image_padding = 0px 1px ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Metadata Synchronization Retry Parameters in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: These configuration parameters control the retry behavior of the Metadata Sync Task in DHIS2. They specify the number of retry attempts and the time interval between retries for failed synchronization steps. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata-synchronizing.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` metadata.sync.retry = 5 metadata.sync.retry.time.frequency.millisec = 10000 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Users to Sharing with JSON Patch DESCRIPTION: This JSON Patch payload shows how to add multiple users to the sharing settings of a DHIS2 object using the 'add' operation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/sharing.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ { "op": "add", "path": "/sharing/users", "value": { "NOOF56dveaZ": { "access": "rw------", "id": "NOOF56dveaZ" }, "Kh68cDMwZsg": { "access": "rw------", "id": "Kh68cDMwZsg" } } } ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Parsing JSON Response from DHIS2 Analytics Outlier Detection API DESCRIPTION: This JSON snippet demonstrates the structure of a response from the DHIS2 Analytics Outlier Detection API. It includes headers, metadata, and rows of outlier data with various statistical measures. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_68 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "headers": [ { "name": "dx", "column": "Data", "valueType": "TEXT", "type": "java.lang.String", "hidden": false, "meta": false }, // ... (other headers omitted for brevity) { "name": "upperbound", "column": "Upper boundary", "valueType": "NUMBER", "type": "java.lang.Double", "hidden": false, "meta": false } ], "metaData": { "maxResults": 30, "count": 3, "orderBy": "VALUE", "threshold": 3.0, "algorithm": "Z_SCORE" }, "rowContext": {}, "width": 18, "rows": [ [ "DE_22", "Q_Early breastfeeding (within 1 hr after delivery) at BCG", "202209", "September 2022", "OU_204860", "Sandaru CHC", "/Sierra Leone/Kailahun/Penguia/Sandaru CHC", "COC_292", "Fixed, <1y", "default", "default", "105.0", "18.3", "28.7", "86.7", "3.0", "-67.9", "104.4" ], // ... (other rows omitted for brevity) ], "headerWidth": 18, "height": 3 } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Log Levels for DHIS2 Components DESCRIPTION: Examples of how to configure log levels for specific packages in DHIS2, including Spring Framework and DHIS2 services. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_54 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` logging.level.org.springframework = DEBUG logging.level.org.hisp.dhis = DEBUG ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Uploading Message Attachment in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Shows how to upload a file attachment for a message using a POST request to the 'messageConversations/attachments' endpoint. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_18 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -F file=@attachment.png "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/messageConversations/attachments" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Checking for Data Element Value in Previous Events DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to use d2:hasValue to check if a data element (hemoglobinPrevious) has a value in any event preceding the current event. The source type is set to 'Data element from previous event'. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_37 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2:hasValue( 'hemoglobinPrevious' ) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Metadata API Endpoint DESCRIPTION: The base endpoint for accessing the metadata API in DHIS2, supporting both XML and JSON representations. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_31 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/metadata ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Asynchronous Import Response in DHIS2 Tracker API DESCRIPTION: Example of an asynchronous import response from the DHIS2 Tracker API. It includes the job ID and location for tracking the import progress. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "OK", "httpStatusCode": 200, "status": "OK", "message": "Tracker job added", "response": { "id": "cHh2OCTJvRw", "location": "https://play.im.dhis2.org/dev/api/tracker/jobs/cHh2OCTJvRw" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Paginated JSON Response from DHIS2 Data Items Endpoint DESCRIPTION: Example of a JSON response returned when pagination is enabled on the /api/dataItems endpoint. The response includes a pager object with pagination details and an array of data items. Pagination is enabled by default on this endpoint. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_30 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "pager": { "page": 1, "pageCount": 20, "total": 969, "pageSize": 50 }, "dataItems": [...] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Listing Metadata Change Proposals in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Endpoint for retrieving all metadata change proposals with optional filtering by status or other fields using the filter parameter. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_111 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/metadata/proposals/ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing OpenJDK 8 for DHIS2 below 2.35 DESCRIPTION: Command to install OpenJDK 8, which is required for DHIS2 versions below 2.35. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo apt-get install -y openjdk-8-jdk ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Year-to-Date Expression in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: A simple year-to-date expression that sums all values from the beginning of the year up to the current period. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_22 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` #{a}.yearToDate() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a Basic Route in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: JSON request for creating a simple route without authentication that points to an external API endpoint. The route can be accessed using either its ID or code. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/route.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "Postman Echo", "code": "postman", "disabled": false, "url": "https://postman-echo.com/get" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sending data values with attribute option combos in nested JSON format in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to specify attribute option combos in a nested structure within the JSON payload when sending data values to DHIS2. This format includes the combo identifier and an array of option identifiers. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_28 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "dataElement": "BOSZApCrBni", "categoryOptionCombo": "TkDhg29x18A", "attribute": { "combo": "O4VaNks6tta", "options": [ "C6nZpLKjEJr", "i4Nbp8S2G6A" ] }, "dataSet": "lyLU2wR22tC", "period": "202201", "orgUnit": "DiszpKrYNg8", "value": "15", "comment": "Good" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Checking Organisation Unit Group Using d2:inOrgUnitGroup Function DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to check if the current organisation unit belongs to a specific group using the d2:inOrgUnitGroup function with a group code. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_47 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2:inOrgUnitGroup('HIGH_RISK_FACILITY') ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Multiple Dimension Analytics Query DESCRIPTION: Example of querying analytics data with multiple dimensions including data elements, periods, and organization units. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/analytics?dimension=dx:fbfJHSPpUQD;cYeuwXTCPkU&dimension=pe:2016Q1;2016Q2&dimension=ou:O6uvpzGd5pu;lc3eMKXaEfw ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Finding Maximum Value with greatest Function DESCRIPTION: Shows how to find the highest value among multiple expressions using the greatest function in a program indicator expression, which can compare data elements, attributes and literal values. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_25 LANGUAGE: expression CODE: ``` greatest(#{mCXR7u4kNBW.k8ja2Aif1Ae},#{mCXR7u4kNBW.NFkjsNiQ9PH},1) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Field Mask for Data Element in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to use special characters in the Field mask to provide formatting hints for data elements in the DHIS2 Android Capture app. It explains the meaning of different special characters and provides an example. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Character | Match | | ------------- |----------------| | \\d | digit | | \\x |lower case letter| | \\X | capital letter | | \\w |any alphanumeric character| For example, the pattern can be used to show hyphens as needed in the input field of the data element. E.g "\d\d\d-\d\d\d-\d\d\d, would show a hyphen for every third digit. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Program Stage Section Rendering Type Configuration in JSON DESCRIPTION: Example JSON payload for configuring the rendering type of a program stage section in DHIS2. This example sets the rendering type to MATRIX which affects how the section is displayed in client applications. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_43 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "renderingType": { "type": "MATRIX" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: OR Filtering on Data Elements by ID and Code in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use the 'rootJunction' parameter to switch the logical operator to OR, allowing either ID or code to match. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dataElements.json?filter=id:in:[id1,id2]&filter=code:eq:code1&rootJunction=OR ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Summing Values from Multiple Periods - DHIS2 Expression DESCRIPTION: Example demonstrating how to add values of a data element from two different preceding periods. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` #{FH8ab5Rog83}.periodOffset(-2) + \n#{FH8ab5Rog83}.periodOffset(-1) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: GS1 Application Identifier Reference Table in Markdown Format DESCRIPTION: A markdown table containing GS1 Application Identifiers (AIs) with their codes, descriptions, and format specifications. Includes identifiers for pricing, shipping, location tracking, and other supply chain management purposes. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_63 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | 395* | PRICE_UOM | Amount Payable per unit of measure single monetary area (variable measure trade item) | N4+N6 | Variable | | 400 | ORDER_NUMBER | Customers purchase order number | Variable | | 401 | GINC | Global Identification Number for Consignment (GINC) | Variable | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Uploading Static Content Using Curl DESCRIPTION: Example of uploading a logo file as static content SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/settings-and-configuration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -F "file=@logo.png;type=image/png" "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/33/staticContent/logo_front" -X POST -H "Content-Type: multipart/form-data" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: File Resources API Endpoint for Organisation Unit Images in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: API endpoint for uploading and managing file resources, used for organisation unit images. Supports JPG, JPEG, and PNG formats for the ORG_UNIT domain. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/organisation-unit-profile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` /api/fileResources ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: CSV Response Example for Tracked Entities in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Example of a CSV response from the DHIS2 Tracker API when querying tracked entities.
