The endpoint supports Z-score, Modified Z-score, and Min-max algorithms for outlier detection. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/36/outlierDetection ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Required Values for TextPattern Generation DESCRIPTION: API response showing required and optional values needed for generating tracked entity attribute values using TextPattern. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_20 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "REQUIRED": [ "ORG_UNIT_CODE" ], "OPTIONAL": [ "RANDOM" ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using d2:zScoreWFA Function in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Calculates the weight-for-age z-score based on WHO data. This function takes age in months, weight, and gender as parameters to calculate a nutritional status indicator for children. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_60 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` d2:zScoreWFA( ageInMonths, weight, gender ) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Downloading Metadata for Objects (Markdown) DESCRIPTION: Steps for downloading metadata for the currently viewed object, including options for format, compression, and sharing data. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` 1. Click the ![](resources/images/maintenance/icon_settings.png) icon to the top right of the list of objects you want to configure. 2. A dropdown-menu will appear, select **Download**. 3. A dialog will appear, where you can select the desired format and compression. 4. **With sharing** can be selected to include sharing-data for the metadata. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Deleting Validation Results by Creation Date and Notification Status in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Makes a DELETE request to remove validation results created in week 1 of 2019 and for which notifications have been sent. Combines filters with AND logic. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` DELETE /api/36/validationResults?created=2019W1¬ificationSent=true ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Listing DHIS2 Apps via cURL DESCRIPTION: Lists all installed DHIS2 apps in JSON format using basic authentication. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/apps.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -u user:pass -H "Accept: application/json" "http://server.com/api/33/apps" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Viewing Individual Metadata Change Proposal in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Endpoint for retrieving a specific metadata change proposal by its UID, with optional field filtering. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_113 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/metadata/proposals/ ``` LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/metadata/proposals/?fields=id,type,status,change ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring File Store for S3 Compatible Storage in Properties DESCRIPTION: Configuration properties for setting up an S3 compatible object store as the file store for DHIS2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_20 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` filestore.provider = s3 filestore.container = files filestore.endpoint = http://minio:9000 filestore.location = eu-west-1 filestore.identity = xxxx filestore.secret = xxxx ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Fetching Complete OpenAPI Documentation in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: HTTP GET requests to retrieve the complete OpenAPI documentation for the DHIS2 server in either JSON or YAML format. These endpoints generate a document containing all API endpoints, though the resulting file may be several megabytes in size. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/openapi.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` GET /api/openapi.json GET /api/openapi.yaml ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Enhanced Conditions in DHIS2 Events Query DESCRIPTION: Examples of using enhanced conditions in events query to create more complex logical expressions, including OR conditions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_28 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` dimension=a:GT:20:LT:40&dimension=b:GT:1:LT:5 ``` LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` dimension=a:GT:20:LT:40_OR_b:GT:1:LT:5&dimension=c:EQ:test ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Excluded Keywords for Program Rule Variable Names DESCRIPTION: List of keywords that cannot be used in program rule variable names due to system restrictions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_30 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` and or not ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring DHIS 2 Logout Without Okta Logout DESCRIPTION: This configuration property allows users to log out of DHIS 2 without also logging out of Okta. It replaces the end_session_endpoint with a local DHIS 2 logout action. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/configure-oidc-with-okta.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` oidc.provider.okta.end_session_endpoint = /dhis-web-commons-security/logout.action ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: User Creation cURL Command in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: cURL command example for creating a new user by POSTing the JSON payload. Specifies the content type as JSON and includes basic authentication. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -X POST -d @u.json "http://server/api/33/users" -u user:pass -H "Content-Type: application/json" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Cancelling a Running Job in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This endpoint requests cancellation of a running job of a specific type. The job will cooperatively stop at the next opportunity. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` POST /api/scheduling/cancel/{type} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: GET Enrollment Collection Response Format in JSON DESCRIPTION: Sample JSON response from the /api/tracker/enrollments endpoint showing the format of enrollment data returned. The response includes pagination information and enrollment details like dates, status, and references to related entities. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_32 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "pager": { "page": 1, "pageSize": 1 }, "enrollments": [ { "enrollment": "TRE0GT7eh7Q", "createdAt": "2019-08-21T13:28:00.056", "createdAtClient": "2018-11-13T15:06:49.009", "updatedAt": "2019-08-21T13:29:44.942", "updatedAtClient": "2019-08-21T13:29:44.942", "trackedEntity": "s4NfKOuayqG", "program": "M3xtLkYBlKI", "status": "COMPLETED", "orgUnit": "DiszpKrYNg8", "enrolledAt": "2023-11-13T00:00:00.000", "occurredAt": "2023-11-13T00:00:00.000", "followUp": false, "deleted": false, "storedBy": "healthworker1", "notes": [] } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating an Existing Job Queue in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This endpoint updates an existing job queue's CRON expression, job sequence, or name. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_20 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` PUT /api/scheduler/queues/{name} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering Validation Results by Creation Date in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Makes a GET request to retrieve validation results filtered by their creation date. This filter can be combined with other filters like organization unit or validation rule. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/36/validationResults?createdDate= ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Running Job Types in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This endpoint provides a list of all types of jobs that are currently running. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/scheduling/running/types ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example User Lookup by ID in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: Example of an API endpoint for retrieving information about a specific user using their identifier. In this case, the identifier is 'OYLGMiazHtW'. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` /api/users/OYLGMiazHtW ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Computing Stock Change Predictor Expression in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This expression calculates the inventory change during the period by subtracting used and lost items from restocked items for each data element in a group. This calculation uses data from the same period as the output. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_54 LANGUAGE: code CODE: ``` forEach ?de in :DEG:aIMu0nieph7 --> #{?de.CWa6eew5uco} - #{?de.nthohhie8Ba} - #{?de.Faey8Iphooy} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Data Element Objects Table in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Table showing different data element object types and their available functions in the Maintenance app SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Object type | Available functions | |---|---| | Data element | Create, edit, clone, share, delete, show details and translate | | Data element group | Create, edit, clone, share, delete, show details and translate | | Data element group set | Create, edit, clone, share, delete, show details and translate | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Testing Email Configuration via cURL DESCRIPTION: cURL command to test the SMTP setup by sending a test email to the authenticated user's email address. Requires the user to have a valid email address configured in their DHIS2 account. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/email.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "localhost/api/33/email/test" -X POST -H "Content-Type:application/json" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Pager Object With Total Count in Gist API Response (JSON) DESCRIPTION: Example of the pager object returned by the Gist API when 'total=true', including the total count of matches and additional pagination information. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata-gist.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "pager": { "page": 1, "pageSize": 50, "total": 1332, "nextPage": "/organisationUnits/gist?total=true&page=2", "pageCount": 27 } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Response for Updating or Deleting an Aggregate Data Exchange in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This JSON response is returned when successfully updating or deleting an aggregate data exchange. It includes the HTTP status, response type, and the unique identifier (UID) of the affected exchange. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-exchange.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "OK", "httpStatusCode": 200, "status": "OK", "response": { "responseType": "ObjectReport", "uid": "pG4bBTMiCqO", "klass": "org.hisp.dhis.dataexchange.aggregate.AggregateDataExchange", "errorReports": [] } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Password Reset Request in DHIS2 API (JSON) DESCRIPTION: Example of a POST request to reset a user's password. Requires new password and reset token from email link. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_25 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "newPassword": "ChangeMe123!", "resetToken": "token-value-from-email-link" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Event Analytics Hook - JSON DESCRIPTION: Example of creating an analytics table hook that runs after event analytics tables are populated. The hook deletes data for a specific data element from the temporary event analytics table. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_66 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "Delete data for a data element", "phase": "ANALYTICS_TABLE_POPULATED", "analyticsTableType": "EVENT", "sql": "delete from analytics_event_temp_lxaq7zs9vyr where dx = 'uDX9LKGRwaH'" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Generating Single Tracked Entity Attribute Value DESCRIPTION: API response for generating a single unique tracked entity attribute value with a 3-day reservation period. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_21 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "ownerObject": "TRACKEDENTITYATTRIBUTE", "ownerUid": "Gs1ICEQTPlG", "key": "RANDOM(X)-OSL", "value": "C-OSL", "created": "2018-03-02T12:01:36.680", "expiryDate": "2018-03-05T12:01:36.678" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving All Metadata Versions in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This endpoint returns a list of all metadata versions available in the system. Each version includes basic information like name, type, creation date, and hash code. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_98 LANGUAGE: plain CODE: ``` /api/metadata/version/history ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "metadataversions": [{ "name": "Version_1", "type": "BEST_EFFORT", "created": "2016-06-30T05:54:41.139+0000", "id": "SjnhUp6r4hG", "hashCode": "fd1398ff7ec9fcfd5b59d523c8680798" }, { "name": "Version_2", "type": "BEST_EFFORT", "created": "2016-06-30T05:59:33.238+0000", "id": "SaNyhusVxBG", "hashCode": "8050fb1a604e29d5566675c86d02d10b" }, { "name": "Version_3", "type": "BEST_EFFORT", "created": "2016-06-30T06:01:23.680+0000", "id": "FVkGzSjAAYg", "hashCode": "70b779ea448b0da23d8ae0bd59af6333" }] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Comparing Current Period with Year-to-Date Average in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Calculates the difference between the current period value and the year-to-date average, useful for trend analysis. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_24 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` #{a} - #{a}.yearToDate() / [periodInYear] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: DHIS2 Category Option Combo Merge Error Response Format DESCRIPTION: This JSON response demonstrates a failed merge operation with validation errors. It includes error codes, detailed error messages, and the merge report with empty sourcesDeleted array. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_52 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Conflict", "httpStatusCode": 409, "status": "WARNING", "message": "One or more errors occurred, please see full details in merge report.", "response": { "mergeReport": { "mergeErrors": [ { "message": "At least one source CategoryOptionCombo must be specified", "errorCode": "E1530", "args": [] }, { "message": "Target CategoryOptionCombo does not exist: `abcdefg1221`", "errorCode": "E1533", "args": [ "Target", "abcdefg1221" ] } ], "mergeType": "CategoryOptionCombo", "sourcesDeleted": [], "message": "CategoryOptionCombo merge has errors" } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Deleting Events in DHIS2 Tracker API DESCRIPTION: Deletes specific events by providing their UIDs in a POST request to /api/tracker endpoint with importStrategy=DELETE. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "events": [ { "event": "ZwwuwNp6gVd" }, { "event": "XwwuwNp6gVE" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Generating Random Alphanumeric IDs with Prefix in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This TextPattern uses a fixed prefix 'ABC_' followed by a random 4-character alphanumeric string. It allows for 14,776,336 possible unique values. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/dhis2-tutorials.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` "ABC_" + RANDOM(****) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving User Information by ID in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: API endpoint pattern for retrieving full information about a specific user using their identifier. The {id} placeholder is replaced with the actual user identifier. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` /api/users/{id} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Created By User Reference JSON Format in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example of how user references are included in metadata objects, showing both the new 'createdBy' property and the legacy 'user' property for backward compatibility introduced in DHIS2 version 2.36. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_106 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "createdBy": { "displayName": "John Kamara", "name": "John Kamara", "id": "N3PZBUlN8vq", "username": "district" }, "user": { "displayName": "John Kamara", "name": "John Kamara", "id": "N3PZBUlN8vq", "username": "district" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving data values using GET request in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: Example of retrieving an individual data value from DHIS2 using a GET request with data element, period, organisation unit, and category option combo parameters. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_26 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/dataValues?de=s46m5MS0hxu &pe=201301&ou=DiszpKrYNg8&co=Prlt0C1RF0s" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Generating Table Layout in Analytics API Response DESCRIPTION: Illustrates how to use tableLayout, columns, and rows parameters to generate a table-formatted response instead of a normalized data source. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: url CODE: ``` /api/analytics.html?dimension=dx:fbfJHSPpUQD;cYeuwXTCPkU&dimension=pe:2014Q1;2014Q2&dimension=ou:O6uvpzGd5pu&tableLayout=true&columns=dx;ou&rows=pe ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sending System Email Notification JSON Payload DESCRIPTION: JSON structure for sending a system email notification through the DHIS2 API. The payload includes a subject and text content that will be sent to the system notification email address configured in DHIS2 settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/email.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "subject": "Integrity check summary", "text": "All checks ran successfully" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating File Resource with Custom UID DESCRIPTION: Example of uploading a file resource with a specified UID. This approach allows controlling the identifier of the file resource rather than using system-generated values. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_92 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "https://server/api/fileResources?uid=0123456789x" -X POST -F "file=@/path/to/file/name-of-file.png" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Extracting Unique User Logins from Gzipped DHIS2 Log File (Bash) DESCRIPTION: This bash command extracts unique user logins from a gzipped, rotated DHIS2 log file. It uses zcat to read the compressed file, then filters and processes the data similar to the previous command. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/what-are-users-up-to.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` zcat /var/lib/dhis2/dhis/logs/catalina.out-20141101.gz |grep 'Login success' |cut -f 4,10 -d ' '|sort |uniq ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: OAuth2 Client Registration DESCRIPTION: JSON payload for registering a new OAuth2 client with specified grant types and redirect URIs. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/overview.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "OAuth2 Demo Client", "cid": "demo", "secret": "1e6db50c-0fee-11e5-98d0-3c15c2c6caf6", "grantTypes": [ "password", "refresh_token", "authorization_code" ], "redirectUris": [ "http://www.example.org" ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example Data Table - Monthly Reporting Summary DESCRIPTION: Table showing organization unit reporting data with monthly and year-to-date values SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/about-data-dimensions.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Organisation Unit | Data Element | Reporting month | So far this year | Reporting month name | |---|---|---|---|---| | Gerehun CHC | Measles doses given | 15 | 167 | Oct-09 | | Tugbebu CHP | Measles doses given | 17 | 155 | Oct-09 | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating View Events in Usage Analytics API (POST) DESCRIPTION: Shows how to create a new event view for charts using a POST request to the usage analytics API. The request requires eventType parameter to specify the type of item viewed and favorite parameter for the identifier of the relevant favorite. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_52 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` POST /api/dataStatistics?eventType=CHART_VIEW&favorite=LW0O27b7TdD ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a Data Element Count SQL View in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: SQL query that counts all data elements in the system. This view must be of type "View" or "Materialized View" to be callable by other SQL views. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_56 LANGUAGE: sql CODE: ``` select count(*) as count from dataelement; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Complex Indicator Formula with Period Offset - DHIS2 Expression DESCRIPTION: Example showing a complex formula that subtracts twice the value of a program data element from the previous period from a standard data element in the current period. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` #{FH8ab5Rog83} - 2 * D{IpHINAT79UW.uf3svrmp8Oj}.periodOffset(-1) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving DHIS2 System Context via Web API DESCRIPTION: HTTP GET request to retrieve only the system context information, including context path and user agent. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/maintenance.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: HTTP CODE: ``` /api/33/system/context ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying DHIS2 Database for Data Entry Activity (SQL) DESCRIPTION: This SQL query retrieves data entry activity from the DHIS2 database. It counts the number of data values entered by each user for each start date, filtered for entries after August 31, 2014. The results are grouped by start date and user, and ordered by start date. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/what-are-users-up-to.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: sql CODE: ``` psql -c "select startdate,storedby,count(*) dvs from datavalue join period on datavalue.periodid = period.periodid where lastupdated > '2014-08-31' group by startdate, storedby order by startdate" dhis ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering OpenAPI Documentation by Path or Tag in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: HTTP GET requests to generate OpenAPI documentation with a specific selection of root paths and/or tags using the general /openapi endpoint with path and tag query parameters. The examples show filtering by paths and by tags respectively. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/openapi.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` GET /api/openapi/openapi.json?path=/users&path=/dataElements GET /api/openapi/openapi.yaml?tag=system&tag=metadata ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Data Store Sharing Settings - JSON DESCRIPTION: Example JSON payload for configuring sharing settings of a data store key. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_20 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "object": { "publicAccess": "rw------", "externalAccess": false, "user": {}, "userAccesses": [], "userGroupAccesses": [ { "id": "hj0nnsVsPLU", "access": "rw------" }, { "id": "qMjBflJMOfB", "access": "r-------" } ] } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Organisation Unit Profile JSON Payload Structure in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Sample JSON payload for creating an organisation unit profile. It includes references to metadata attributes, organisation unit group sets, and data items (such as data elements, indicators, data sets, and program indicators). SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/organisation-unit-profile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "attributes": [ "xqWyz9jNCA5", "n2xYlNbsfko" ], "groupSets": [ "Bpx0589u8y0", "J5jldMd8OHv" ], "dataItems": [ "WUg3MYWQ7pt", "vg6pdjObxsm", "DTVRnCGamkV", "Uvn6LCg7dVU", "eTDtyyaSA7f" ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Changelog Settings in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Shows how to enable or disable changelogs for aggregate and tracker categories in DHIS2 using the dhis.conf configuration file. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/logging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` # Aggregate changelog, can be 'on' (default), 'off' changelog.aggregate = on # Tracker changelog, can be 'on' (default), 'off' changelog.tracker = on ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Instrumenting Glowroot for TrackedEntityInstance GET Requests DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration to instrument Glowroot for separating GET requests to /trackedEntityInstances. This allows for more detailed monitoring of specific API endpoints. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/glowroot.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "className": "org.hisp.dhis.webapi.controller.event.TrackedEntityInstanceController", "methodName": "getTrackedEntityInstances", "methodParameterTypes": [ ".." ], "captureKind": "other", "transactionType": "Web", "transactionNameTemplate": "/api/trackedEntityInstances: GET" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Analytics Dimensions in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates a sample request and response for querying analytics dimensions in the DHIS2 API. It includes parameters for program stage, ordering, and filtering. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_51 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "page":1, "total":5, "pageSize":50, "dimensions":[ { "dimensionType":"PROGRAM_INDICATOR", "created":"2015-08-06T22:49:20.128", "lastUpdated":"2015-08-06T22:51:19.787", "name":"Measles + Yellow fever doses low infant weight", "displayName":"Measles + Yellow fever doses low infant weight", "id":"tt54DiKuQ9c", "uid":"tt54DiKuQ9c", "displayShortName":"Measles + Yellow fever doses low infant weight" }, { "dimensionType":"PROGRAM_INDICATOR", "created":"2017-01-20T10:32:26.388", "lastUpdated":"2017-01-20T10:32:26.388", "name":"Weight gain(in g) between birth and last postnatal", "displayName":"Weight gain(in g) between birth and last postnatal", "id":"qhTkqwAJLMv", "uid":"qhTkqwAJLMv", "displayShortName":"Weight gain(g)" }, { "dimensionType":"PROGRAM_INDICATOR", "created":"2015-09-14T20:25:55.543", "lastUpdated":"2018-08-28T12:22:47.857", "name":"Average weight (g)", "displayName":"Average weight (g)", "id":"GxdhnY5wmHq", "uid":"GxdhnY5wmHq", "displayShortName":"Average weight (g)" }, { "dimensionType":"PROGRAM_INDICATOR", "created":"2015-08-06T22:35:40.391", "lastUpdated":"2015-08-06T22:35:40.391", "name":"BCG doses low birth weight", "displayName":"BCG doses low birth weight", "id":"hCYU0G5Ti2T", "uid":"hCYU0G5Ti2T", "displayShortName":"BCG doses low birth weight" }, { "valueType":"NUMBER", "dimensionType":"DATA_ELEMENT", "created":"2012-09-20T17:37:45.474", "lastUpdated":"2014-11-11T21:56:05.418", "name":"MCH Weight (g)", "displayName":"MCH Weight (g)", "id":"A03MvHHogjR.UXz7xuGCEhU", "uid":"UXz7xuGCEhU", "code":"DE_2005736", "displayShortName":"Weight (g)" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Rate Limiting for DHIS2 Analytics API with nginx DESCRIPTION: This nginx configuration implements rate limiting for the DHIS2 analytics API. It limits requests to 5 per second per IP address, with a burst allowance of 20 requests. This helps ensure fair resource allocation among users for compute-intensive API calls. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/reverse_proxy_nginx.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` http { .. limit_req_zone $binary_remote_addr zone=limit_analytics:10m rate=5r/s; server { .. location ~ ^/api/(\d+/)?analytics(.*)$ { limit_req zone=limit_analytics burst=20; proxy_pass http://localhost:8080/api/$1analytics$2$is_args$args; .. } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Dashboard Data in JSON Format DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the JSON response structure when retrieving a specific dashboard. It includes dashboard metadata, user information, dashboard items, and layout configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "lastUpdated" : "2013-10-15T18:17:34.084+0000", "id": "vQFhmLJU5sK", "created": "2013-09-08T20:55:58.060+0000", "name": "Mother and Child Health", "href": "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/dashboards/vQFhmLJU5sK", "publicAccess": "--------", "restrictFilters": false, "externalAccess": false, "itemCount": 17, "displayName": "Mother and Child Health", "access": { "update": true, "externalize": true, "delete": true, "write": true, "read": true, "manage": true }, "user": { "id": "xE7jOejl9FI", "name": "John Traore", "created": "2013-04-18T15:15:08.407+0000", "lastUpdated": "2014-12-05T03:50:04.148+0000", "href": "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/users/xE7jOejl9FI" }, "dashboardItems": [{ "id": "bu1IAnPFa9H", "created": "2013-09-09T12:12:58.095+0000", "lastUpdated": "2013-09-09T12:12:58.095+0000" }, { "id": "ppFEJmWWDa1", "created": "2013-09-10T13:57:02.480+0000", "lastUpdated": "2013-09-10T13:57:02.480+0000" }], "layout": { "spacing": { "column": 5, "row": 5 }, "columns": [{ "index": 0, "span": 2 }, { "index": 1, "span": 1 }] }, "userGroupAccesses": [] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sample Response for Cascade Sharing API DESCRIPTION: This JSON response illustrates the structure of the response from the cascade sharing API for dashboards, including error reports and updated objects. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/sharing.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "errorReports": [ { "message": "No matching object for reference. Identifier was s46m5MS0hxu, and object was DataElement.", "mainKlass": "org.hisp.dhis.dataelement.DataElement", "errorCode": "E5001", "errorProperties": [ "s46m5MS0hxu", "DataElement" ] } ], "countUpdatedDashBoardItems": 1, "updateObjects": { "dataElements": [ { "id": "YtbsuPPo010", "name": "Measles doses given" }, { "id": "l6byfWFUGaP", "name": "Yellow Fever doses given" } ] } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Enabling Data Dimension for Organisation Unit Group Sets in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to make a group set available to analytics as another dimension, in addition to standard dimensions. When enabled, the group set becomes available alongside "Period" and "Organisation unit" dimensions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_26 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` If you select **Data dimension**, the group set will be available to the analytics as another dimension, in addition to the standard dimensions of "Period" and "Organisation unit". ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting PostgreSQL Container Memory Limit DESCRIPTION: Command to set memory limits for the PostgreSQL LXD container using lxc config. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/post-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo lxc config set postgresql limits.memory 16GB ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Normal Distribution Functions in DHIS2 Expressions DESCRIPTION: Shows how to calculate the cumulative distribution function for a current period value based on historical data distribution in DHIS2 predictor expressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_41 LANGUAGE: Expression Language CODE: ``` normDistCum(#{T7OyqQpUpNd}) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Successful Indicator Type Merge Response DESCRIPTION: Example of a successful response after merging indicator types, including HTTP status code, operation status, and a merge report with details of deleted source indicator types. TITLE: Configuring Predictor Generator Expression in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This code snippet demonstrates the various aggregate functions and non-aggregating functions that can be used in the generator expression for a predictor in DHIS2. It includes examples of how to use these functions and their purposes. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_31 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Aggregate function | Means | |---|---| | avg(x) | Average (mean) value of x | | count(x) | Count of the values of x | | max(x) | Maximum value of x | | median(x) | Median value of x | | min(x) | Minimum value of x | | percentileCont(p, x) | Continuous percentile of x, where p is the percentile as a floating point number between 0 and 1. For example, p = 0 will return the lowest value, p = 0.5 will return the median, p = 0.75 will return the 75th percentile, p = 1 will return the highest value, etc. Continuous means that the value will be interpolated if necessary. For example, percentileCont( 0.5, #{FTRrcoaog83} ) will return 2.5 if the sampled values of data element FTRrcoaog83 are 1, 2, 3, and 4. | | stddev(x) | Standard deviation of x. This function is eqivalent to stddevSamp. It's suggested that you use the function stddevSamp instead for greater clarity. | | stddevPop(x) | Population standard deviation of x: sqrt( sum( (x - avg(x))^2 ) / n ) | | stddevSamp(x) | Sample standard deviation of x: sqrt( sum( (x - avg(x))^2 ) / ( n - 1 ) ). Note that this value is not computed when there is only one sample. | | sum(x) | Sum of the values of x | ``` LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Function | Means | |---|---| | contains(expr, sub1, ...) | Searches an expression for one or more substrings. Returns true if the expression contains all the substrings. For example, the following are all true: contains("abcd", "abcd"); contains("abcd", "b"); and contains("abcd", "ab", "bc"). Comparisons are case-sensitive. | | containsItems(expr, item1, ...) | Searches an expression for one or more items. The expression is made up of comma-separated elements. containsItems returns true if every item exactly matches an element in the expression. For example, containsItems("abcd", "abcd") and containsItems("ab,cd", "ab", "cd") are true, but containsItems("abcd", "b") and containsItems("abcd", "ab", "bc") are false. Comparisons are case-sensitive. containsItems can be used for multi-valued data elements to see if an item is contained in the data element values. | | if(test, valueIfTrue, valueIfFalse) | Evaluates **test** which is an expression that evaluates to a boolean value -- see **Boolean expression notes** below. If the test is **true**, returns the **valueIfTrue** expression. If it is **false**, returns the **valueIfFalse** expression. | | is(expr1 in expression [, expression ...]) | Returns true if expr1 is equal to any of the following expressions, otherwise false. | | isNull(item) | Returns the boolean value **true** if the **item** is null (missing), otherwise returns **false**. The **item** can be any selected item from the right (data element, program data element, etc.). | | isNotNull(item) | Returns **true** if the **item** value is not missing (not null), otherwise **false**. | | firstNonNull(item [, item ...]) | Returns the value of the first **item** that is not missing (not null). Can be provided any number of arguments. Any argument may also be a numeric or string literal, which will be returned if all the previous items have missing values. | | greatest(expression [, expression ...]) | Returns the greatest (highest) value of the expressions given. Can be provided any number of arguments. | | least(expression [, expression ...]) | Returns the least (lowest) value of the expressions given. Can be provided any number of arguments. | | log(expression [, base ]) | Returns the natural logarithm (base e) of the numeric expression. If an integer is given as a second argument, returns the logarithm using that base. | | log10(expression) | Returns the common logarithm (base 10) of the numeric expression. | | normDistCum(x [,mean [,stddev]]) | Returns the cumulative distribution function (CDF) value for x given the normalized distribution described by the mean and stddev. Equivalent to Excel NORM.DIST(x,mean,stddev,TRUE) or LibreOffice NORMDIST(x,mean,stddev,1). If stddev is not given, it is computed from past sampled values of x. If neither mean nor stddev are given, they are computed from past sampled valeus of x. See examples. | | normDistDen(x [,mean [,stddev]]) | Returns the probability density function (PDF) value for x given the normalized distribution described by the mean and stddev. Equivalent to Excel NORM.DIST(x,mean,stddev,FALSE) or LibreOffice NORMDIST(x,mean,stddev,0). If stddev is not given, it is computed from past sampled values of x. If neither mean nor stddev are given, they are computed from past sampled valeus of x. See examples. | | null | Returns no result. For example, _if( #{FH8ab5Rog83}<0, null, 1 )_ returns nothing if the data element value is less than 0, otherwise 1. | | orgUnit.ancestor(orgUnitUid [, orgUnitUid ...]) | Returns true if the organisation unit is a descendant of any of the (1 or more) organisation units, otherwise false. | | orgUnit.dataSet(dataSetUid [, dataSetUid ...]) | Returns true if the organisation unit is assigned to any of the (1 or more) data sets, otherwise false. | | orgUnit.group(ouGroupUid [, ouGroupUid ...]) | Returns true if the organisation unit is a member of any of the (1 or more) organisation unit groups, otherwise false. | | orgUnit.program(programUid [, programUid ...]) | Returns true if the organisation unit is assigned to any of the (1 or more) programs, otherwise false. | | removeZeros(expression) | Returns nothing if the expression value is 0, otherwise returns the expression value. | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Case-Insensitive Name Filtering for Data Elements in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Shows how to perform a case-insensitive filter on the name property of data elements using the 'ieq' operator. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dataElements?filter=name:ieq:mydataelement ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sending Category Option Combo Merge Request in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows the HTTP request method and endpoint for merging category option combos in DHIS2. The endpoint accepts a POST request to the /api/categoryOptionCombos/merge path. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_49 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` POST /api/categoryOptionCombos/merge ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing DHIS2 App via cURL DESCRIPTION: Installs a DHIS2 app by uploading a ZIP file using POST request with form data. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/apps.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -X POST -u user:pass -F file=@app.zip "http://server.com/api/33/apps" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Statistics for a Specific Favorite DESCRIPTION: Shows how to retrieve view statistics for a specific favorite using its identifier. The request returns the number of views for the given favorite object. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_59 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dataStatistics/favorites/{favorite-id}.json ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Response for Retrieved Value DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response showing the value retrieved for a specific key in a namespace from the DHIS2 Data Store. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "foo":"bar" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Counting Positive Fundal Height Discrepancies Using d2:countIfZeroPos Function DESCRIPTION: This example shows how to count the number of zero or positive values for a source field (fundalHeightDiscrepancy) using the d2:countIfZeroPos function. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_42 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2:countIfZeroPos('fundalHeightDiscrepancy') ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Invalid Path Error Response DESCRIPTION: Example of error response when an invalid path is provided in a PATCH request. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_30 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Bad Request", "httpStatusCode": 400, "status": "ERROR", "message": "Invalid path /test" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Generic OIDC Provider in DHIS2 properties file DESCRIPTION: Example dhis.conf configuration for enabling OIDC login with a generic provider (HelseID in this case). Shows the basic structure for configuring a custom OIDC provider in DHIS2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/oauth.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` # Enables OIDC login oidc.oauth2.login.enabled = on ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sending File Resources to DHIS2 Server DESCRIPTION: Example of using cURL to upload a file resource to DHIS2. The request posts to the /api/fileResources endpoint with a multipart upload containing the file to be stored. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_91 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "https://server/api/fileResources" -X POST -F "file=@/path/to/file/name-of-file.png" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: SQL Query Using Custom R-based Aggregate Functions DESCRIPTION: SQL query that retrieves indicator data at district level and calculates statistical summaries using the custom R-based functions created with PL/R. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/dhis2-and-r-integration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: sql CODE: ``` SELECT ou.shortname,avg(dv.value), median(dv.value),skewness(dv.value) FROM aggregatedindicatorvalue dv INNER JOIN period p on p.periodid = dv.periodid INNER JOIN organisationunit ou on dv.organisationunitid = ou.organisationunitid WHERE dv.indicatorid = 112670 AND dv.level = 3 AND dv.periodtypeid = 3 AND p.startdate >='2009-01-01' GROUP BY ou.shortname; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Delete User Data Store Key DESCRIPTION: Deletes a specific key from the user data store using DELETE request. Requires authentication. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_23 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -X DELETE -u admin:district "play.dhis2.org/api/33/userDataStore/foo/bar" ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus":"OK", "httpStatusCode":200, "status":"OK", "message":"Key 'bar' deleted from the namespace 'foo." } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sending Mortality Data Request Message in XML DESCRIPTION: XML example of a specific message being sent to a single user with ID 'PhzytPW3g2J', inquiring about mortality data reporting for January 2014. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` Mortality data reporting Have you reported data for the Mortality data set for January 2014? ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Extracting Left Substring Using d2:left Function DESCRIPTION: This example shows how to extract the leftmost 3 characters from a text variable using the d2:left function. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_48 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2:left(#{variableWithText}, 3) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Tomcat Connector in XML DESCRIPTION: XML configuration for Tomcat's HTTP connector, including port and character encoding settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_18 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Recursive Filtering on Data Elements' Data Sets in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Illustrates recursive filtering by retrieving data elements associated with a specific data set ID. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dataElements?filter=dataSetElements.dataSet.id:eq:ID1 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Synchronization Endpoint for Availability Check in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: API endpoint for checking the availability of a remote data server and verifying user credentials. This endpoint uses a GET request to confirm connectivity before attempting synchronization operations. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/synchronization.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/33/synchronization/availability ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Editing PostgreSQL Configuration File DESCRIPTION: Opens the PostgreSQL configuration file for editing using the nano text editor. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/postgresql.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo nano /etc/postgresql/12/main/postgresql.conf ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: I18n String Retrieval Request DESCRIPTION: Example request payload for retrieving translated strings using the i18n endpoint. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/i18n.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ "access_denied", "uploading_data_notification" ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sending Inbound SMS with JSON Payload DESCRIPTION: Example JSON payload for receiving inbound SMS messages. The payload includes the message text, originator number, gateway ID, received date, sent date, SMS encoding, and SMS status. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/sms.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "text": "sample text", "originator": "004712341234", "gatewayid": "unknown", "receiveddate": "2016-05-01", "sentdate":"2016-05-01", "smsencoding": "1", "smsstatus":"1" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Authentication Header Format in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Format specification for the Basic authentication header using Base64 encoded credentials SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/overview.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` Authorization: Basic base64encode(username:password) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Deleting Validation Result by ID in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Makes a DELETE request to remove a specific validation result by its ID. Requires the 'Perform maintenance tasks' authority. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` DELETE /api/36/validationResults/ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering Data Elements with Non-null Option Set in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Shows how to retrieve data elements that have any option set assigned using the '!null' operator. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dataElements?filter=optionSet:!null ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Combining zing and oizp Functions in a Program Indicator Expression DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use d2:zing (returns zero if expression is negative) and d2:oizp (returns one if expression is zero or positive) functions together in a program indicator expression. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_17 LANGUAGE: expression CODE: ``` d2:zing(A{GPkGfbmArby}) + d2:oizp(#{mCXR7u4kNBW.NFkjsNiQ9PH})) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Nginx Reverse Proxy Configuration DESCRIPTION: Nginx configuration for setting up reverse proxy for Prometheus. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/monitoring.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` server { listen 1234; location / { proxy_pass http://localhost:9090/; } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Prometheus Metrics Format Response DESCRIPTION: Example response showing data integrity check metrics in Prometheus plain text format. Includes counts, percentages and durations for various integrity checks. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_18 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` # HELP dhis_data_integrity_check_count Data integrity check counts # TYPE dhis_data_integrity_check_count gauge dhis_data_integrity_check_count{check="orgunits_invalid_geometry"} 1 dhis_data_integrity_check_count{check="user_groups_scarce"} 0 dhis_data_integrity_check_count{check="indicator_no_analysis"} 13 # HELP dhis_data_integrity_check_percentage Data integrity check percentages # TYPE dhis_data_integrity_check_percentage gauge dhis_data_integrity_check_percentage{check="orgunits_invalid_geometry"} 0.13054830287206268 dhis_data_integrity_check_percentage{check="user_groups_scarce"} 0.0 dhis_data_integrity_check_percentage{check="indicator_no_analysis"} 16.0 # HELP dhis_data_integrity_check_duration Data integrity check durations # TYPE dhis_data_integrity_check_duration gauge dhis_data_integrity_check_duration{check="orgunits_invalid_geometry"} 11 dhis_data_integrity_check_duration{check="user_groups_scarce"} 1 dhis_data_integrity_check_duration{check="indicator_no_analysis"} 0 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating Sharing with JSON Patch API DESCRIPTION: This JSON Patch payload demonstrates how to update the sharing settings of a DHIS2 object using the new JSON Patch API, specifically adding user permissions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/sharing.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ { "op": "replace", "path": "/sharing/users", "value": { "NOOF56dveaZ": { "access": "rw------", "id": "NOOF56dveaZ" }, "Kh68cDMwZsg": { "access": "rw------", "id": "Kh68cDMwZsg" } } } ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using d2:zScoreWFH Function in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Calculates the weight-for-height z-score based on WHO data. This function evaluates a child's weight relative to height and gender, providing an indicator of wasting or overweight status. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_62 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` d2:zScoreWFH( height, weight, gender ) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Calculating Daily Average Using Division in DHIS2 Expressions DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates dividing the sum of data element values by the number of days to calculate an average daily value in DHIS2 predictor expressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_34 LANGUAGE: Expression Language CODE: ``` sum(D{IpHINAT79UW.eMyVanycQSC}) / sum([days]) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using d2:validatePattern Function in DHIS2 - Name Validation DESCRIPTION: Validates if a name contains any numeric digits. This pattern will match only if the name does not contain any digits, triggering actions if digits are present. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_58 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` !d2:validatePattern(A{name},'[^\\d]*') ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Tomcat to Listen Only for Local Connections DESCRIPTION: XML configuration for the Tomcat Connector to improve security by making Tomcat only listen for local connections. This is added to the server.xml file after setting up a reverse proxy. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_42 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Trigram Index Summary in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: This JSON snippet shows the response format when retrieving a summary of trigram index status in DHIS2. It includes information about indexed attributes, indexable attributes, and obsolete indexed attributes. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/maintenance.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "indexedAttributes": [{ "displayName": "First name", "id": "w75KJ2mc4zz" }, { "displayName": "Last name", "id": "zDhUuAYrxNC" }], "indexableAttributes": [{ "displayName": "Phone number", "id": "P2cwLGskgxn" }], "obsoleteIndexedAttributes": [{ "displayName": "TB identifier", "id": "xs8A6tQJY0s" }, { "displayName": "Provider ID", "id": "DODgdr5Oo2v" }] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring File-based Audit Logging in dhis.conf DESCRIPTION: Configuration to save audit logs to a file instead of the database. This is the default in DHIS2 version 2.38 and later, storing logs in dhis-audit.log. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/concepts/audit.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` audit.database = off audit.logger = on ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: I18n String Retrieval Response DESCRIPTION: Example response showing translated key-value pairs from the i18n endpoint. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/i18n.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "access_denied":"Access denied", "uploading_data_notification":"Uploading locally stored data to the server" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Status of a Specific Running Job in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This endpoint retrieves the detailed status of a running job of a specific type. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/scheduling/running/{type} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: User Assignment Modes for Tracked Entities Endpoint in DHIS2 Tracker API DESCRIPTION: Table explaining the available assigned user modes for filtering tracked entities by assignment status. The modes include CURRENT (logged-in user), PROVIDED (specified users), NONE (unassigned only), ANY (any assigned), and ALL (default, no filtering). SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_25 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Mode | Description | |---|---| | CURRENT | Includes events assigned to the current logged in user. | | PROVIDED | Includes events assigned to the user provided in the request. | | NONE | Includes unassigned events only. | | ANY | Includes all assigned events, regardless of who they are assigned to, as long as they are assigned to someone. | | ALL | Includes all events irrespective of whether a user is assigned. This is the default mode. | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Job Queue Details in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This endpoint retrieves all details of a specific job queue, including its name, CRON expression, and job sequence. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_18 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/scheduler/queues/{name} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Response for Fields Query with Hoisted Alias DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response when using the hoist alias to extract deeply nested properties to the root level in the result. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ { "key": "key1", "my-prop": 42}, { "key": "key2", "my-prop": 13} ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: AND Filtering on Data Elements by ID and Code in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates default AND filtering where both ID and code must match for results to be returned. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dataElements.json?filter=id:in:[id1,id2]&filter=code:eq:code1 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: File Resource Response Structure DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response after successfully creating a file resource. The response includes file metadata such as name, content type, content length, MD5 hash, and storage status, which indicates whether the file has been fully persisted to storage. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_95 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Accepted", "httpStatusCode": 202, "status": "OK", "response": { "responseType": "FileResource", "fileResource": { "name": "name-of-file.png", "created": "2015-10-16T16:34:20.654+0000", "lastUpdated": "2015-10-16T16:34:20.667+0000", "externalAccess": false, "publicAccess": "--------", "user": { ... }, "displayName": "name-of-file.png", "contentType": "image/png", "contentLength": 512571, "contentMd5": "4e1fc1c3f999e5aa3228d531e4adde58", "storageStatus": "PENDING", "id": "xm4JwRwke0i" } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: GET/POST Tracker API Endpoints DESCRIPTION: List of new tracker API endpoints introduced in DHIS2 2.36 SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` POST /api/tracker GET /api/tracker/trackedEntities GET /api/tracker/enrollments GET /api/tracker/events GET /api/tracker/relationships ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Custom ID Scheme XML Example DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to specify custom identifier schemes in the XML payload for data import. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data.md#2025-04-22_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Response Example for Tracked Entities in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Example of a JSON response from the DHIS2 Tracker API when querying tracked entities. It includes pagination information, tracked entity details, and associated attributes. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_27 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "pager": { "page": 1, "pageSize": 1 }, "trackedEntities": [ { "trackedEntity": "F8yKM85NbxW", "trackedEntityType": "Zy2SEgA61ys", "createdAt": "2019-08-21T13:25:38.022", "createdAtClient": "2019-03-19T01:12:16.624", "updatedAt": "2019-08-21T13:31:33.410", "updatedAtClient": "2019-03-19T01:12:16.624", "orgUnit": "DiszpKrYNg8", "inactive": false, "deleted": false, "potentialDuplicate": false, "geometry": { "type": "Point", "coordinates": [ -11.7896, 8.2593 ] }, "attributes": [ { "attribute": "B6TnnFMgmCk", "displayName": "Age (years)", "createdAt": "2019-08-21T13:25:38.477", "updatedAt": "2019-08-21T13:25:38.477", "storedBy": "braimbault", "valueType": "INTEGER_ZERO_OR_POSITIVE", "value": "30" }, { "attribute": "TfdH5KvFmMy", "displayName": "First Name", "createdAt": "2019-08-21T13:25:38.066", "updatedAt": "2019-08-21T13:25:38.067", "storedBy": "josemp10", "valueType": "TEXT", "value": "Sarah" }, { "attribute": "aW66s2QSosT", "displayName": "Last Name", "createdAt": "2019-08-21T13:25:38.388", "updatedAt": "2019-08-21T13:25:38.388", "storedBy": "karoline", "valueType": "TEXT", "value": "Johnson" } ] } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving DataElement Translations Response DESCRIPTION: Example response showing translations for a DataElement object including properties like name and short name in different locales. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/i18n.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "fbfJHSPpUQD", "href": "https://play.dhis2.org/dev/api/29/dataElements/fbfJHSPpUQD", "created": "2010-02-05T10:58:43.646", "name": "ANC 1st visit", "shortName": "ANC 1st visit", "translations": [ { "property": "SHORT_NAME", "locale": "en_GB", "value": "ANC 1st visit" }, { "property": "NAME", "locale": "fr", "value": "Soin prénatal 1" }, { "property": "NAME", "locale": "en_GB", "value": "ANC 1st visit" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Combined Filtering with OR Junction in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates combining identifiable token filtering with property-based filtering using OR logical operator. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_17 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dataElements.json?filter=identifiable:token:ANC visit &filter=displayName:ilike:tt1&rootJunction=OR ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Predictors in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: HTTP GET request endpoint for retrieving predictors. Predictors are used to generate data values based on expressions for targets, thresholds, or estimated values. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_75 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` /api/predictors ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering Data Elements by Group Membership in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Shows how to filter data elements that are members of a specific data element group using the group's ID. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dataElements.json?filter=dataElementGroups.id:eq:qfxEYY9xAl6 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Relative Period Values List DESCRIPTION: List of available relative period values that can be used in the analytics API. These periods are relative to the current date for creating dynamic reports. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/overview.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` THIS_WEEK, LAST_WEEK, LAST_4_WEEKS, LAST_12_WEEKS, LAST_52_WEEKS, THIS_MONTH, LAST_MONTH, THIS_BIMONTH, LAST_BIMONTH, THIS_QUARTER, LAST_QUARTER, THIS_SIX_MONTH, LAST_SIX_MONTH, MONTHS_THIS_YEAR, QUARTERS_THIS_YEAR, THIS_YEAR, MONTHS_LAST_YEAR, QUARTERS_LAST_YEAR, LAST_YEAR, LAST_5_YEARS, LAST_10_YEARS, LAST_10_FINANCIAL_YEARS, LAST_12_MONTHS, LAST_3_MONTHS, LAST_6_BIMONTHS, LAST_4_QUARTERS, LAST_2_SIXMONTHS, THIS_FINANCIAL_YEAR, LAST_FINANCIAL_YEAR, LAST_5_FINANCIAL_YEARS ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Removing a Message Conversation in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to remove a message conversation for a specific user using a DELETE request to the DHIS2 API. The example shows removing user 'xE7jOejl9FI' from conversation 'jMe43trzrdi'. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/33/messageConversations/jMe43trzrdi ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Chart Layout in DHIS2 Data Visualizer DESCRIPTION: Instructions for setting up the series, category, and filter dimensions in a DHIS2 chart. This process involves using the Layout feature to drag and drop dimensions into appropriate sections. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/classic-data-visualizer.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` 1. Click **Layout**. 2. Drag and drop the dimensions to the appropriate space. Only one dimension can be in each section. 3. Click **Update**. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example Filter Using Attributes and Data Elements in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: A filter that combines conditions for both an attribute and a data element, checking if the attribute with ID 'cejWyOfXge6' equals 'Female' and if the data element has a value less than or equal to 2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_29 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` A{cejWyOfXge6} == 'Female' and #{A03MvHHogjR.a3kGcGDCuk6} <= 2 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Calculating Days into Current Pregnancy Week Using d2:modulus Function DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to calculate the number of days a woman is into her current pregnancy week using the d2:modulus function. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_51 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2:modulus(#{gestationalAgeDays},7) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Server-Side Program Rule Execution DESCRIPTION: Property to enable or disable execution of server-side program rules in DHIS2. This refers to program rules with actions for assigning values, sending messages, or scheduling messages. Default is 'on'. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_39 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` system.program_rule.server_execution = on | off ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: DHIS2 Category Option Combo Merge Success Response Format DESCRIPTION: This JSON response shows a successful category option combo merge operation. It includes the HTTP status, merge report details, and the list of deleted source category option combos. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_51 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "OK", "httpStatusCode": 200, "status": "OK", "response": { "mergeReport": { "mergeErrors": [], "mergeType": "CategoryOptionCombo", "sourcesDeleted": [ "FbLZS3ueWbQ", "dPSWsKeAZNw" ], "message": "CategoryOptionCombo merge complete" } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Data Value Analytics Hook - JSON DESCRIPTION: Example of creating an analytics table hook that runs after the data value analytics table is populated. The hook updates monthly values in the analytics temporary table. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_65 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "Update 'Currently on treatment' data in analytics table", "phase": "ANALYTICS_TABLE_POPULATED", "analyticsTableType": "DATA_VALUE", "sql": "update analytics_temp set monthly = '200212' where monthly in ('200210', '200211')" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving a Value from a Namespace and Key with cURL DESCRIPTION: Example of how to use cURL to retrieve the value associated with a specific key in a namespace from the DHIS2 Data Store. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "play.dhis2.org/demo/api/33/dataStore/foo/key_1"-u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Job Errors in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This endpoint retrieves errors associated with a specific job configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/jobConfigurations/{id}/errors ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: User Lookup Response in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response from a user lookup request. Contains minimal user information including ID, username, first name, surname, and display name. dataelementid

sourceid

value

categoryoptioncomboid
