potential duplicate record in the DHIS2 API. Contains creation timestamps, reference UIDs for both the original and duplicate records, the current status, and a unique identifier. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_54 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "created": "2024-06-04T10:11:29.110", "lastUpdated": "2024-06-04T10:11:29.110", "original": "", "duplicate": "", "status": "OPEN|INVALID|MERGED", "id": "" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring DHIS2 Session Timeout DESCRIPTION: Property to set the user session timeout in seconds for DHIS2. The default value is 3600 seconds (1 hour). SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_36 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` system.session.timeout = (seconds) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Checking Spatial Reference System with ogrinfo DESCRIPTION: Command to determine the spatial reference system of a shapefile using ogrinfo tool. This helps verify the coordinate system before conversion. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-the-gis-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ogrinfo -al -so filename.shp ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example DHIS2 System Information JSON Response DESCRIPTION: Sample JSON response from the system information endpoint, including various system properties and configurations. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/maintenance.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: JSON CODE: ``` { "contextPath": "http://yourdomain.com", "userAgent": "Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 Chrome/29.0.1547.62", "calendar": "iso8601", "dateFormat": "yyyy-mm-dd", "serverDate": "2021-01-05T09:16:03.548", "serverTimeZoneId": "Etc/UTC", "serverTimeZoneDisplayName": "Coordinated Universal Time", "version": "2.13-SNAPSHOT", "revision": "11852", "buildTime": "2013-09-01T21:36:21.000+0000", "serverDate": "2013-09-02T12:35:54.311+0000", "environmentVariable": "DHIS2_HOME", "javaVersion": "1.7.0_06", "javaVendor": "Oracle Corporation", "javaIoTmpDir": "/tmp", "javaOpts": "-Xms600m -Xmx1500m -XX:PermSize=400m -XX:MaxPermSize=500m", "osName": "Linux", "osArchitecture": "amd64", "osVersion": "3.2.0-52-generic", "externalDirectory": "/home/dhis/config/dhis2", "databaseInfo": { "type": "PostgreSQL", "name": "dhis2", "user": "dhis", "spatialSupport": false }, "memoryInfo": "Mem Total in JVM: 848 Free in JVM: 581 Max Limit: 1333", "cpuCores": 8 } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Organisation Unit Information Response with Image Reference in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Sample JSON response from the organisation units endpoint showing an organisation unit with an image reference. The image property contains the file resource ID that can be used to retrieve the actual image file. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/organisation-unit-profile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "Rp268JB6Ne4", "name": "Adonkia CHP", "image": { "id": "{file-resource-id}" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Dimensions List Endpoint DESCRIPTION: Base endpoint to retrieve a complete list of dynamic dimensions from the DHIS2 Web API. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dimensions ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Object Style Configuration in JSON DESCRIPTION: JSON payload for setting the visual style of a DHIS2 metadata object. This configures both a hexadecimal color code and an icon name that client applications can use to visually represent the object in their interfaces. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_45 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "style": { "color": "#ffffff", "icon": "my-beautiful-icon" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a Dashboard in JSON Format DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the minimal JSON payload required to create a new dashboard. The only required attribute is the dashboard name. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "My dashboard" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Overview of Running Jobs in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This endpoint provides an overview of all running jobs by job type. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/scheduling/running ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating Attribute Values in DHIS2 Tracker API DESCRIPTION: Updates attribute values for a tracked entity by making a POST request to /api/tracker endpoint. Requires specifying the tracked entity ID and all non-collection fields even if unchanged. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "trackedEntities": [ { "trackedEntity": "PQfMcpmXeFE", "trackedEntityType": "nEenWmSyUEp", "orgUnit": "DiszpKrYNg8", "attributes": [ { "attribute": "w75KJ2mc4zz", "code": "MMD_PER_NAM", "displayName": "First name", "createdAt": "2016-08-03T23:49:43.308", "updatedAt": "2016-08-03T23:49:43.308", "valueType": "TEXT", "value": "Johnny" } ] } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: I18n API Curl Command Example DESCRIPTION: Example curl command for making a POST request to the i18n endpoint with authentication. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/i18n.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -d @keys.json "play.dhis2.org/demo/api/33/i18n" -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a Push Analysis Job Configuration in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates the JSON structure for creating a push analysis job configuration in DHIS2. It includes a job parameter specifying the UIDs of push analyses to run. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "Push anlysis charts", "jobType": "PUSH_ANALYSIS", "cronExpression": "0 * * ? * *", "jobParameters": { "pushAnalysis": [ "jtcMAKhWwnc" ] } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Selection Modes Table in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Markdown table showing different selection modes for organization units in the Event Reports app. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/using-the-event-reports-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Selection mode | Description | |---|---| | **Select organisation units** | Lets you select the organisation units you want to appear in the chart from the organization tree.

Select **User org unit** to disable the organisation unit tree and only select the organisation unit that is related to your profile.

Select **User sub-units** to disable the organisation unit tree and only select the sub-units of the organisation unit that is related to your profile.

Select **User sub-x2-units** to disable the organisation unit tree and only select organisation units two levels down from the organisation unit that is related to your profile.

This functionality is useful for administrators to create a meaningful "system" favorite. With this option checked all users find their respective organisation unit when they open the favorite. | | **Select levels** | Lets you select all organisation units at one or more levels, for example national or district level.

You can also select the parent organisation unit in the tree, which makes it easy to select for example, all facilities inside one or more districts. | | **Select groups** | Lets you select all organisation units inside one or several groups and parent organisation units at the same time, for example hospitals or chiefdoms. | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Complete Data Set Registration Example - XML Format DESCRIPTION: Example XML payload for registering complete data sets in DHIS2 SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_25 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: SMS Command Parser Type Configuration Table DESCRIPTION: Definition table showing which parser types require which configuration parameters including user groups, programs, program stages and data sets. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/sms-configuration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Parser type | User group | Program | Program Stage | Data set | |-|-|-|-|-| | Alert parter | ✓ | ✕ | ✕ | ✕ | | Event registration parser | ✕ | ✓ | ✓ | ✕ | | J2ME parser | ✕ | ✕ | ✕ | ✓ | | Key value parser | ✕ | ✕ | ✕ | ✓ | | Program stage data entry parser | ✕ | ✓ | ✓ | ✕ | | Tracked entity registration parser | ✕ | ✓ | ✕ | ✕ | | Unregistered parser | ✓ | ✕ | ✕ | ✕ | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: SQL Query with System-Defined User Variables DESCRIPTION: SQL query that uses system-defined variables to access information about the current user. This example shows all organization units assigned to the currently logged-in user. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_26 LANGUAGE: sql CODE: ``` select ou.path, ou.name from organisationunit ou_user join organisationunit ou on ou.path like ou_user.path || '%' join usermembership um on um.organisationunitid = ou_user.organisationunitid where um.userinfoid = ${_current_user_id} order by ou.path; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Multiplication with Program Attributes in DHIS2 Expressions DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates multiplying a constant by a program attribute value in DHIS2 predictor expressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_36 LANGUAGE: Expression Language CODE: ``` 1.2 * A{IpHINAT79UW.RKLKz1H20EE} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Encryption Configuration DESCRIPTION: Property setting for configuring data encryption password in DHIS2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/dhis.conf.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` encryption.password = xxxx ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Update User Data Store Value DESCRIPTION: Updates an existing value in the user data store using PUT request. Requires authentication and content-type specification. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_22 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -X PUT -H "Content-Type: application/json" -u admin:district -d "['new value']" "play.dhis2.org/api/33/userDataStore/foo/bar" ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus":"Created", "httpStatusCode":201, "status":"OK", "message":"Key 'bar' in namespace 'foo' updated." } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using 'in' Operator for String Comparison in DHIS2 Expressions DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates checking if a data element value matches specific string values using the 'in' operator in DHIS2 predictor expressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_38 LANGUAGE: Expression Language CODE: ``` if(is(#{jeiTh8ahyae} in 'NEGATIVE','UNKNOWN'), 0, 1) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: System Authorities Response Format DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response format from the /api/authorities endpoint showing system authority IDs and names. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/overview.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "systemAuthorities": [ { "id": "ALL", "name": "ALL" }, { "id": "F_ACCEPT_DATA_LOWER_LEVELS", "name": "Accept data at lower levels" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example Response: Relative URLs in Gist API DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the default behavior of the Gist API where URIs are returned as relative paths, without using the absoluteUrls parameter. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata-gist.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "rWLrZL8rP3K", "href": "/users/rWLrZL8rP3K/gist" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Making a POST Request to System Settings with curl DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to set a system setting value using curl, where the value is sent in the request body with Content-Type as text/plain. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/settings-and-configuration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "play.dhis2.org/demo/api/33/systemSettings/my-key" -d "My long value" -H "Content-Type: text/plain" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running DHIS2 Documentation Build in Docker Container DESCRIPTION: Command to build DHIS2 documentation using Docker, mounting the current directory to /source inside the container. This allows users to build the documentation without installing dependencies locally. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/docker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` docker run --rm -it -v "$(pwd):/source" dhis2/dhis2-docs-builder ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating an Interpretation with cURL in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: cURL command example for creating a new interpretation for a visualization, specifying the interpretation text in the request body with text/plain content type. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_17 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -d "This visualization shows a significant ANC 1-3 dropout" -X POST "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/interpretations/visualization/EbRN2VIbPdV" -H "Content-Type:text/plain" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Deleting a Job Queue in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This endpoint deletes a job queue without deleting the referenced job configurations. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_21 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` DELETE /api/scheduler/queues/{name} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Getting Maximum Value Using d2:maxValue Function DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to get the maximum value of a specific data element (blood-pressure) across the entire enrollment using the d2:maxValue function. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_49 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2:maxValue( 'blood-pressure' ) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Option Groups with CSV in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Sample CSV payload for importing option groups. The example shows how to create two option groups (optionGroupA and optionGroupB) and associate them with specific options using either option UIDs or option codes. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_87 LANGUAGE: csv CODE: ``` optionGroupName,optionGroupUid,optionGroupCode,optionGroupShortName,optionSetUid,optionUid,optionCode optionGroupA,,,groupA,xmRubJIhmaK,,OptionA optionGroupA,,,groupA,xmRubJIhmaK,,OptionB optionGroupB,,,groupB,QYDAByFgTr1,,OptionC ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Replying to a Message with Attachments in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Shows how to reply to an existing message conversation with attachments using a POST request. The example includes the message text and attachment IDs as query parameters. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_21 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -d "Yes the Mortality data set has been reported" "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/33/messageConversations/ZjHHSjyyeJ2?attachments=fTpI4GOmujz,h2ZsOxMFMfq" -H "Content-Type:text/plain" -u mobile:district -X POST ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering Interpretations by User Mentions in Comments DESCRIPTION: GET request example for filtering interpretations where a specific user is mentioned in any comment of the interpretation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` GET /api/interpretations?fields=*,comments[*] &filter=comments.mentions.username:in:[boateng] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Deleting Attribute Values in DHIS2 Tracker API DESCRIPTION: Deletes attribute values from a tracked entity by setting the value to null in the POST request to /api/tracker endpoint. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "trackedEntities": [ { "trackedEntity": "PQfMcpmXeFE", "trackedEntityType": "nEenWmSyUEp", "orgUnit": "DiszpKrYNg8", "attributes": [ { "attribute": "w75KJ2mc4zz", "value": null } ] } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Queueable Jobs in DHIS2 Scheduler API DESCRIPTION: This endpoint retrieves a list of job configurations that can be added to any queue. It excludes system jobs and jobs already part of a queue. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_25 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/scheduler/queueable ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Complete Data Set Registration with Custom Scheme - XML Example DESCRIPTION: Example XML payload for registering complete data sets with custom organization unit ID scheme SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_26 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Generating HTML Report with GoAccess DESCRIPTION: Command to generate an HTML report from nginx access logs using the COMBINED log format. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/analysing-nginx-logs-using-goaccess.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` goaccess /var/log/nginx/access.log -o report.html --log-format=COMBINED ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Dumping DHIS2 Database DESCRIPTION: Creates a backup of the DHIS2 database, excluding system-generated tables. The command can be modified to include compression with gzip. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/postgresql.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pg_dump dhis2 -U dhis -T "analytics*" -T "_*" -f dhis2.sql ``` LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pg_dump dhis2 -U dhis -T "analytics*" -T "_*" | gzip > dhis2.sql.gz ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: SMS Command Format for Data Reporting DESCRIPTION: Example format for reporting data via SMS using KEY_VALUE_PARSER. Shows how to structure SMS messages with codes and values, with optional separators. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/mobile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` report vo2 vn5 a2 b6 z3 x1 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating DHIS2 Instance Configuration from Template DESCRIPTION: Command to create an instance-specific configuration file from the provided template. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-automated-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` cp dhis2-server-tools/deploy/inventory/host_vars/dhis.template dhis2-server-tools/deploy/inventory/host_vars/dhis ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Percentile Functions in DHIS2 Expressions DESCRIPTION: Shows how to calculate the continuous 50th percentile (median) of sampled values in DHIS2 predictor expressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_39 LANGUAGE: Expression Language CODE: ``` percentileCont(0.5, #{T7OyqQpUpNd}) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting DHIS2 Read-Only Mode Property DESCRIPTION: Configuration property for setting the DHIS2 system in read-only mode. This is useful when running DHIS2 on a read-only replica database to avoid database write operations. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_35 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` system.read_only_mode = on | off ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Single Validation Result by ID in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Makes a GET request to retrieve a specific validation result using its ID, allowing inspection of individual validation violation details. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/33/validationResults/ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Combining Statistical Functions in DHIS2 Predictor Expressions DESCRIPTION: Shows how to combine average and standard deviation functions to create more complex statistical calculations for program indicators. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_33 LANGUAGE: Expression Language CODE: ``` avg(I{GSae40Fyppf}) + 2 * stddevSamp(I{GSae40Fyppf}) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Compressing DHIS2 Database Backup DESCRIPTION: Command to create a compressed backup of a DHIS2 database using gzip. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_57 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pg_dump dhis2 -U dhis -T "analytics*" -T "_*" | gzip > dhis2.sql.gz ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Resetting a Stuck Job in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This endpoint reverts a job stuck in RUNNING state back to its initial state. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_16 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` POST /api/jobConfigurations/{uid}/revert ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Response Format for Interpretation Likes in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: Sample JSON response showing the structure of interpretation data with likes information, including the total number of likes and the users who liked the interpretation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_21 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "XSHiFlHAhhh", "text": "Data looks suspicious, could be a data entry mistake.", "type": "VISUALIZATION", "likes": 2, "likedBy": [ { "id": "k7Hg12fJ2f1" }, { "id": "gYhf26fFkjFS" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Tomcat Instance for DHIS2 in Linux DESCRIPTION: Create a new Tomcat instance named 'tomcat-dhis' in the specified directory and set appropriate ownership. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_18 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo tomcat9-instance-create /home/dhis/tomcat-dhis sudo chown -R dhis:dhis /home/dhis/tomcat-dhis/ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Data Summary Statistics - Prometheus Metrics DESCRIPTION: Example response from the /api/dataSummary/metrics endpoint in Prometheus text exposition format. Shows object counts and build information metrics suitable for Prometheus scraping. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/maintenance.md#2025-04-22_snippet_16 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` # HELP data_summary_object_counts Count of metadata objects # TYPE data_summary_object_counts gauge data_summary_object_counts{type="indicator"} 77 data_summary_object_counts{type="trackedEntity"} 73125 data_summary_object_counts{type="visualization"} 292 data_summary_object_counts{type="period"} 384 data_summary_object_counts{type="programStageInstance"} 373597 ``` LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` # HELP data_summary_build_info Build information # TYPE data_summary_build_info gauge data_summary_build_info{version="2.42-SNAPSHOT", commit="932e552"} 1737621197 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Tomcat User Package in Bash DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Tomcat user package using apt-get on Ubuntu/Debian systems. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo apt-get install -y tomcat8-user ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adjust Metadata Proposal JSON Format in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example JSON payload for adjusting a metadata proposal that needs updates. Contains the target ID and updated change object based on the proposal type. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_110 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "targetId": "", "change": ... } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring a Kafka Target for DHIS2 Event Hooks DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration for sending event hook messages to an Apache Kafka instance, specifying the topic to which events should be published. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/event-hooks.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "type": "kafka", "topic": "dhis2.hooks" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Program Stage Notification Parameter Codes DESCRIPTION: Reference table containing variable codes specific to program stage notifications. These parameters can be used to create dynamic messages related to program stages and events. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Program stage | Current date | `V{current_date}` | || Days since due date | `V{days_since_due_date}` | || Days until due date | `V{days_until_due_date}` | || Due date | `V{due_date}` | || Organisation unit name | `V{org_unit_name}` | || Program name | `V{program_name}` | || Program stage name | `V{program_stage_name}` | || Event status | `V{event_status}` | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying DHIS2 Tracker Bundle Report Example in JSON DESCRIPTION: This snippet illustrates the structure of a bundle report for a specific tracker object type (TRACKED_ENTITY) within an import summary. It shows the statistics and object reports for the imported tracked entities. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_19 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "bundleReport": { "typeReportMap": { "TRACKED_ENTITY": { "trackerType": "TRACKED_ENTITY", "stats": { "created": 1, "updated": 0, "deleted": 0, "ignored": 0, "total": 1 }, "objectReports": [ { "trackerType": "TRACKED_ENTITY", "uid": "aVcGf9iO8Xp", "errorReports": [] } ] } } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Probability Density Function in DHIS2 Expressions DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates calculating the probability density function using statistics from a different data element in DHIS2 predictor expressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_44 LANGUAGE: Expression Language CODE: ``` normDistDen( #{T7OyqQpUpNd}, avg(#{IKahz1Quie3}), stddev(#{IKahz1Quie3}) ) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Aggregate Data Value Audits by Data Set and Audit Type DESCRIPTION: Example API request to get audits for a specific data set and audit types (CREATE or UPDATE). Demonstrates filtering aggregate data value audits by multiple parameters. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/audit.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/33/audits/dataValue?ds=lyLU2wR22tC&auditType=CREATE,UPDATE ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Nginx Authentication Configuration DESCRIPTION: Enhanced Nginx configuration with basic authentication for Prometheus access. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/monitoring.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` server { listen 1234; location / { auth_basic "Prometheus"; auth_basic_user_file /etc/prometheus/.credentials; proxy_pass http://localhost:9090/; } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: PostgreSQL Backup Command Example for DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example of a PostgreSQL dump command for a DHIS2 database named 'dhis2' with user 'dhis', excluding analytics tables. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_56 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pg_dump dhis2 -U dhis -T "analytics*" -T "_*" -f dhis2.sql ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Indicator Formula in DHIS2 Glossary DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates the mathematical formula for an indicator in DHIS2. It shows that an indicator is calculated by dividing the numerator by the denominator, which can be composed of multiple data elements and factors. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/dhis2-glossary.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: latex CODE: ``` \[ Indicator = {\frac{Numerator}{Denominator}} \] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Standalone Translations Response DESCRIPTION: Example response showing only the translations property of a DataElement object. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/i18n.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "translations": [ { "property": "SHORT_NAME", "locale": "en_GB", "value": "ANC 1st visit" }, { "property": "NAME", "locale": "fr", "value": "Soin prénatal 1" }, { "property": "NAME", "locale": "en_GB", "value": "ANC 1st visit" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: SMS Command Common Parameters Table DESCRIPTION: Table defining common configuration parameters available across all SMS command types, including field separators and various system messages. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/sms-configuration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Parameter | Type | Description | |---|---|---| | Field Separator | String | To provide custom field separator. Default is "|" | | Reply message if no codes are sent (only the command) | String | To provide message if no code is found in SMS text input. Default is "Parameter missing" | | Wrong format message | String | To provide message if command is not formatted correctly. Command should be formatted as per code value separator. This message will also be sent back if any mandatory parameter is missing. | | No user message | String | To provide message if sending phone number is not registered in DHIS2. | | User belong to more than one OrgUnit message | String | Certain SMS command types require user ( retrieved from sending phone number ) to be associated with only one organization unit. This message can be configured to be sent back in case that requirement is not fullfilled. | | Success Message | String | To provide message that will be sent upon successful completion of the process. | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running DHIS2 Installation Script DESCRIPTION: Commands to navigate to the deploy directory, create a hosts file from the template, and execute the deployment script. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-automated-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` cd dhis2-server-tools/deploy cp inventory/hosts.template inventory/hosts sudo ./deploy.sh ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sample Data Store Entry JSON Structure DESCRIPTION: Example JSON structure used to demonstrate partial update functionality in the data store. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_25 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "wisker", "favFood": [ "fish", "rabbit" ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Indicator Conditional Expression in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: A basic indicator expression that evaluates if the sum of a data element is greater than 10. This uses the default behavior where data is aggregated before evaluation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_17 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` if( #{nYahlae7fe6} > 10, 1, 0 ) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Static Content JSON Response DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response format for static content retrieval SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/settings-and-configuration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "images": { "png": "http://localhost:8080/dhis/api/staticContent/logo_front" } } ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Not Found", "httpStatusCode": 404, "status": "ERROR", "message": "No custom file found." } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering Interpretations by User Mentions in Either Description or Comments DESCRIPTION: GET request example for filtering interpretations where a specific user is mentioned either in the interpretation itself or in any comment. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` GET /api/interpretations?fields=*,comments[*]&filter=mentions:in:[boateng] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating database dump in directory format DESCRIPTION: PostgreSQL commands to create a database dump in directory format with parallel jobs and compress it into a tar archive for deployment to demo environments. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/development-infrastructure.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pg_dump dhis2 -Fd -U dhis -j 4 -f db.pgdump tar zcvf db.tar.gz db.pgdump ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining SMS Command Types for Android App in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet presents a table of SMS command types specifically for the Android app when internet is unavailable. It includes commands for aggregate data collection, entity registration, event registration, relationship creation, and event deletion. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/sms.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Type | Usage | |---|---| |AGGREGATE_DATASET | For aggregate data collection.| |ENROLLMENT | For tracker entity registration.| |TRACKER_EVENT | Event registration for tracker programs.| |SIMPLE_EVENT | Event registration for event programs.| |RELATIONSHIP | To create relationships.| |DELETE | To delete event.| ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Response for Keys in a Namespace DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response showing all keys available within a specific namespace in the DHIS2 Data Store. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ "key_1", "key_2" ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Constructing JSON Payload for DHIS2 Category Option Combo Merge DESCRIPTION: This JSON payload example demonstrates how to structure the merge request body. It includes source category option combo identifiers, target identifier, and data merge strategy. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_50 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "sources": [ "FbLZS3ueWbQ", "dPSWsKeAZNw" ], "target": "rEq3Hkd3XXH", "dataMergeStrategy": "DISCARD" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown Code Block Example DESCRIPTION: Example showing how program listings and computer code are formatted in the documentation with shaded background and different font. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/common/about-this-guide.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` Program listings usually contain some type of computer code. They will be displayed with a shaded background and a different font. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Days Operator in Indicator Formula - DHIS2 Expression DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to use the special 'Days' operator to calculate the percentage of time a vaccine refrigerator was non-functional. The formula takes into account the number of days in different periods. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ("Days-"Number of days vaccine refrigerator was available"")/"Days" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Forgot Password Request in DHIS2 API (JSON) DESCRIPTION: Example of a POST request to initiate the forgotten password flow. Requires either username or email. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_24 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "emailOrUsername": "testUsername1" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Program Notification Parameter Codes for Programs DESCRIPTION: Reference table showing variable codes that can be used in program notifications. These parameters provide dynamic content such as dates, program details, and organization information. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Notification type | Variable name | Variable code | |---|---|---| | Program | Current date | `V{current_date}` | || Days since enrollment date | `V{days_since_enrollment_date}` | || Enrollment date | `V{enrollment_date}` | || Incident date | `V{incident_date}` | || Organisation unit name | `V{org_unit_name}` | || Program name | `V{program_name}` | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Uploading an Organisation Unit Image with POST Request in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: API endpoint for uploading an image for an organisation unit. Requires the ORG_UNIT domain parameter and the image file as the request payload with appropriate Content-Type header. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/organisation-unit-profile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` POST /api/fileResources?domain=ORG_UNIT ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating an Interpretation Comment with cURL in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: cURL command example for updating an existing comment on an interpretation using a PUT request with the updated comment text in the request body. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_20 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/interpretations/j8sjHLkK8uY/comments/idAzzhVWvh2" -d "I agree with that." -X PUT -H "Content-Type:text/plain" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example Expression Using Event Date and Incident Date Variables in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: An expression that calculates the number of days between the incident date and the event date using the d2:daysBetween function. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_28 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2:daysBetween(V{incident_date},V{event_date}) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Glowroot for DHIS2 Monitoring DESCRIPTION: Commands to download, unpack, and set up Glowroot for monitoring DHIS2. Includes steps to create a directory, download the Glowroot package, and set appropriate permissions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/glowroot.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` # create a location to install glowroot. I will use /opt/glowroot mkdir -p /opt/glowroot # download the chosen version and uncompress cd /opt/glowroot wget https://github.com/glowroot/glowroot/releases/download/v0.13.6/glowroot-0.13.6-dist.zip unzip glowroot-0.13.6-dist.zip # there should now be a file called /opt/glowroot/glowroot.jar Note: make sure that the user who is running the DHIS2 service has write access to the glowroot install directory. E.g. If running DHIS2 under tomcat as `dhis` user: chown -R dhis: /opt/glowroot ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Nginx as Reverse Proxy for DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Nginx configuration for setting up a reverse proxy for DHIS2. This configuration enables compression, sets up proxy passing to the Tomcat instance running at localhost:8080, and configures various proxy headers and settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_41 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` http { gzip on; # Enables compression, incl Web API content-types gzip_types "application/json;charset=utf-8" application/json "application/javascript;charset=utf-8" application/javascript text/javascript "application/xml;charset=utf-8" application/xml text/xml "text/css;charset=utf-8" text/css "text/plain;charset=utf-8" text/plain; server { listen 80; client_max_body_size 10M; # Proxy pass to servlet container location / { proxy_pass http://localhost:8080/; proxy_redirect off; proxy_set_header Host $host; proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto http; proxy_buffer_size 128k; proxy_buffers 8 128k; proxy_busy_buffers_size 256k; proxy_cookie_path ~*^/(.*) "/$1; SameSite=Lax"; } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring S3-Compatible Storage in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Configuration properties for setting up S3-compatible object storage in DHIS2. Includes additional endpoint configuration along with standard S3 settings for container, location, and authentication. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/file-storage.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` # File store provider. Currently 'filesystem' (default), 'aws-s3' and 's3' are supported. filestore.provider = 's3' # Directory in external directory on local file system or bucket in AWS S3 filestore.container = files # The following configuration is applicable to cloud storage only (provider 'aws-s3' or 's3') # URL where the S3 compatible API can be accessed (only for provider 's3') filestore.endpoint = http://minio:9000 # Datacenter location. Optional but recommended for performance reasons. filestore.location = eu-west-1 # Username / Access key for AWS S3 or S3 APIs filestore.identity = xxxx # Password / Secret key for AWS S3 or S3 APIs (sensitive) filestore.secret = xxxx ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JavaScript Organization Unit Access in DHIS2 HTML Reports DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code demonstrating how to access organization unit data in HTML-based standard reports. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-report-functionality.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` var orgUnit = dhis2.report.organisationUnit; // An object var id = orgUnit.id; var name = orgUnit.name; var code = orgUnit.code; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Comparing Program Stage Event Date with Enrollment Date DESCRIPTION: Shows how to compare the latest event date from a specific program stage with the enrollment date using the d2:daysBetween function and the PS_EVENTDATE syntax. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_19 LANGUAGE: expression CODE: ``` d2:daysBetween(V{enrollment_date},PS_EVENTDATE:mCXR7u4kNBW) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing GoAccess on Ubuntu DESCRIPTION: Commands to add the official GoAccess repository and install it using apt-get on Ubuntu systems. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/analysing-nginx-logs-using-goaccess.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` wget -O - https://deb.goaccess.io/gnugpg.key | gpg --dearmor | sudo tee /usr/share/keyrings/goaccess.gpg >/dev/null echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/goaccess.gpg] https://deb.goaccess.io/ $(lsb_release -cs) main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/goaccess.list sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install goaccess ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example JSON Response for User Groups in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the structure of a JSON response when including nested fields of collections, specifically showing user groups names for a user. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata-gist.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "userGroups": { "name": [ "_PROGRAM_Inpatient program", "_PROGRAM_TB program", "_DATASET_Superuser", "_PROGRAM_Superuser", "_DATASET_Data entry clerk", "_DATASET_M and E Officer" ] } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Custom Icon Payload in JSON DESCRIPTION: JSON payload for creating a custom icon in DHIS2. The request requires specifying a unique key, description, array of related keywords, and a file resource UID that references the uploaded icon image. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_41 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "key": "iconKey", "description": "description", "keywords": ["keyword 1","keyword 2"], "fileResourceUid": "ARsqBjfB2cf" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Disabling Audit System Completely in dhis.conf DESCRIPTION: Configuration to disable the audit system entirely for all scopes (metadata, tracker, and aggregate). SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/concepts/audit.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` audit.metadata = DISABLED audit.tracker = DISABLED audit.aggregate = DISABLED ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Filtered Visualization Data in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example response showing filtered visualization data when requesting only specific fields. This example shows interpretations associated with a visualization. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "interpretations": [ { "id": "Lfr8I2RPU0C" }, { "id": "JuwgdJlJPGb" }, { "id": "WAoU2rSpyZp" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a stable release branch DESCRIPTION: Git command for creating a new branch from master for a stable release, using semantic versioning (e.g., 2.25). SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/development-infrastructure.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` git branch 2.25 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example Response: Absolute URLs in Gist API DESCRIPTION: Shows how the response changes when using absoluteUrls=true parameter, returning full URLs instead of relative paths. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata-gist.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "rWLrZL8rP3K", "href": "http://localhost:8080/api/users/rWLrZL8rP3K/gist?absoluteUrls=true" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown Section Header for DHIS2 Usage DESCRIPTION: Simple markdown header defining the Use section of DHIS2 documentation that will contain usage-related information and guidelines. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/index.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` # Use This section contains information related to the use of DHIS 2 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving All Data Store Namespaces with cURL DESCRIPTION: Example of how to use cURL to retrieve a list of all existing namespaces in the DHIS2 Data Store. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "play.dhis2.org/demo/api/33/dataStore" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Payload for Indicator Merge Request DESCRIPTION: The JSON structure for the indicator merge request, including sources (indicators to merge), target indicator, and whether to delete source indicators after merging. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_61 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "sources": [ "jNb63DIHuwU", "WAjjFMDJKcx" ], "target": "V9rfpjwHbYg", "deleteSources": true } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Cluster Leader Information in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: This JSON snippet demonstrates the response format when retrieving information about the cluster leader node in a DHIS2 cluster configuration. It includes details such as leader node ID, UUID, and current node information. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/maintenance.md#2025-04-22_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "leaderNodeId": "play-dhis2-org-dev", "leaderNodeUuid": "d386e46b-26d4-4937-915c-025eb99c8cad", "currentNodeId": "play-dhis2-org-dev", "currentNodeUuid": "d386e46b-26d4-4937-915c-025eb99c8cad", "leader": true } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example Organisation Unit Profile Data Request in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example GET request for retrieving organisation unit profile data for a specific organisation unit (DiszpKrYNg8) for the year 2021. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/organisation-unit-profile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` GET /api/organisationUnitProfile/DiszpKrYNg8/data?period=2021 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating Locale Information in i18nLocale Table using SQL DESCRIPTION: These SQL UPDATE statements modify the locale and name fields of a specific entry in the i18nLocale table. They are used to customize the locale code and display name. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/add-a-custom-db-language.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: sql CODE: ``` UPDATE i18nLocale SET locale = 'ku' WHERE i18nLocale.uid = 'oBMTTQceViV'; UPDATE i18nLocale SET name = 'Kurdish Sorani' WHERE i18nLocale.uid = 'oBMTTQceViV'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example JSON Response for Single Field of Specific User in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the response format when querying a single field (surname) for a specific user, returning only the plain JSON value. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata-gist.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` "Wakiki" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Two-Factor Authentication Configuration DESCRIPTION: Configuration properties for enabling TOTP and email-based two-factor authentication. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/dhis.conf.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` login.security.totp_2fa.enabled = on login.security.email_2fa.enabled = on ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring File Store for AWS S3 in Properties DESCRIPTION: Configuration properties for setting up AWS S3 as the file store for DHIS2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_19 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` filestore.provider = aws-s3 filestore.container = files filestore.location = eu-west-1 filestore.identity = xxxx filestore.secret = xxxx ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Response for Fields Query with Key Alias DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response when using an alias to resolve a name collision with the 'key' property. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/mobile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` childProgram fn=xmen|ln=xmen2|age=4 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Reloading PostgreSQL configuration DESCRIPTION: This SQL command reloads the PostgreSQL configuration without restarting the server, applying the new logging settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/analysing-postgresql-logs-using-pgbadger.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: sql CODE: ``` select pg_reload_conf(); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Tomcat Connector for DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Configure the Tomcat Connector in server.xml to set the port and allow certain characters in URLs used by DHIS2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_21 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Requesting Usage Analytics in XML Format DESCRIPTION: Shows how to request usage analytics data in XML format by specifying the .xml extension in the URL. The request includes date range and interval parameters for data aggregation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_56 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dataStatistics.xml?startDate=2014-01-01&endDate=2016-01-01&interval=WEEK ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Program Rule Expression in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This snippet instructs users to create a program rule expression using variables, functions, and operators in the DHIS2 Maintenance app. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_31 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` 4. Click **Enter program rule expression** and create the program rule expression with the help of variables, functions and operators. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Data Element Group forEach Syntax in DHIS2 Predictors DESCRIPTION: Shows the syntax for processing all data elements in a group with a single predictor expression in DHIS2. This allows applying the same logic to multiple data elements without creating separate predictors. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_52 LANGUAGE: Expression Language CODE: ``` forEach ?de in :DEG:degUid --> main expression ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Viewing PostgreSQL Query Execution Plan in JSON Format DESCRIPTION: This JSON snippet shows a partial PostgreSQL execution plan structure with a Bitmap Index Scan node. The execution plan provides details about how PostgreSQL will execute a query including cost estimates, row counts, and execution strategies. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_72 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "Node Type": "Bitmap Index Scan", "Parent Relationship": "Outer", "Parallel Aware": false, "Async Capable": false, "Index Name": "in_dx_ax_2022_Eb64F", "Startup Cost": 0.0, "Total Cost": 189.27, "Plan Rows": 17179, "Plan Width": 0, "Actual Startup Time": 1.765, "Actual Total Time": 1.765, "Actual Rows": 17462, "Actual Loops": 1, "Index Cond": "(dx = 'Jtf34kNZhzP'::bpchar)" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Extracting database archive DESCRIPTION: Command to extract the compressed database archive during deployment to production/demo environments. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/development-infrastructure.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` tar zxvf db.tar.gz ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Event Program Details in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows a table of fields and descriptions for entering event program details in DHIS2. It includes information on program name, color, icon, version, category combination, and various configuration options. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Field | Description | |---|---| | **Name** | The name of the program. | | **Color** | Color used for this program in the data capture apps. | | **Icon** | Icon used for this program in the data capture apps. | | **Short name** | A short name of the program. The short name is used as the default chart or table title in the analytics apps. | | **Description** | A detailed description of the program. | | **Version** | The version of the program. This is used for example when people collect data offline in an Android implementation. When they go online and synchronize their metadata, they should get the latest version of the program. | | **Category combination** | The category combination you want to use. The default setting is **None**. | | **Open days after category option end date** | If you selected a category combination other than None, you may enter zero or a positive number. This lets you enter data for this program for a category option up to the specified number of days after that category option's end date. | | **Data approval workflow** | The data approval workflow you want to use. The default setting is **No value**. | | **Completed events expiry date** | Defines the number of days for which you can edit a completed event. This means that when an event is completed and the specified number of expiry days has passed, the event is locked.

If you set "Completed events expiry days" to 10", an event is locked ten days after the completion date. After this date you can no longer edit the event. | | **Expiry period type**

**Expiry days** | The expiry days defines for how many days after the end of the previous period, an event can be edited. The period type is defined by the expiry period type. This means that when the specified number of expiry days has passed since the end date of the previous period, the events from that period are locked.

If you set the expiry type to "Monthly" and the expiry days to "10" and the month is October, then you can't add or edit an event to October after the 10th of November. | | **Block entry form after completed** | Select checkbox to block the entry form after completion of the event of this program.

This means that the data in the entry form can't be changed until you reset the status to incomplete. | | **Feature type** | Sets whether the program is going to capture a geographical feature type or not.
- **None** Nothing is captured.
- **Polygon** An area is captured. For single event programs the area will be the area representing the event being captured. For tracker programs, the area will represent the area of the enrollment.
- **Point** A point/coordinate is captured. For single event programs the point will be representing the event being captured. For tracker programs, the point will represent the enrollment. | | **Validation strategy** | Sets the server and client side validation requirement.

Data type validation is always performed regardless of the validation strategy. An integer field is never stored containing text, for example.
- **On complete** This option will enforce required field and error messages to be fixed when completing the event, but the event can be saved to the server without passing these validation requirements. For legacy reasons, this is always the validation strategy for tracker programs, where each data value in the event is stored to the server while entering data.
- **On update and insert** This option will enforce required field validation when saving the event to the server regardless of the completion status. When using this option no events can be stored without passing validations. | | **Pre-generate event UID** | Select checkbox to pre-generate unique event id numbers. | | **Custom label for report date** | Type a description of the report date.

This description is displayed in the case entry form. | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Non-Translated Field Example in Gist API Response (JSON) DESCRIPTION: Example of a non-translated field ('name') in the Gist API response when 'translate=false' is specified. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata-gist.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "Plain field name", ... } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: User Lookup Query Response in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response from a user lookup query. Contains an array of users matching the query criteria, each with minimal information including ID, username, name details, and display name. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "users": [ { "id": "DXyJmlo9rge", "username": "jbarnes", "firstName": "John", "surname": "Barnes", "displayName": "John Barnes" }, { "id": "N3PZBUlN8vq", "username": "jkamara", "firstName": "John", "surname": "Kamara", "displayName": "John Kamara" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Centering and Sizing Images in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Shows how to both center an image and control its width using class and width attributes in curly brackets. The .center class centers the image while width controls its size. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ![](resources/images/maintainence/predictor_sequential.png){ .center width=50% } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: User Data Store Operations - BASH/JSON DESCRIPTION: Examples of user-specific data store operations including retrieving namespaces, keys and creating values. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_21 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -u admin:district "play.dhis2.org/api/33/userDataStore" ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ "foo", "bar" ] ``` LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -u admin:district -d "['some value']" "play.dhis2.org/api/33/userDataStore/foo/bar" ``` LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Created", "httpStatusCode": 201, "status": "OK", "message": "Key 'bar' in namespace 'foo' created." } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating an Interpretation with cURL in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: cURL command example for updating an existing interpretation by its ID using a PUT request with the updated text in the request body. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_18 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -d "This visualization shows a high dropout" -X PUT "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/interpretations/visualization/EV08iI1cJRA" -H "Content-Type:text/plain" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Audit for Metadata and Tracker in dhis.conf DESCRIPTION: Configuration to enable audit of CREATE and UPDATE operations for metadata and tracker scopes only, while disabling audit for aggregate scope. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/concepts/audit.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` audit.metadata = CREATE;UPDATE audit.tracker = CREATE;UPDATE audit.aggregate = DISABLED ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Internal Reply to a Ticket in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to add an internal reply to a ticket, which is only visible to users with 'Manage tickets' permissions. The example uses a POST request with the 'internal' parameter set to true. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_22 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -d "This is an internal message" "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/33/messageConversations/ZjHHSjyyeJ2?internal=true" -H "Content-Type:text/plain" -u admin:district -X POST ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Converting Shapefile to GeoJSON with EPSG:4326 DESCRIPTION: Command to convert a shapefile that's already in EPSG:4326 projection to GeoJSON format using ogr2ogr tool. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-the-gis-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ogr2ogr -f GeoJSON filename.geojson filename.shp ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using d2:split Function in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Splits text by a specified delimiter and returns the element at the specified position. The first parameter is the text to split, the second is the delimiter, and the third is the element index (zero-based). SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_55 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` d2:split(#{variableWithText}, '-', 1) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: SPDY-enabled SSL Configuration in Nginx DESCRIPTION: Modified Nginx configuration line to enable SPDY protocol alongside SSL on port 443. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/enable-spdy.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: nginx CODE: ``` listen 443 ssl spdy; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Audit for Tracker Operations Only in dhis.conf DESCRIPTION: Configuration to enable audit of CREATE and DELETE operations for tracker scope only, while disabling audit for metadata and aggregate scopes. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/concepts/audit.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` audit.metadata = DISABLED audit.tracker = CREATE;DELETE audit.aggregate = DISABLED ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Azure AD OIDC Configuration for DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Configuration properties for enabling Azure AD OIDC authentication in DHIS2's dhis.conf file. Supports multiple Azure providers with detailed settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_23 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` # Enables OIDC login oidc.oauth2.login.enabled = on # First provider (azure.0): # Alias, or name that will show on the login button in the DHIS2 login screen. oidc.provider.azure.0.tenant = organization name # Client id, given to you in the Azure portal oidc.provider.azure.0.client_id = my client id # Client secret, given to you in the Azure portal oidc.provider.azure.0.client_secret = my client secret # [Optional] Authorized redirect URI, the as set in Azure portal # If your public hostname is different from what the server sees internally, # you need to provide your full public url, like the example below. oidc.provider.azure.0.redirect_url = https://mydhis2-server.org/oauth2/code/azure.0 # [Optional] Where to redirect after logging out. # If your public hostname is different from what the server sees internally, # you need to provide your full public URL, like the example below. oidc.logout.redirect_url = https://mydhis2-server.org # [Optional], defaults to 'email' oidc.provider.azure.0.mapping_claim = email # [Optional], defaults to 'on' oidc.provider.azure.0.support_logout = on # Second provider (azure.1): oidc.provider.azure.1.tenant = other organization name ... ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Response for Fields Query DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response when using the fields parameter to extract specific properties from all entries in a namespace. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ {"key": "key1", "name": "name1", "description": "description1"}, {"key": "key2", "name": "name2", "description": "description2"} ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining SMS Command Types for DHIS2 in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines a table of SMS command types used in DHIS2, including their type names and usage descriptions. It covers commands for aggregate data collection, alerts, disease surveillance, entity registration, and event registration. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/sms.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Type | Usage | |---|---| |KEY_VALUE_PARSER | For aggregate data collection.| |ALERT_PARSER | To send alert messages.| |UNREGISTERED_PARSER | For disease surveillance case reporting.| |TRACKED_ENTITY_REGISTRATION_PARSER | For tracker entity registration.| |PROGRAM_STAGE_DATAENTRY_PARSER | Data collection for program stage. ( TEI is identified based on phoneNumner )| |EVENT_REGISTRATION_PARSER | Registration of single event. This is used for event programs.| ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Indicator SubExpression with Category Option Combination in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: A subexpression using a data element with a specific category option combination, showing how to reference disaggregated data in subexpressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_21 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` subExpression( if( #{nYahlae7fe6.beec4Dewah8} > 10 && #{nYahlae7fe6.beec4Dewah8} <= 20, 1, 0 ) ) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating SQL View for Organization Units with Coordinates DESCRIPTION: SQL query example that joins tables to retrieve organization units with their names, parent names, levels, and coordinates. This demonstrates a practical use case for the SQL views API. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_22 LANGUAGE: sql CODE: ``` select ou.name as orgunit, par.name as parent, ou.coordinates, ous.level, oul.name from organisationunit ou inner join _orgunitstructure ous on ou.organisationunitid = ous.organisationunitid inner join organisationunit par on ou.parentid = par.organisationunitid inner join orgunitlevel oul on ous.level = oul.level where ou.coordinates is not null order by oul.level, par.name, ou.name; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Checking Enrollment Status in DHIS2 Program Rules DESCRIPTION: This code snippet demonstrates how to check the status of an enrollment using the V{enrollment_status} variable in a DHIS2 program rule expression. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_67 LANGUAGE: dhis2 CODE: ``` V{enrollment_status} == 'COMPLETED' ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Calculating Row Totals in Java DESCRIPTION: Expression to sum up values from multiple month columns to create a total column. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-report-functionality.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: java CODE: ``` $f{September}+$f{October 2010}+$f{November 2010} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: DHIS2 Database Constraint Error Response DESCRIPTION: Example error response when a DHIS2 operation violates a database constraint. This shows a duplicate key violation with details about the specific constraint and the key values that caused the conflict. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_58 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Conflict", "httpStatusCode": 409, "status": "ERROR", "message": "ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint \"minmaxdataelement_unique_key\"\n Detail: Key (sourceid, dataelementid, categoryoptioncomboid)=(193236, 1148617, 167661) already exists." } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Redis Repository in Ubuntu for DHIS2 HA Setup DESCRIPTION: Command to add the Redis Labs repository to APT sources. This ensures installation of the latest stable Redis version rather than potentially older versions from default Ubuntu repositories. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/how-to/installing-redis.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo add-apt-repository ppa:redislabs/redis ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Finding First Non-Null Value with firstNonNull Function DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to return the first non-null value from a list of options using the firstNonNull function, which can include data elements, attributes, or literal values as fallbacks. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_24 LANGUAGE: expression CODE: ``` firstNonNull(A{GPkGfbmArby}),#{mCXR7u4kNBW.NFkjsNiQ9PH},44) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying DHIS2 Analytics with Program Indicators linked to Relationship Types DESCRIPTION: Example of how to use the analytics API to query enrollments with program indicators linked to relationship types. This example retrieves enrollments from the WHO RMNCH Tracker program for January 2019 with linked Malaria cases. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_43 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/analytics/enrollments/query/WSGAb5XwJ3Y.json?dimension=mxZDvSZYxlw.nFICjJluo74 &startDate=2019-01-01&endDate=2019-01-31 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Organisation Unit Information in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: API endpoint for retrieving information about a specific organisation unit, including any associated image reference. This endpoint returns the organisation unit's metadata including its image file resource ID if set. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/organisation-unit-profile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` GET /api/organisationUnits/{id} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Response for Fields Query with Structured Alias DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response when using a structured alias path to restructure the extracted data into a new nested format. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ { "key": "key1", "my-root": {"my-prop": 42}}, { "key": "key2", "my-root": {"my-prop": 13}} ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Response for Marking Messages as Read in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Shows the JSON response format when successfully marking messages as read. The response includes an array of message IDs that were marked as read. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_16 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "markedRead": ["ZrKML5WiyFm", "Gc03smoTm6q"] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Log Levels for DHIS2 Packages DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to set log levels for specific packages in DHIS2 using the dhis.conf configuration file. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/logging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` logging.level.org.springframework = DEBUG ``` LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` logging.level.org.hisp.dhis = DEBUG ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using d2:validatePattern Function in DHIS2 - Address Validation DESCRIPTION: Validates if an address consists of letters or white spaces followed by a number. The regex ensures the proper format of the registration address. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_57 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` !d2:validatePattern(A{registrationAddress},'[\\w ]+ \\d+') ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Verifying Nginx SPDY Module DESCRIPTION: Command to check if Nginx is compiled with SPDY module support by displaying version and compilation options. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/enable-spdy.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` $ nginx -V ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Nginx Caching Configuration DESCRIPTION: Nginx configuration with added caching capabilities for improved performance and reduced server load. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/reverse_proxy_nginx.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` http { .. proxy_cache_path /var/cache/nginx levels=1:2 keys_zone=dhis:250m inactive=1d; server { .. # Proxy pass to servlet container and potentially cache response location / { proxy_pass http://localhost:8080/; proxy_redirect off; proxy_set_header Host $host; proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto https; proxy_buffer_size 128k; proxy_buffers 8 128k; proxy_busy_buffers_size 256k; proxy_cookie_path ~*^/(.*) "/$1; SameSite=Lax"; proxy_cache dhis; } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring DHIS2 Changelog Settings DESCRIPTION: Configuration options for enabling or disabling changelog tracking for aggregate and tracker data in DHIS2. Changelog records changes made to data values in the system. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_52 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` # Aggregate changelog, can be 'on', 'off' changelog.aggregate = on # Tracker changelog, can be 'on', 'off' changelog.tracker = on ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Editing Inventory Hosts File for Adding an Instance DESCRIPTION: Command to open the inventory hosts file for editing to add a new DHIS2 instance. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-automated-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` vim dhis2-server-tools/deploy/inventory/hosts ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Wildcard Pattern for Allowed Remote Servers DESCRIPTION: Example of using wildcard patterns in the route.remote_servers_allowed configuration to allow multiple subdomains without enumerating each one. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/route.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` route.remote_servers_allowed = https://*.server1.com/ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Response for Key Metadata DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response showing the metadata for a specific key in a namespace, including creation information and user details. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "dsKeyUid001", "created": "...", "user": {...}, "namespace": "foo", "key": "key_1" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Translated Field Example in Gist API Response (JSON) DESCRIPTION: Example of a translated field ('name') in the Gist API response when 'translate=true' or not specified.
