SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata-gist.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "A translated name", ... } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Expression with Grouped Period Offset - DHIS2 Expression DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to calculate the difference between two data elements from two periods before the current reporting period. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ( #{FH8ab5Rog83} - \n#{QOlfIKgNJ3D2} ).periodOffset(-2) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JavaScript Period Access in DHIS2 HTML Reports DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code showing how to access period identifiers in HTML-based standard reports. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-report-functionality.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` var periods = dhis2.report.periods; // An array with period identifiers var period = periods[0]; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Error Response for Non-existent or Confidential Settings DESCRIPTION: Shows the JSON error response returned when attempting to retrieve a system setting that does not exist or is marked as confidential. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/settings-and-configuration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Not Found", "httpStatusCode": 404, "status": "ERROR", "message": "Setting does not exist or is marked as confidential", "errorCode": "E1005" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Error Response for Program Not Found in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Error response when attempting to copy a program that doesn't exist. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_119 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Not Found", "httpStatusCode": 404, "status": "ERROR", "message": "Program with id {uid} could not be found.", "errorCode": "E1005" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring FQDN for DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Sets the fully qualified domain name (FQDN) in the hosts inventory file for DHIS2 instance configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/post-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: ini CODE: ``` vim inventory/hosts fqdn=dhis.example.com ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Lock Exceptions Documentation DESCRIPTION: Documentation section covering how to add lock exceptions to allow data entry after dataset expiry periods SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/data-administration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## Lock exceptions { #data_admin__lock_exception } Lock exceptions provide fine-grained control over exemption from a locked data set. After the expiry of the data set, data entry will be denied by default, unless an exception has been granted through the Lock exception interface. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rounding Up Hemoglobin Value Using d2:ceil Function DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to round up a hemoglobin value to the nearest whole number using the d2:ceil function. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_39 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2:ceil(#{hemoglobinValue}) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: DHIS2 Dimension API Endpoint Format DESCRIPTION: Example of dimension filter format used in DHIS2 API requests. Shows how to construct filter parameters for querying dimensions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_49 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` filter=field:OP:value&filter=field:OP:value&... ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Applying Numeric Range Filters to Tracked Entities in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example of applying multiple numeric filters to a data element, filtering for values between 2000 and 4000. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_47 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` &dimension=IpHINAT79UW.ZzYYXq4fJie.GQY2lXrypjO:GT:2000&dimension=IpHINAT79UW.ZzYYXq4fJie.GQY2lXrypjO:LT:4000 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Access Field in DHIS2 Gist API DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the structure of the 'access' field in a Gist API response. It provides a summary of the current user's permissions for a data element, based on the object's sharing settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata-gist.md#2025-04-22_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` "access": { "manage": false, "externalize": false, "write": false, "read": true, "update": false, "delete": false } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Instrumenting Glowroot for Asynchronous Tracker Import DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration to instrument Glowroot for monitoring asynchronous tracker import requests. This allows tracking of internal processes for async imports in DHIS2 version 2.37 and up. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/glowroot.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "className": "org.hisp.dhis.tracker.report.DefaultTrackerImportService", "methodName": "importTracker", "methodParameterTypes": [ ".." ], "captureKind": "transaction", "transactionType": "Web", "transactionNameTemplate": "/api/tracker: import", "alreadyInTransactionBehavior": "capture-new-transaction", "traceEntryMessageTemplate": "{{0}}", "traceEntryStackThresholdMillis": 1000, "traceEntryCaptureSelfNested": true, "timerName": "Timer" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Response for Headless Query Results DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response format for a headless query (without paging information) showing just the array of results. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [...] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering by LAST_UPDATED Using timeField Parameter in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use the timeField query parameter to filter entries based on lastUpdated rather than the default enrollmentDate. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_37 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` &timeField=LAST_UPDATED ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Field Mask Pattern for Tracked Entity Attributes in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example of a field mask pattern used to format input data. The pattern shows hyphens inserted after every third digit in a numeric sequence, providing visual formatting guidance for users during data entry. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_68 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` \d\d\d-\d\d\d-\d\d\d ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring SSH and UFW for Distributed DHIS2 Deployment DESCRIPTION: Commands for setting up SSH access and configuring UFW firewall on the host machine for distributed DHIS2 deployment. These commands limit SSH access and enable the firewall. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/concepts/architecture.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo ufw limit 22 sudo ufw enable ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Redirect URL Pattern for OIDC Integration DESCRIPTION: URL pattern for configuring the redirect URL in identity providers to enable OIDC authentication with DHIS2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_21 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` (protocol):/(your DHIS2 host)/oauth2/code/PROVIDER_KEY ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating System Packages DESCRIPTION: Command to update the package lists and upgrade existing packages before PostgreSQL installation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo apt update -y && sudo apt upgrade -y ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Customizing Page List Name in Gist API Response (JSON) DESCRIPTION: Example of how the 'pageListName' parameter can be used to customize the name of the array containing matching entries in the Gist API response. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata-gist.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "pager": {}, "matches": [] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Perl on Debian/Ubuntu Linux DESCRIPTION: This command installs Perl, which is a prerequisite for pgbadger. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/analysing-postgresql-logs-using-pgbadger.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo apt-get install perl ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing OpenJDK 11 for DHIS2 2.35-2.40 DESCRIPTION: Command to install OpenJDK 11, which is recommended for DHIS2 versions 2.35 to 2.40. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo apt-get install -y openjdk-11-jdk ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a Route with HTTP Basic Authentication DESCRIPTION: JSON request for creating a route with HTTP Basic Authentication. The authentication credentials are encrypted at rest in the DHIS2 database for security. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/route.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "Postman Echo", "code": "postman-get", "disabled": false, "url": "https://postman-echo.com/get", "auth": { "type": "http-basic", "username": "admin", "password": "admin" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example Data Table - District Measles Data DESCRIPTION: Sample table showing measles doses data by district and organization unit type SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/about-data-dimensions.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | District | OrgUnit Type | Data Element | Period | Value | |---|---|---|---|---| | Bo | CHC | Measles doses given | Dec-09 | 121 | | Bo | CHP | Measles doses given | Dec-09 | 98 | | Bo | MCHP | Measles doses given | Dec-09 | 87 | | Bombali | CHC | Measles doses given | Dec-09 | 110 | | Bombali | CHP | Measles doses given | Dec-09 | 67 | | Bombali | MCHP | Measles doses given | Dec-09 | 59 | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Endpoint-Specific OpenAPI Documentation in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: HTTP GET requests to generate OpenAPI documentation for a specific endpoint by appending either openapi.json or openapi.yaml to an endpoint root path. The example shows how to get documentation for the /users endpoints. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/openapi.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` GET /api/users/openapi.json GET /api/users/openapi.yaml ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: DHIS2 Configuration File Path DESCRIPTION: Example path for the DHIS2 configuration file location SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` /home/dhis/config/dhis.conf ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using d2:validatePattern Function in DHIS2 - Mobile Number Validation DESCRIPTION: Checks if a mobile number contains a specific sequence (555). This example triggers actions if the mobile number contains the sequence 555 anywhere in the number. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_59 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` d2:validatePattern(A{mobile} ,'.*555.*') ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Tomcat SSL Connector Configuration DESCRIPTION: XML configuration for Tomcat's SSL connector settings to properly handle HTTPS connections through the proxy. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/reverse_proxy_nginx.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Events with Escaped Filter Values in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Example request showing how to use escaped characters in filter values for the DHIS2 tracker API. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_42 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/tracker/events?orgUnit=DiszpKrYNg8&program=lxAQ7Zs9VYR&filter=DanTR5x0WDK:EQ:/:/,// ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Testing PostgreSQL Database Connection DESCRIPTION: Command to test database connection with specific user credentials. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/how-to/PostgreSQL-setup.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` psql -U dhis -d dhis -W ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Pager Object Without Total Count in Gist API Response (JSON) DESCRIPTION: Example of the pager object returned by the Gist API when 'total=false', showing pagination information without the total count of matches. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata-gist.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "pager": { "page": 1, "pageSize": 50, "nextPage": "/organisationUnits/gist?page=2" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Message Conversations with cURL DESCRIPTION: cURL command to retrieve message conversations from the DHIS2 API, requesting XML format and authenticating as the mobile user. This allows a user to see messages in their inbox. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/33/messageConversations" -H "Accept:application/xml" -u mobile:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Removing User from Sharing with JSON Patch DESCRIPTION: This JSON Patch payload shows how to remove a single user from the sharing settings of a DHIS2 object using the 'remove' operation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/sharing.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ { "op": "remove", "path": "/sharing/users/N3PZBUlN8vq" } ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Logging into DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Instructions for logging into DHIS2 using a web browser, including the default URL and credentials. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/about-demo-server-live-package-and-database-design.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` To log on to the application just enter if you are using the DHIS2 live package, or replace `localhost` with the name or IP address of the server where the server version is installed. Once you have started DHIS2, either on-line or off-line, the displayed screen will prompt you to enter your registered user-name and password. After entering the required information click on log-in button to log into the application. The default user name and password are 'admin' and 'district'. They should be changed immediately upon logging on the first time. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring PostgreSQL log_line_prefix DESCRIPTION: This SQL setting configures the log_line_prefix in PostgreSQL to provide necessary information for pgbadger analysis. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/analysing-postgresql-logs-using-pgbadger.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: sql CODE: ``` log_line_prefix = '%t [%p]: [%l-1] ' ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring LDAP Authentication for DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to set up LDAP authentication for DHIS2. It includes settings for the LDAP server URL, manager credentials, search base, and search filter. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_27 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` # LDAP server URL ldap.url = ldaps://domain.org:636 # LDAP manager entry distinguished name ldap.manager.dn = cn=johndoe,dc=domain,dc=org # LDAP manager entry password ldap.manager.password = xxxx # LDAP base search ldap.search.base = dc=domain,dc=org # LDAP search filter ldap.search.filter = (cn={0}) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Indicator Name Replacement in Java DESCRIPTION: Expression to replace short indicator names with full descriptive names using conditional logic. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-report-functionality.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: java CODE: ``` ($F{indicatorname}.equals("Bed Util All")) ? "Bed Utilisation - All Wards" : ($F{indicatorname}.equals("Bed Util Mat")) ? "Bed Utilisation - Maternity" : ($F{indicatorname}.equals("Bed Util Ped")) ? "Bed Utilisation - Paediatric" : $F{indicatorname} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Custom Normal Distribution with Median in DHIS2 Expressions DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates using the median instead of mean when calculating the normal distribution function in DHIS2 predictor expressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_42 LANGUAGE: Expression Language CODE: ``` normDistCum( #{T7OyqQpUpNd}, median(#{T7OyqQpUpNd}) ) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: SMS Command Format with Separator DESCRIPTION: Alternative format for data reporting SMS using periods as separators between codes and values. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/mobile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` report vo.2.vn.5.a.2.b.6.z.3.x.1 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Accessing Organisation Unit Profile API Endpoint in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: The base API endpoint for accessing organisation unit profiles in DHIS2. This endpoint is used to define and retrieve profile information for all organisation units. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/organisation-unit-profile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` /api/organisationUnitProfile ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Blocking Specific DHIS2 Android App Versions with nginx DESCRIPTION: This nginx configuration demonstrates how to block access for specific DHIS2 Android app versions based on the User-Agent string. It includes examples of blocking the latest app version and blocking apps running on Android 4.4 (API 19). This approach can be used to enforce app updates or restrict access to untested versions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/reverse_proxy_nginx.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` http { server { listen 80; server_name api.somedomain.com; # Block the latest Android App as it has not been tested if ( $http_user_agent ~ 'com\.dhis2/1\.2\.1/2\.2\.1/' ) { return 403; } # Block Android 4.4 (API is 19) as all users should have received new tablets if ( $http_user_agent ~ 'com\.dhis2/.*/.*/Android_19' ) { return 403; } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Reloading Nginx Configuration DESCRIPTION: Command to reload Nginx server configuration to apply SPDY changes without server restart. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/enable-spdy.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` $ sudo /etc/init.d/nginx reload ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring PostgreSQL Access Control in Bash DESCRIPTION: Example entries for the pg_hba.conf file to control access to the PostgreSQL database for DHIS2 instances. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/how-to/PostgreSQL-setup.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` # TYPE DATABASE USER ADDRESS METHOD host hmis hmis 172.19.2.11/32 md5 host dhis dhis 172.19.2.12/32 md5 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Image Captions in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to add captions to images by including text in square brackets before the image path. This syntax renders the image as a figure with a centered, italicized caption. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ![Approving and accepting](resources/images/data_approval/approval_level_steps.png) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Indicator SubExpression in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: A subexpression that evaluates each data element value before aggregation, useful for counting how many instances meet a condition (e.g., how many facilities have values greater than 10). SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_18 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` subExpression( if( #{nYahlae7fe6} > 10, 1, 0 ) ) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Evaluating Program Rule Action Expression in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example request body for evaluating program rule action expressions using the DHIS2 API endpoint '/api/programRuleActions/data/expression/description'. The endpoint requires a programId parameter and expects a JSON payload containing the condition to evaluate. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_80 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "condition": "1 + 1" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a Multi-Program Event Visualization in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: JSON example showing how to configure a multi-program event visualization by omitting the root program property and specifying program and programStage for each dimension in rows, columns, and filters. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` "program": null, "columns": [ { "dimension": "ou", "items": [ { "id": "O6uvpzGd5pu" } ], "program": { "id": "IpHINAT79UW" } }, { "dimensionType": "CATEGORY_OPTION_GROUP_SET", "items": [ { "id": "JLGV7lRQRAg" }, { "id": "p916ZCVGNyq" } ], "dimension": "C31vHZqu0qU", "program": { "id": "kla3mAPgvCH" }, "programStage": { "id": "aNLq9ZYoy9W" } } ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: User Lookup Query Pattern in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: API request pattern for querying users by a search string. The query string is matched against user's first name, surname, email, and username. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` GET /api/userLookup?query={string} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Error Response for Unauthorized Metadata Pull Server in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: JSON response returned when attempting a metadata pull from a server not listed in the allowed remote servers configuration. Includes HTTP status, error code, and descriptive message to help troubleshoot the issue. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/synchronization.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Conflict", "httpStatusCode": 409, "status": "ERROR", "message": "Provided URL is not in the remote servers allowed list", "errorCode": "E1004" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Response for Creating an Aggregate Data Exchange in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This JSON response is returned when successfully creating an aggregate data exchange. It includes the HTTP status, response type, and the unique identifier (UID) of the created exchange. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-exchange.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Created", "httpStatusCode": 201, "status": "OK", "response": { "responseType": "ObjectReport", "uid": "pG4bBTMiCqO", "klass": "org.hisp.dhis.dataexchange.aggregate.AggregateDataExchange", "errorReports": [] } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Payload for Setting Organisation Unit Image with PUT in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Sample JSON payload structure for setting an organisation unit image using a PUT request. This requires including the full organisation unit object with all required fields along with the image reference. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/organisation-unit-profile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "Rp268JB6Ne4", "name": "Adonkia CHP", "image": { "id": "{file-resource-iid}" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Explicit Parameters for Normal Distribution in DHIS2 Expressions DESCRIPTION: Shows how to explicitly specify the average and standard deviation parameters for normal distribution calculations in DHIS2 predictor expressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_43 LANGUAGE: Expression Language CODE: ``` normDistCum( #{T7OyqQpUpNd}, avg(#{T7OyqQpUpNd}), stddev(#{T7OyqQpUpNd}) ) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Exim4 for DHIS2 Server Email Setup DESCRIPTION: This command starts the configuration process for Exim4. It launches an interactive setup wizard that allows you to configure Exim4 for sending mail directly through SMTP. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/setting-up-email.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo dpkg-reconfigure exim4-config ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Prometheus YAML for DHIS2 Metrics Collection DESCRIPTION: This YAML configuration sets up Prometheus to scrape metrics from a DHIS2 instance every 15 seconds. It specifies the metrics path, basic authentication credentials, and the target DHIS2 instance. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/monitoring.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: yaml CODE: ``` global: scrape_interval: 15s evaluation_interval: 15s scrape_configs: - job_name: 'dhis2' metrics_path: '/api/metrics' basic_auth: username: admin password: district static_configs: - targets: ['localhost:80'] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Event Reports Options Table in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Markdown table detailing available options for customizing event reports display. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/using-the-event-reports-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` || Option | Description | Available for report type | |---|---|---|---| | **Data** | **Show column totals** | Displays totals at the end of each column in the pivot table. | Aggregated event report | || **Show column sub-totals** | Displays sub-totals for each column in the pivot table. | Aggregated event report | || **Show row totals** | Displays totals at the end of each row in the pivot table. | Aggregated event report | || **Show row sub-totals** | Displays sub-totals for each row in the pivot table. | Aggregated event report | || **Show dimension labels** | Displays labels for dimensions. | Aggregated event report | || **Hide empty rows** | Hides empty rows in the pivot table. | Aggregated event report | || **Hide n/a data** | Hides data tagged as N/A from the chart. | Aggregated event report | || **Include only completed events** | Includes only completed events in the aggregation process. This is useful when you want for example to exclude partial events in indicator calculations. | Aggregated event report

Individual event report | || **Limit** | Sets a limit of the maximum number of rows that you can display in the table, combined with a setting for showing top or bottom values. | Aggregated event report | || **Output type** | Defines the output type. The output types are **Event**, **Enrollment** and **Tracked entity instance**. | Aggregated event report | || **Program status** | Filters data based on the program status: **All**, **Active**, **Completed** or **Cancelled**. | Aggregated event report | || **Event status** | Filters data based on the event status: **All**, **Active**, **Completed**, **Scheduled**, **Overdue** or **Skipped**. | Aggregated event report | | **Organisation units** | **Show hierarchy** | Includes the names of all parents of each organisation unit in labels. | Aggregated event report | | **Style** | **Display density** | Controls the size of the cells in the table. You can set it to **Comfortable**, **Normal** or **Compact**.

**Compact** is useful when you want to fit large tables into the browser screen. | Aggregated event report

Individual event report | || **Font size** | Controls the size of the table text font. You can set it to **Large**, **Normal** or **Small**. | Aggregated event report

Individual event report | || **Digit group separator** | Controls which character to separate groups of digits or "thousands". You can set it to **Comma**, **Space** or **None**. | Aggregated event report

Individual event report | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using maxDate Filter in DHIS2 Expressions DESCRIPTION: Shows how to filter values based on a maximum date constraint in DHIS2 predictor expressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_47 LANGUAGE: Expression Language CODE: ``` #{T7OyqQpUpNd}.maxDate(2022-12-31) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Data Value with Dimensions in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows a markdown table representing how data values are stored with their core dimensions in DHIS2. It includes the organisation unit, data element, period, and value columns. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/about-data-dimensions.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Organisation Unit | Data Element | Period | Value | |---|---|---|---| | Gerehun CHC | Measles doses given | Dec-09 | 22 | | Tugbebu CHP | Measles doses given | Dec-09 | 18 | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: URL Patterns for Different Object Types in Interpretations DESCRIPTION: Examples of valid URLs for creating interpretations for different object types including visualization, map, eventReport, eventChart, eventVisualization, and dataSetReport. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_16 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` /api/interpretations/visualization/hQxZGXqnLS9 /api/interpretations/map/FwLHSMCejFu /api/interpretations/eventReport/xJmPLGP3Cde /api/interpretations/eventChart/nEzXB2M9YBz /api/interpretations/eventVisualization/nEzXB2M9YBz /api/interpretations/dataSetReport/tL7eCjmDIgM ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Source Data Value Sets for Aggregate Data Exchange in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the GET request endpoint for fetching source data of an aggregate data exchange in the data value set format. It includes the API endpoint and the accept header for JSON response. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-exchange.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/aggregateDataExchanges/{id}/sourceDataValueSets Accept: application/json ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Indicator SubExpression with Multiple Conditions in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: A subexpression with multiple conditions referencing the same data element, demonstrating how to create range conditions (values between 10 and 20). SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_20 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` subExpression( if( #{nYahlae7fe6} > 10 && #{nYahlae7fe6} <= 20, 1, 0 ) ) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Tomcat Environment Variables for DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Set Java and DHIS2 related environment variables in the Tomcat setenv.sh file. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_19 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` export JAVA_HOME='/usr/lib/jvm/java-17-openjdk-amd64/' export JAVA_OPTS='-Xms3g -Xmx6g' export DHIS2_HOME='/home/dhis/config' ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: R Console Startup Output DESCRIPTION: Example of the output displayed when starting R from the command line, showing version information and basic instructions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/dhis2-and-r-integration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: r CODE: ``` R version 3.4.4 (2018-03-15) -- "Someone to Lean On" Copyright (C) 2018 The R Foundation for Statistical Computing Platform: x86_64-pc-linux-gnu (64-bit) R is free software and comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY. You are welcome to redistribute it under certain conditions. Type 'license()' or 'licence()' for distribution details. Natural language support but running in an English locale R is a collaborative project with many contributors. Type 'contributors()' for more information and 'citation()' on how to cite R or R packages in publications. Type 'demo()' for some demos, 'help()' for on-line help, or 'help.start()' for an HTML browser interface to help. Type 'q()' to quit R. > ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic SQL Query with Type Casting in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example of a SQL query that uses jsonb_each_text function with explicit type casting to text, which ensures the returned data is a valid table column type for SQL views in DHIS2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_55 LANGUAGE: sql CODE: ``` select jsonb_each_text(eventdatavalues)::text from ... ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Removing Message Conversations for Another User in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Shows how to remove message conversations on behalf of another user by specifying a user ID parameter in the request. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/messageConversations?mc=WzMRrCosqc0&mc=lxCjiigqrJm&user=PhzytPW3g2J" -X DELETE -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Dashboard Search Response in JSON Format DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the JSON response structure when searching for dashboard items. It includes different types of resources like visualizations, maps, reports, and event visualizations with their counts. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "visualizations": [{ "name": "ANC: ANC 3 Visits Cumulative Numbers", "id": "arf9OiyV7df", "type": "LINE" }, { "name": "ANC: 1st and 2rd trends Monthly", "id": "jkf6OiyV7el", "type": "PIVOT_TABLE" }], "eventVisualizations": [{ "name": "Inpatient: Cases 5 to 15 years this year (case)", "id": "TIuOzZ0ID0V", "type": "LINE_LIST" }, { "name": "Inpatient: Cases last quarter (case)", "id": "R4wAb2yMLik", "type": "LINE_LIST" }], "maps": [{ "name": "ANC: 1st visit at facility (fixed) 2013", "id": "YOEGBvxjAY0" }, { "name": "ANC: 3rd visit coverage 2014 by district", "id": "ytkZY3ChM6J" }], "reports": [{ "name": "ANC: 1st Visit Cumulative Chart", "id": "Kvg1AhYHM8Q" }, { "name": "ANC: Coverages This Year", "id": "qYVNH1wkZR0" }], "searchCount": 8, "visualizationCount": 2, "eventVisualizationCount": 2, "mapCount": 2, "reportCount": 2, "userCount": 0, "eventReports": 0, "eventCharts" :0, "resourceCount": 0 } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring PostgreSQL logging settings DESCRIPTION: These SQL settings enable comprehensive logging in PostgreSQL, including statement duration, checkpoints, connections, and locks. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/analysing-postgresql-logs-using-pgbadger.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: sql CODE: ``` log_statement = 'none' log_min_duration_statement = 0 log_checkpoints = on log_connections = on log_disconnections = on log_lock_waits = on log_temp_files = 0 log_autovacuum_min_duration = 0 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Custom SQL Aggregate Functions with PL/R DESCRIPTION: SQL functions that implement statistical calculations (median and skewness) using R's statistical capabilities through PL/R extension. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/dhis2-and-r-integration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: sql CODE: ``` CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION r_median(_float8) returns float as ' median(arg1) ' language 'plr'; CREATE AGGREGATE median ( sfunc = plr_array_accum, basetype = float8, stype = _float8, finalfunc = r_median ); CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION r_skewness(_float8) returns float as ' require(e1071) skewness(arg1) ' language 'plr'; CREATE AGGREGATE skewness ( sfunc = plr_array_accum, basetype = float8, stype = _float8, finalfunc = r_skewness ); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating DHIS2 Configuration Directory DESCRIPTION: Command to create a configuration directory for DHIS2 that will store apps, files and logs. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo -u dhis mkdir /home/dhis/config ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Payload for Setting Organisation Unit Image with PATCH in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: JSON payload structure for setting an organisation unit image using a PATCH request. Only requires the file resource ID to be specified in the image property. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/organisation-unit-profile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "image": "{file-resource-id}" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Specifying Tomcat Log File Location in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Defines the default location for the Tomcat servlet container's standard output log file. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/logging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` /logs/catalina.out ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rerunning DHIS2 Installation with Updated Configuration DESCRIPTION: Command to apply changes after updating the configuration by rerunning the deployment script. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-automated-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo ./deploy.sh ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: DHIS2 Upgrade Calendar Example DESCRIPTION: Markdown table showing an example upgrade calendar for DHIS2, including activities and resource implications for each month of the upgrade process. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/concepts/Upgrade-Guide.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Month | Activity | Resource Implication | |---|---|---| | April (pre-release) | Metadata assessment and cleanup
Start testing, potentially join the beta testing program | Human resources for metadata cleanup
Server resources for testing
Sysadmin resources for installation
Testing resources | | May (new release) | Test release
Start planning for training, training of trainers, online materials, etc. | Server resources for testing
Human resources for training preparation and trainer training | | June | Training | Sysadmin resources for installation
Server resources for training
Provision of physical or virtual training events | | July | Upgrade production | Sysadmin resources for installation | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Combining Date Filters in DHIS2 Expressions DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use both minimum and maximum date constraints to filter values within a date range in DHIS2 predictor expressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_48 LANGUAGE: Expression Language CODE: ``` #{T7OyqQpUpNd}.minDate(2022-10-1).maxDate(2022-12-31) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Alert Command Format DESCRIPTION: Format for sending alerts using ALERT_PARSER, consisting of command name followed by message text. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/mobile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` alert one emergency case in A town ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Response for Fields Query with includeAll Parameter DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response when using the fields parameter with includeAll=true to include entries with null values for the specified fields. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ {"key": "key1", "name": "name1", "description": "description1"}, {"key": "key2", "name": "name2", "description": "description2"}, {"key": "key3", "name": null, "description": null}, {"key": "key4", "name": null, "description": null} ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Organisation Unit Image Reference with PATCH Request in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: API endpoint and JSON payload for assigning a file resource image to an organisation unit using a PATCH request. The payload references the file resource ID that was previously uploaded. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/organisation-unit-profile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` PATCH /api/organisationUnits/{id} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing PostgreSQL 16 with PostGIS DESCRIPTION: Command to install PostgreSQL 16 database server with PostGIS extension required for GIS/mapping features in DHIS2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo apt-get install -y postgresql-16 postgresql-16-postgis-3 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Chart Options in DHIS2 Data Visualizer DESCRIPTION: Detailed table of chart configuration options in DHIS2, including data display settings, event options, axis configurations, style preferences, and general chart properties. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/classic-data-visualizer.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Option | Description || |---|---|---| | **Data** | **Show values** | Shows the values above the series in the chart. | || **Use 100% stacked values** | Displays 100 % stacked values in column charts. | || **Use cumulative values** | Displays cumulative values in line charts. | || **Hide empty categories** | Hides the category items with no data from the chart.

**None**: doesn't hide any of the empty categories

**Before first**: hides missing values only before the first value

**After last**: hides missing values only after the last value

**Before first and after last**: hides missing values only before the first value and after the last value

**All**: hides all missing values

This is useful for example when you create column and bar charts. | || **Trend line** | Displays the trend line which visualizes how your data evolves over time. For example if performance is improving or deteriorating. Useful when periods are selected as category. | || **Target line value/title** | Displays a horizontal line at the given domain value. Useful for example when you want to compare your performance to the current target. | || **Base line value/title** | Displays a horizontal line at the given domain value. Useful for example when you want to visualize how your performance has evolved since the beginning of a process. | || **Sort order** | Allows you to sort the values on your chart from either low to high or high to low. | || **Aggregation type** | Defines how the data elements or indicators will be aggregated within the chart. Some of the aggregation types are **By data element**, **Count**, **Min** and **Max**. | | **Events** | **Include only completed events** | Includes only completed events in the aggregation process. This is useful when you want for example to exclude partial events in indicator calculations. | | **Axes** | **Range axis min/max** | Defines the maximum and minimum value which will be visible on the range axis. | || **Range axis tick steps** | Defines the number of ticks which will be visible on the range axis. | || **Range axis decimals** | Defines the number of decimals which will be used for range axis values. | || **Range axis title** | Type a title here to display a label next to the range axis (also referred to as the Y axis). Useful when you want to give context information to the chart, for example about the unit of measure. | || **Domain axis title** | Type a title here to display a label below the domain axis (also referred to as the X axis). Useful when you want to give context information to the chart, for example about the period type. | | **Style** | **No space between columns/bars** | Removes the space between the columns or bars in the chart. Useful for displaying the chart as an EPI curve. | | **General** | **Hide chart legend** | Hides the legend and leaves more room for the chart itself. | || **Hide chart title** | Hides the title (default or custom) of your chart. | || **Chart title** | Type a title here to display a custom title above the chart. If you don't enter a title, the default title is displayed. | || **Hide chart subtitle** | Hides the subtitle of your chart. | || **Chart subtitle** | Type a subtitle here to display a custom subtitle above the chart but below the title. If you don't enter a subtitle, no subtitle is displayed in the chart. | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Payload for Indicator Type Merge Request DESCRIPTION: The JSON structure for the indicator type merge request, including sources (indicator types to merge), target indicator type, and whether to delete source indicator types after merging. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_65 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "sources": [ "jNb63DIHuwU", "WAjjFMDJKcx" ], "target": "V9rfpjwHbYg", "deleteSources": true } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Details of a Completed Job in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This endpoint retrieves details of a completed job for a specific job type. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/scheduling/completed/{type} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Checking PostgreSQL Process Status DESCRIPTION: Command to verify if PostgreSQL processes are running on the system. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/how-to/PostgreSQL-setup.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ps aux | grep postgres ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Error Response for Character Limit Exceeded in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Error response when a program copy operation fails because a property exceeded the database character limit. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_118 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Conflict", "httpStatusCode": 409, "status": "ERROR", "message": "ERROR: value too long for type character varying(230)", "errorCode": "E1004" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using d2:substring Function in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Extracts a portion of a string specified by start and end character positions. The function takes the source text and the starting and ending character positions as parameters. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_54 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` d2:substring(#{variableWithText}, 1, 3) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Successful Indicator Merge Response DESCRIPTION: Example of a successful response after merging indicators, including HTTP status code, operation status, and a merge report with details of deleted source indicators. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_62 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "OK", "httpStatusCode": 200, "status": "OK", "response": { "mergeReport": { "mergeErrors": [], "mergeType": "Indicator", "sourcesDeleted": [ "vQ0dGV9EDrw" ], "message": "Indicator merge complete" } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Nginx for Glowroot Access DESCRIPTION: Nginx configuration snippet to set up a reverse proxy for accessing Glowroot through a specific URL path. This allows remote access to Glowroot's web interface. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/glowroot.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: nginx CODE: ``` location /glowroot { proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:4000/glowroot; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Original SSL Configuration in Nginx DESCRIPTION: Default SSL port configuration line in Nginx configuration file before enabling SPDY. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/enable-spdy.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: nginx CODE: ``` listen 443 ssl; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Fully Qualified Domain Name DESCRIPTION: Commands to edit the inventory hosts file to set the fully qualified domain name (FQDN) for DHIS2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-automated-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` vim inventory/hosts fqdn=dhis.example.com ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sample DHIS2 Program Code Pattern DESCRIPTION: Example of a properly formatted DHIS2 code for HIV testing with meaningful naming. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/metadata/metadata-naming-conventions.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` HIV_TEST_POS ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Skip Test Expression with Positive Value Check in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Shows a simple skip test that checks if a data element value is greater than zero in DHIS2 predictor expressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_50 LANGUAGE: Expression Language CODE: ``` #{uF1DLnZNlWe} > 0 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: HTML Tags for Data Set Title/Subtitle Styling DESCRIPTION: Allowed HTML tags for styling data set titles and subtitles in DHIS2. These tags provide basic formatting options while maintaining security. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` a, u, b, strong, em ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Response for Deeply Nested Fields Query DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response when extracting deeply nested properties using multiple levels of bracket or parenthesis notation in the fields parameter. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ { "key": "key1", "root": {"level1": {"level2": {"level3": 42}}}}, { "key": "key1", "root": {"level1": {"level2": {"level3": 13}}}} ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Counting Specific Values with countIfValue Function DESCRIPTION: Shows how to count occurrences of a specific value for a data element using the d2:countIfValue function, which is useful for enrollment program indicators to count data values matching a literal value. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_21 LANGUAGE: expression CODE: ``` d2:countIfValue(#{mCXR7u4kNBW.NFkjsNiQ9PH}),10) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating DHIS2 Database DESCRIPTION: Command to create a PostgreSQL database named 'dhis' owned by the 'dhis' user for storing DHIS2 data. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo -u postgres createdb -O dhis dhis; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Saving a Favorite in DHIS2 Data Visualizer DESCRIPTION: Steps to save a chart or pivot table as a favorite in DHIS2. This process allows users to easily find and reuse their visualizations later. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/classic-data-visualizer.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` 1. Click **Favorites** > **Save as**. 2. Enter a **Name** and a **Description** for your favorite. The description field supports a rich text format, see the interpretations section for more details. 3. Click **Save**. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Bulk GeoJSON Import Structure Using Organisation Unit ID DESCRIPTION: Example of a GeoJSON file structure for bulk import where the 'id' property is used to refer to an organisation unit ID. This structure is used when 'geoJsonId' parameter is set to true. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/geo-json.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "type": "FeatureCollection", "features": [ { "type": "Feature", "id": "O6uvpzGd5pu", "geometry": { ... } }, ... ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Viewing PostgreSQL System Journal Logs DESCRIPTION: Command to view PostgreSQL logs through systemd journal service. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/how-to/PostgreSQL-setup.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` journalctl -fu postgresql ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: DHIS2 Dimension Order Parameter Format DESCRIPTION: Example of order parameter format used for sorting dimension results. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_50 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` order=field:direction ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Calculating Gestational Age in Days Using d2:daysBetween Function DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to calculate the gestational age in days based on the last menstrual period and the current event date using the d2:daysBetween function. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_43 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2:daysBetween(#{lastMenstrualDate},V{event_date}) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Metadata Remote Server Validation Error Response in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example error response when trying to pull metadata from a URL that is not in the allowed list of remote servers configured in dhis.conf. The error includes status code and descriptive message. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_105 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Conflict", "httpStatusCode": 409, "status": "ERROR", "message": "Provided URL is not in the remote servers allowed list", "errorCode": "E1004" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Tracked Entity Instance Audits for a Specific Entity (Deprecated) DESCRIPTION: Example API request for retrieving deprecated tracked entity instance audit logs for a specific entity identified by its UID. Shows targeted audit retrieval for a single instance. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/audit.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/33/audits/trackedEntityInstance.json?trackedEntities=wNiQ2coVZ39 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Enabling Multiple DHIS2 Accounts per Identity Provider DESCRIPTION: Configuration property to enable linking multiple DHIS2 accounts to a single identity provider account. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/oauth.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` linked_accounts.enabled = on ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Cloning DHIS2 Server Tools Repository DESCRIPTION: Git command to clone the DHIS2 server tools repository from GitHub. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-automated-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` git clone https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-server-tools.git ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Calculating Capacity for Sequential Segments in DHIS2 TextPattern DESCRIPTION: These examples show how to calculate the capacity of SEQUENTIAL segments in TextPattern. Each '#' represents a digit from 0-9, and the capacity is calculated by multiplying the possibilities for each digit. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/dhis2-tutorials.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` SEQUENTIAL(#) = 10 = 10 SEQUENTIAL(###) = 10 * 10 * 10 = 1000 SEQUENTIAL(#####) = 10 * 10 * 10 * 10 * 10 = 100000 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using minDate Filter in DHIS2 Expressions DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to filter values based on a minimum date constraint in DHIS2 predictor expressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_46 LANGUAGE: Expression Language CODE: ``` #{T7OyqQpUpNd}.minDate(2022-10-1) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Min-Max Value Generation Documentation DESCRIPTION: Documentation section describing the functionality to generate min-max values for data quality validation purposes SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/data-administration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## Min-Max Value Generation { #data_admin_min_max_value_generation } This administrative function can be used to generate min-max values, which are used as part of the data quality and validation process for specific organization units and data sets. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Establishing SSH Tunnel for PostgreSQL Access in LXD Container DESCRIPTION: This command creates an SSH tunnel to forward a local port to the PostgreSQL server running in an LXD container. It requires the host's SSH port, user credentials, public IP, and a chosen local port. The tunnel connects to the container's IP (172.19.2.20) on the default PostgreSQL port (5432). SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/how-to/Exposing_a_Remote_PostgreSQL_Database_running_in_lxd_container.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ssh -p @ -L localhost::172.19.2.20:5432 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Naming Standards for DHIS2 Codes DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the code formatting standards for DHIS2 metadata, including program prefixes, capitalization, and character usage. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/metadata/metadata-naming-conventions.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` TB_, MAL_, HIV_, EPI_ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Organisation Unit Profile Data Response Structure in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Sample JSON response from the organisation unit profile data endpoint. It includes organisation unit information, attribute values, group memberships, and aggregated data values for the configured data items. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/organisation-unit-profile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "info": { "id": "DiszpKrYNg8", "code": "OU_559", "name": "Ngelehun CHC", "shortName": "Ngelehun CHC", "parentName": "Badjia", "level": 4, "levelName": "Facility", "openingDate": "1970-01-01T00:00:00.000", "longitude": -11.4197, "latitude": 8.1039 }, "attributes": [ { "id": "n2xYlNbsfko", "label": "NGO ID", "value": "GHE51" }, { "id": "xqWyz9jNCA5", "label": "TZ code", "value": "NGE54" } ], "groupSets": [ { "id": "Bpx0589u8y0", "label": "Facility Ownership", "value": "Public facilities" }, { "id": "J5jldMd8OHv", "label": "Facility Type", "value": "CHC" } ], "dataItems": [ { "id": "WUg3MYWQ7pt", "label": "Total Population", "value": 3503 }, { "id": "DTVRnCGamkV", "label": "Total population < 1 year", "value": 140 }, { "id": "vg6pdjObxsm", "label": "Population of women of child bearing age (WRA)", "value": 716 }, { "id": "Uvn6LCg7dVU", "label": "ANC 1 Coverage", "value": 368.2 }, { "id": "eTDtyyaSA7f", "label": "FIC <1y", "value": 291.4 } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying i18nLocale Table for Locale Information in SQL DESCRIPTION: This SQL query retrieves information about a specific locale from the i18nLocale table. It's used to get the id of a chosen locale before modifying it. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/add-a-custom-db-language.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sql CODE: ``` select * from i18nLocale where locale = 'no'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Enabling and Starting Redis Server for DHIS2 HA Setup DESCRIPTION: Commands to enable Redis server to start on boot and to start the service immediately. This ensures Redis is running and will automatically restart after system reboots. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/how-to/installing-redis.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo systemctl enable redis-server sudo systemctl start redis-server ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: SQL Query with Variable Substitution DESCRIPTION: Example of a SQL query that uses variable substitution to filter data elements by value type. Variables must be defined in the format ${variable-key} and can be supplied as part of the URL. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_25 LANGUAGE: sql CODE: ``` select * from dataelement where valuetype = '${valueType}'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: DHIS2 Expression Validation Response DESCRIPTION: JSON response from the DHIS2 expressions validation endpoint showing a successful validation result. The response includes HTTP status, validation status, and a textual description of the validated expression. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_59 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "OK", "httpStatusCode": 200, "status": "OK", "message": "Valid", "description": "Acute Flaccid Paralysis" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering DHIS2 Event Callbacks by Dataset IDs DESCRIPTION: Example of how to register for DHIS2 data entry events but only execute logic for specific data sets. This technique uses an array check to filter which data sets trigger the callback function. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` dhis2.de.on( 'dhis2.de.event.validationSuccess', function( event, ds ) { if ( $.inArray( ds, ['utXOiGbEj14', 'Re7qzHEThSC'] ) == -1 ) { return false; } console.log( 'Form with id: ' + ds + ' validated successfully!' ); } ); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Verifying PostgreSQL Network Ports DESCRIPTION: Command to check open network ports and verify PostgreSQL listening status. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/how-to/PostgreSQL-setup.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ss -tunlp ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Firewall for PostgreSQL in Bash DESCRIPTION: UFW commands to allow SSH access and database access from the application server, enhancing security for the PostgreSQL setup. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/how-to/PostgreSQL-setup.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo ufw allow proto tcp from to 0.0.0.0 port 5432 comment "dhis2-traffic" sudo ufw allow proto tcp from 0.0.0.0 to 0.0.0.0 port 22 comment "ssh traffic" sudo ufw enable ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Calculating Pregnancy Duration Expression in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Program rule expression that calculates and formats the number of weeks and days in a pregnancy based on Last Menstrual Period (LMP) date. Uses d2 functions to perform date calculations and string concatenation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_33 LANGUAGE: expression CODE: ``` d2:concatenate(d2:weeksBetween(#{lmp}, V{current_date}), '+', d2:modulus(d2:daysBetween(#{lmp}, V{current_date}), 7)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Response for Paged Query Results DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response format for a paged query showing the pager information and entries array structure. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "pager": { ... }, "entries": [...] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Keys in a Namespace with cURL DESCRIPTION: Example of how to use cURL to retrieve a list of all keys within a specific namespace in the DHIS2 Data Store. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "play.dhis2.org/demo/api/33/dataStore/foo" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Average Year-to-Date Expression in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Calculates the average year-to-date value by dividing the sum by the number of periods that have passed in the year. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_23 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` #{a}.yearToDate() / [periodInYear] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Checking Spatial Reference System with ogrinfo DESCRIPTION: Command to determine the spatial reference system of a geographic data file using ogrinfo tool. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-the-gis-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ogrinfo -al -so filename.json ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Converting Coordinates with Projection Transform DESCRIPTION: Command to transform geographic data from EPSG:27700 to EPSG:4326 projection system and convert to GML format using ogr2ogr tool. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-the-gis-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ogr2ogr -s_srs EPSG:27700 -t_srs EPSG:4326 -f GML filename.gml filename.json ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Constant in XML Format DESCRIPTION: Example XML payload for creating a new constant with name and value properties in DHIS2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_21 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` 3.14159265359 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering Interpretations by User Mentions in Description DESCRIPTION: GET request example for filtering interpretations where a specific user is mentioned in the interpretation description. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` GET /api/interpretations?fields=*,comments[*]&filter=mentions.username:in:[boateng] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Accessing DHIS2 Web Interface DESCRIPTION: URL format to access the DHIS2 web interface after installation, where {server_ip} should be replaced with the actual server IP address. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-automated-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` https://{server_ip}/dhis ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Downloading DHIS2 WAR File DESCRIPTION: Download a specific version of the DHIS2 WAR file from the official releases website. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_22 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` wget -O dhis.war https://releases.dhis2.org/40/dhis2-stable-40.3.0.war ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Message Conversations Response in XML DESCRIPTION: XML response from the DHIS2 API showing a list of message conversations for a user, including titles, IDs, and links to the full conversation details. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting UI Locale Using Curl DESCRIPTION: Example of setting the UI locale to French for the current user SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/settings-and-configuration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/33/userSettings/keyUiLocale?value=fr" -X POST -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Multiple DHIS2 Instances DESCRIPTION: Configuration for adding multiple DHIS2 instances in the hosts inventory file, specifying instance names and their respective host addresses. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/post-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: ini CODE: ``` [instances] dhis ansible_host=172.19.1.11 database_host=postgres # your first instance hmis ansible_host=172.19.1.12 database_host=postgres # your second instance ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Writing an Interpretation for a Favorite in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Instructions for creating an interpretation for a favorite visualization in DHIS2. This feature allows users to add comments, questions, or interpretations to their shared favorites. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/classic-data-visualizer.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` 1. Click **Favorites** > **Write interpretation**. 2. In the text field, type a comment, question or interpretation. You can also mention other users with '@username'. Start by typing '@' plus the first letters of the username or real name and a mentioning bar will display the available users. Mentioned users will receive an internal DHIS2 message with the interpretation or comment. You can see the interpretation in the **Dashboard** app. It is possible to format the text with **bold**, *italic* by using the Markdown style markers \* and \_ for **bold** and *italic* respectively. Keyboard shortcuts are also available: Ctrl/Cmd + B and Ctrl/Cmd + I. A limited set of smilies is supported and can be used by typing one of the following character combinations: :) :-) :( :-( :+1 :-1. URLs are automatically detected and converted into a clickable link. 3. Search for a user group that you want to share your favorite with, then click the **+** icon. 4. Change sharing settings for the user groups you want to modify. - **Can edit and view**: Everyone can view and edit the object. - **Can view only**: Everyone can view the object. - **None**: The public won't have access to the object. This setting is only applicable to **Public access**. 5. Click **Share**. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Checking for Data Element Value in Current Event DESCRIPTION: This example shows how to use the d2:hasValue function to check if a specific data element (hemoglobinCurrent) has a value in the current event. The source type is set to 'Data element in current event'. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_35 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2:hasValue( 'hemoglobinCurrent' ) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Response Format for Interpretations in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: Sample JSON response showing the structure of interpretation data, including IDs, timestamps, text, types, likes, user information, and comments. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "interpretations": [ { "id": "XSHiFlHAhhh", "created": "2013-05-30T10:24:06.181+0000", "text": "Data looks suspicious, could be a data entry mistake.", "type": "MAP", "likes": 2, "user": { "id": "uk7diLujYif" }, "reportTable": { "id": "LcSxnfeBxyi" }, "visualization": { "id": "LcSxnfeBxyi" } }, { "id": "kr4AnZmYL43", "created": "2013-05-29T14:47:13.081+0000", "text": "Delivery rates in Bo looks high.", "type": "VISUALIZATION", "likes": 3, "user": { "id": "uk7diLujYif" }, "visualization": { "id": "HDEDqV3yv3H" }, "mentions": [ { "created": "2018-06-25T10:25:54.498", "username": "boateng" } ], "comments": [ { "id": "iB4Etq8yTE6", "text": "This report indicates a surge.", "user": { "id": "B4XIfwOcGyI" } }, { "id": "iB4Etq8yTE6", "text": "Likely caused by heavy rainfall.", "user": { "id": "B4XIfwOcGyI" } }, { "id": "SIjkdENan8p", "text": "Have a look at this @boateng.", "user": { "id": "xE7jOejl9FI" }, "mentions": [ { "created": "2018-06-25T10:03:52.316", "username": "boateng" } ] } ] } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Multiple Data Element Groups with datimutils in R DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates retrieving multiple data element groups using an array of IDs. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/dhis2-and-r-integration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: r CODE: ``` de_groups<-c("oDkJh5Ddh7d","zmWJAEjfv59") datimutils::getDataElementGroups(de_groups,fields = "name,shortName,id") name shortName id 1 Acute Flaccid Paralysis (AFP) Acute Flaccid Paralysis (AFP) oDkJh5Ddh7d 2 Yaws Yaws zmWJAEjfv59 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Indicator SubExpression with Aggregation Type Override in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: A subexpression that explicitly sets the aggregation type to SUM, useful when the data element has a different default aggregation type but you want to sum the results. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_19 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` subExpression( if( #{nYahlae7fe6} > 10, 1, 0 ) ).aggregationType(SUM) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Simple Format Conversion to GML DESCRIPTION: Command to convert geographic data to GML format without changing the projection system using ogr2ogr tool. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-the-gis-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ogr2ogr -f GML filename.gml filename.json ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Tomcat Connector Local Address Configuration DESCRIPTION: XML configuration for Tomcat's server.xml to restrict listening to localhost connections only. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/reverse_proxy_nginx.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Combined Organization Unit Filtering in Java DESCRIPTION: Expression that combines two conditions to filter organization units - excluding those starting with '[' and parent units. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-report-functionality.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: java CODE: ``` ($F{organisationunitname}.charAt( 0 ) != '[')&&$F{organisation_unit_is_parent}.equals("No") ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting and Enabling PostgreSQL Service DESCRIPTION: Commands to start the PostgreSQL database service and enable it to start automatically on system boot. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo systemctl start postgresql sudo systemctl enable postgresql ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: User Management Terms Table DESCRIPTION: Markdown table defining key user management terms including authorities, users, user roles and user groups. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/manage-users-user-roles-and-user-groups.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Term | Definition | Example | |---|---|---| | Authority | A permission to perform one or several specific tasks | Create a new data element

Update an organisation unit

View a report | | User | A person's DHIS2 user account | admin

traore

guest | | User role | A group of authorities | Data entry clerk

System administrator

Antenatal care program access | | User group | A group of users | Kenya staff

Feedback message recipients

HIV program coordinators | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing PostGIS Extension for DHIS2 Database DESCRIPTION: Command to install the PostGIS extension in the DHIS2 database. This is required for GIS and mapping features in DHIS2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo -u postgres psql -c "create extension postgis;" dhis2 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown Command Formatting DESCRIPTION: Example showing how system or database commands are formatted in the documentation using backticks and bold text. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/common/about-this-guide.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` `Commands will be displayed in bold text, and represent a command which would need to be executed on the operating system or database.` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Combining Sum with Current Period Data in DHIS2 Expressions DESCRIPTION: Shows how to add the sum of historical values with a current period value for predictions in DHIS2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_35 LANGUAGE: Expression Language CODE: ``` sum(#{FTRrcoaog83}) + #{T7OyqQpUpNd} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering by Null Values Using NV Keyword in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to filter for null values using the special NV keyword with the EQ operator. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_38 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` &dimension=qrur9Dvnyt5:EQ:NV ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Custom SSL Certificate Type DESCRIPTION: Configures the SSL type to use custom SSL certificates instead of Let's Encrypt in the hosts inventory file.
