SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/post-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: ini CODE: ``` SSL_TYPE=customssl ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Redis Server Package for DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Redis server package using APT. This installs the latest stable version of Redis from the previously added repository. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/how-to/installing-redis.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo apt install redis-server ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example Expression Using Value Count Variable in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: An expression that divides the sum of two data elements by the total count of non-null values in the expression part of the event, using the value_count variable. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_27 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` (#{A03MvHHogjR.a3kGcGDCuk6} + #{A03MvHHogjR.wQLfBvPrXqq}) / V{value_count} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Data Items API Response Example DESCRIPTION: JSON response example from the Data Items API when results are found. It shows the pager information and an array of data items with their properties. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_27 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "pager": { "page": 1, "pageCount": 27, "total": 1339, "pageSize": 50 }, "dataItems": [ { "simplifiedValueType": "TEXT", "displayName": "TB program Gender", "displayShortName": "TB prog. Gen.", "valueType": "TEXT", "name": "TB program Gender", "shortName": "TB prog Gen", "id": "ur1Edk5Oe2n.cejWyOfXge6", "programId": "ur1Edk5Oe2n", "dimensionItemType": "PROGRAM_ATTRIBUTE" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Email Aliases for DHIS2 Server Administration DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows an example /etc/aliases file configuration. It sets up email forwarding rules for system accounts and defines an 'admins' group for receiving important system notifications, including those from DHIS2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/setting-up-email.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` # /etc/aliases mailer-daemon: postmaster postmaster: root nobody: root hostmaster: root usenet: root news: root webmaster: root www: root ftp: root abuse: root noc: root security: root root: admins monit: admins dhiis: admins admins: bobj@somewhere.net,peterg@somewhere.com ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Skip Test Expression with Greater Than Comparison in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates a skip test that compares values of two data elements using the greater than operator in DHIS2 predictor expressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_49 LANGUAGE: Expression Language CODE: ``` #{FTRrcoaog83} > #{M62VHgYT2n0} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Parent Organization Unit Filter in iReport DESCRIPTION: Filter expression used to display data only for the parent organisation unit in DHIS2 charts SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-report-functionality.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` $F{organisation_unit_is_parent}.equals("Yes") ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Glowroot Context Path in Configuration DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration to set the context path for Glowroot. This is necessary when accessing Glowroot through a specific URL path, as configured in the Nginx example. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/glowroot.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "web": { "contextPath": "/glowroot", } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Single Translation Property Example in JSON DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the format for a single translation property for a data element. It demonstrates how to structure a single property translation (NAME) for the French locale, which would be used when working with the translations endpoint. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "property": "NAME", "locale": "fr", "value": "Paralysie Flasque Aiguë (Décès <5 ans)" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Users App Objects Table DESCRIPTION: Markdown table outlining the available functions for different object types in the Users app. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/manage-users-user-roles-and-user-groups.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Object type | Available functions | |---|---| | User | Create, edit, invite, clone, disable, display by organisation unit, delete, show details and reset password | | User role | Create, edit, share, delete and show details | | User group | Create, edit, join, leave, share, delete and show details | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Up PostgreSQL Repository for Ubuntu DESCRIPTION: Commands to add the PostgreSQL repository to APT sources and import the repository signing key for secure installation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo sh -c 'echo "deb https://apt.postgresql.org/pub/repos/apt $(lsb_release -cs)-pgdg main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.list' ``` LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` curl -fsSL https://www.postgresql.org/media/keys/ACCC4CF8.asc|sudo gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/postgresql.gpg ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Facility Information in DHIS2 GIS DESCRIPTION: This markdown table shows how to view organization unit information in the DHIS2 GIS app, including viewing information for the current period and for a selected period. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/using-the-gis-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Function | Action | |------|--------| | View information for the current period | 1. Click a facility. | | View information for a selected period | 1. Right-click a facility and click **Show information**.
2. In the **Infrastructural data** section, select a period.

**Note**

You configure the displayed infrastructural data in the **System Settings** app. | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Verifying Java Installation DESCRIPTION: Command to verify the installed Java version SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` java -version ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating GFM Tables in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to create Github Flavored Markdown tables using pipe syntax. The example shows a simple table with two columns and alignment specifications. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Table Type | Description | |:--|:----| |Commonmark (HTML)| Tables described in pure HTML | |Github Flavour Markdown (GFM)| Tables described with pipes: easier to read/edit, but limited in complexity| ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a Route with Custom Response Timeout DESCRIPTION: JSON request for creating a route with a custom response timeout. This adjusts the maximum time DHIS2 will wait for a response from the upstream server before returning a timeout error. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/route.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "Postman Echo", "code": "postman-post", "disabled": false, "url": "https://postman-echo.com/post", "responseTimeoutSeconds": 10 } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Database Audit Logging in dhis.conf DESCRIPTION: Configuration to store audit data in the database instead of a log file. This was the default behavior up until DHIS2 version 2.38. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/concepts/audit.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` audit.database = on audit.logger = off ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using if and isNull Functions for Conditional Evaluation DESCRIPTION: Shows how to perform conditional evaluation based on whether a value is null using the if and isNull functions together in a program indicator expression. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_23 LANGUAGE: expression CODE: ``` if(isNull(A{GPkGfbmArby}),10,20) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Response for Data Store Namespaces DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response showing all available namespaces in the DHIS2 Data Store. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [ "foo", "bar" ] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Exim4 on Ubuntu/Debian for DHIS2 Email Configuration DESCRIPTION: This command installs the Exim4 mail transfer agent on a Ubuntu or Debian system. Exim4 will be used to handle outgoing mail for the DHIS2 server. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/setting-up-email.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo apt-get install exim4 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Nested Period Offset Functions - DHIS2 Expression DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to nest periodOffset functions to calculate the sum of a data element from two preceding periods. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ( #{FH8ab5Rog83}.periodOffset(-1) + \n#{FH8ab5Rog83} ).periodOffset(-1) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Custom Data Integrity Checks Configuration DESCRIPTION: YAML configuration file example for defining custom data integrity checks in DHIS2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_20 LANGUAGE: yaml CODE: ``` checks: - categories/my_custom_check.yaml - users/my_user_group_check.yaml - base_check.yaml ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: File Permission Setup DESCRIPTION: Shell command to set proper file permissions on the DHIS2 configuration file for security. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/dhis.conf.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` chmod 600 dhis.conf ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Username Requirements in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Specifies the rules for creating a valid username in the DHIS2 system. These rules ensure usernames are secure and consistent across the platform. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/manage-users-user-roles-and-user-groups.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` #### Username requirements The following rules apply when you create a new username. The username must: - Contain at least 4 characters. - Not contain more than 255 characters. - Contain lowercase and UPPERCASE latin characters and numbers (`a-z`,`A-Z`,`0-9`). - These characters are also allowed `. _ @` and `#`, but these may only be used as a separator, and not as a leading or trailing character, and should not be repeated (i.e. `user@@name` is not allowed). ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Log Warning Example - Name Clash DESCRIPTION: Example log output when a data integrity check name is already in use SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_21 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` 09:48:43.138 WARN o.h.d.d.DefaultDataIntegrityService: Data Integrity Check `my_custom_check` not added as a check with that name already exists ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Editing DHIS2 Configuration File DESCRIPTION: Command to open the dhis.conf file for editing to add database connection parameters. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo -u dhis vim /home/dhis/config/dhis.conf ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown Table - Data Export Formats DESCRIPTION: Table describing available data export formats including HTML, JSON, XML, Excel and CSV SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/using-the-event-visualizer-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Format | Description | |---|---| | HTML | Creates HTML table based on selected meta data | | JSON | Downloads data values in JSON format based on selected meta data | | XML | Downloads data values in XML format based on selected meta data | | Microsoft Excel | Downloads data values in Microsoft Excel format based on selected meta data | | CSV | Downloads data values in CSV format based on selected meta data | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Restarting PostgreSQL Service DESCRIPTION: Command to restart the PostgreSQL service after configuration changes SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo systemctl restart postgresql ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Section Anchors in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Shows how to create fixed reference anchors for documentation sections by adding a hash ID in curly brackets at the end of section title lines, enabling cross-document linking. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## Validation { #webapi_validation } To generate a data validation summary you can interact ... ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying and Sorting Events by Scheduled Date in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Example request to fetch events for a specific program and organization unit, sorted by scheduled date in ascending order. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_37 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/tracker/events?orgUnit=DiszpKrYNg8&program=eBAyeGv0exc&order=scheduledAt ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Overriding Default Log Configuration in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to override the default log configuration by specifying a Java system property pointing to a custom Log4j2 configuration file. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/logging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` -Dlog4j2.configurationFile=/home/dhis/config/log4j2.properties ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Testing Disk Performance in Linux DESCRIPTION: Bash commands to test disk latency and throughput on Linux systems. These commands are useful for evaluating server storage performance before installing DHIS2. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/index.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` # disk latency dd if=/dev/zero of=/tmp/test2.img bs=512 count=1000 oflag=dsync # disk throughput dd if=/dev/zero of=/tmp/test1.img bs=1G count=1 oflag=dsync # remove /tmp/test1.img after testing rm -v -i /tmp/test1.img ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using the is Function to Check Values in a List DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to check if a data element or attribute value is in a list of possible values using the is function, which returns true if the first expression matches any of the following expressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_16 LANGUAGE: expression CODE: ``` is(#{oahc9ooVema} in 'New', 'Relapse') ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Top Favorites Without Username DESCRIPTION: Shows how to retrieve the top favorites used in the system without specifying a user. Parameters include eventType to specify the type of event, pageSize to limit results, and sortOrder to determine ordering. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_54 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dataStatistics/favorites?eventType=CHART_VIEW&pageSize=25&sortOrder=ASC ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: DHIS2 Server Settings Configuration Table in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Markdown table documenting server-related settings in DHIS2, including CPU configuration, notification emails, and API keys for various mapping services. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/system-settings.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Setting | Description | |---|---| | **Number of database server CPUs** | Sets the number of CPU cores of your database server.

This allows the system to perform optimally when the database is hosted on a different server than the application server, since analytics in DHIS2 scales linearly with the number of available cores. | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Program Notification Variables in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This table documents the variable codes used in DHIS2 program notifications. It shows the specific variable codes that can be used in notification templates, separated by notification type (Program or Program stage). SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Notification type | Variable name | Variable code | |---|---|---| | Program | Current date | `V{current_date}` | || Days since enrollment date | `V{days_since_enrollment_date}` | || Enrollment date | `V{enrollment_date}` | || Incident date | `V{incident_date}` | || Organisation unit name | `V{org_unit_name}` | || Program name | `V{program_name}` | | Program stage | Current date | `V{current_date}` | || Days since due date | `V{days_since_due_date}` | || Days until due date | `V{days_until_due_date}` | || Due date | `V{due_date}` | || Organisation unit name | `V{org_unit_name}` | || Program name | `V{program_name}` | || Program stage name | `V{program_stage_name}` | || Event organisation unit | `V{event_org_unit_id}` | || Enrollment organisation unit | `V{enrollment_org_unit_id}` | || Program stage id | `V{program_stage_id}` | || Program id | `V{program_id}` | || Program instance id/Enrollment id | `V{enrollment_id}` | || Tracked entity id | `V{tracked_entity_id}` | || Event/Execution date | `V{event_date}` | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: User Lookup Endpoint in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: API endpoint for looking up minimal user information without requiring specific authority. This endpoint is suitable for retrieving basic user details without exposing sensitive information. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` /api/userLookup ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Table of Data Entry Form Types for Event Programs in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to create a markdown table listing different types of data entry forms for event programs in DHIS2, including basic, section, and custom forms. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Form type | Description | |---|---| | Basic | Lists all data elements which belong to the program. You can change the order of the data elements. | | Section | A section groups data elements. You can then arrange the order of the sections to create the desired layout of the data entry form. | | Custom | Defines the data entry form as HTML page. | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Data Element Settings for DHIS2 Event Program DESCRIPTION: This snippet presents a table of optional settings that can be applied to data elements in a DHIS2 event program. It includes options for making elements compulsory, allowing data to be provided elsewhere, displaying in reports, and specifying render types for mobile and desktop interfaces. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Setting | Description | |---|---| | **Compulsory** | The value of this data element must be filled into data entry form before you can complete the event. | | **Allow provided elsewhere** | Specify if the value of this data element comes from other facility, not in the facility where this data is entered. | | **Display in reports** | Displays the value of this data element into the single event without registration data entry function. | | **Date in future** | Will allow user to select a date in future for date data elements. | | **Mobile render type** | Can be used to select different render types for mobile devices. Available options vary depending on the data element's value type. For example, for a numerical value you may select "Default", "Value", "Slider", "Linear scale", and "Spinner". | | **Desktop render type** | WARNING: NOT IMPLEMENTED YET.

Can be used to select different render types for desktop (i.e. the web interface). Available options vary depending on the data element's value type. For example, for a numerical value you may select "Default", "Value", "Slider", "Linear scale", and "Spinner". | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting and committing version with Maven DESCRIPTION: Maven commands for setting and committing a new version across the project. This is used during the DHIS2 release process to update version numbers. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/development-infrastructure.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` mvn versions:set mvn versions:commit ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Deprecated Tracker API Endpoints DESCRIPTION: List of deprecated tracker endpoints that were removed in version 42 SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET/POST/PUT/DELETE /api/trackedEntityInstance GET/POST/PUT/DELETE /api/enrollments GET/POST/PUT/DELETE /api/events GET/POST/PUT/DELETE /api/relationships ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Data Quality Dimensions Table in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows a markdown table that outlines different dimensions of data quality, including correctness, completeness, consistency, and timeliness. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/control-data-quality.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Dimension | Description | |---|---| | Correctness | Data should be within the normal range for data collected at that facility. There should be no gross discrepancies when compared with data from related data elements. | | Completeness | Data for all data elements for all reporting organisation units should have been submitted. | | Consistency | Data should be consistent with data entered during earlier months and years while allowing for changes with reorganization, increased work load, etc. and consistent with other similar facilities. | | Timeliness | All data from all reporting organisation units should be submitted at the appointed time. | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Parsing Audit Entries from Log File with Python DESCRIPTION: Command to extract and parse audit entries from the dhis-audit.log file using grep and the extract_audit.py script. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/concepts/audit.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` $ grep "auditType" dhis-audit.log | python extract_audit.py parse ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Styling Images with Width Attribute in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to control image width using the markdown extension that allows setting attributes in curly brackets. This example sets the image width to 50% of the page. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ![](resources/images/maintainence/predictor_sequential.png){ width=50% } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Demonstrating TextPattern with Current Date and Random Segments in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows a TextPattern that combines a CURRENT_DATE segment with a RANDOM segment. It illustrates how the date format affects the pattern's uniqueness over time. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/dhis2-tutorials.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` CURRENT_DATE(ww) + "-" + RANDOM(#) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing R on Ubuntu Using APT DESCRIPTION: Commands for updating APT, adding R repository keys, and installing R base package on Ubuntu. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/dhis2-and-r-integration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo apt-get update gpg --keyserver pgp.mit.edu --recv-keys 51716619E084DAB9 gpg --armor --export 51716619E084DAB9 | apt-key add - sudo apt-get install r-base ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Log Warning Example - Schema Validation DESCRIPTION: Example log output when a data integrity check fails schema validation SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_23 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` 09:48:43.136 WARN o.h.d.d.DataIntegrityYamlReader: JsonSchema validation errors found for Data Integrity Check `categories/my_custom_check.yaml`. Errors: [$.name: is missing but it is required] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Program Notification Message Template Example in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: An example of a program notification message template in DHIS2 that includes parameter placeholders to personalize notifications. The template addresses the tracked entity instance by name and references the program they're enrolled in. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` Dear A{w75KJ2mc4zz}, You're now enrolled in V{program_name}. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Ansible SSH Connection Configuration DESCRIPTION: Configuration setting for Ansible to use SSH connection method instead of the default LXD connection. This setting is required for distributed deployments. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/concepts/architecture.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: ini CODE: ``` ansible_connection=ssh ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: DHIS2 Analytics Settings Configuration Table in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Markdown table documenting analytics configuration options in DHIS2, including period settings, caching strategies, and dashboard customization options. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/system-settings.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Setting | Description | |---|---| | **Default relative period for analysis** | Defines the relative period to use by default in analytics app: **Data Visualizer**, **Event Reports**, **Event Visualizer**, **GIS** and **Pivot Table** apps. The relative period will be automatically selected when you open these apps.

Recommended setting: the most commonly used relative period among your users. | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Checking for Data Element Value in Any Event of Enrollment DESCRIPTION: This example demonstrates using d2:hasValue to check if a data element (hemoglobin) has a value in any event within the current enrollment. The source type is set to 'Data element from the newest event in the current program'. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_36 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2:hasValue( 'hemoglobin' ) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running pgbadger analysis for Amazon RDS DESCRIPTION: This command runs pgbadger analysis for Amazon RDS, specifying a custom log line prefix that matches RDS's format. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/analysing-postgresql-logs-using-pgbadger.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pgbadger -j 4 -p '%t:%r:%u@%d:[%p]:' pg_clean.log ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Relationship Entity Constraints Table in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows a markdown table that illustrates the different combinations of entity constraints for relationships in DHIS2. It outlines the requirements for Tracked Entity Type, Program, and Program Stage across different entity types. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/relationship-model.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | | Tracked Entity Instance | Enrollment | Event | |---------------------|-------------------------|------------|----------| | Tracked Entity Type | Required | Optional | - | | Program | - | Required | - | | Program Stage | - | Required | Optional | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Pushing a release branch to GitHub DESCRIPTION: Git commands to check out the newly created release branch and push it to the remote repository with upstream tracking. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/development-infrastructure.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` git checkout 2.25 git push --set-upstream origin 2.25 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating an Option Set Table in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to create a table in Markdown format to display available functions for different option set objects in the Maintenance app. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_30 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Object type | Available functions | |---|---| | Option set | Create, edit, clone, share, delete, show details and translate | | Option group | Create, edit, clone, share, delete, show details and translate | | Option group set | Create, edit, clone, share, delete, show details and translate | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Converting Coordinates from EPSG:27700 to EPSG:4326 GeoJSON DESCRIPTION: Command to transform coordinates from EPSG:27700 projection to EPSG:4326 (geographic longitude/latitude) and convert to GeoJSON format using ogr2ogr tool. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-the-gis-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ogr2ogr -s_srs EPSG:27700 -t_srs EPSG:4326 -f GeoJSON filename.geojson filename.shp ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Extracting Audit Data Using dhis2-audit-data-extractor DESCRIPTION: Command to extract logs from the audit table using the dhis2-audit-data-extractor Python tool. This should be run on the system where DHIS2 is installed. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/concepts/audit.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` $ python extract_audit.py extract ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering Validation Results by Multiple Organization Units in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Makes a GET request to retrieve validation results filtered by two organization units. Results matching either unit will be returned (OR logic for the same filter type). SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/36/validationResults?ou=jNb63DIHuwU&ou=RzgSFJ9E46G ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Calculating Capacity for Random Segments in DHIS2 TextPattern DESCRIPTION: These examples demonstrate how to calculate the capacity of RANDOM segments in TextPattern. The capacity depends on the character types used ('#' for digits, 'X' or 'x' for letters, '*' for any character) and their combinations. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/dhis2-tutorials.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` RANDOM(#) = 10 = 10 RANDOM(X) = 26 = 26 RANDOM(*) = 62 = 62 RANDOM(X##) = 26 * 10 * 10 = 2600 RANDOM(XXxx) = 26 * 26 * 26 * 26 = 456976 RANDOM(***) = 62 * 62 * 62 = 238328 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring DHIS2 Documentation Metadata in YAML DESCRIPTION: YAML configuration defining metadata properties for DHIS2 documentation including author, version, warranty disclaimer, and license information. Contains dynamic git-based variables for version tracking and timestamp information.
