A copy of the license is included in the source of this documentation, and is available here online: ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Tracked Entity Instance Audits by Date Range (Deprecated) DESCRIPTION: Example API request for retrieving deprecated tracked entity instance audits within a specific date range and of a specific audit type. Demonstrates pagination with pageSize parameter. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/audit.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/33/audits/trackedEntityInstance.json?startDate=2021-03-01&endDate=2022-04-24&auditType=READ&pageSize=5 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering Parent Organization Unit in DHIS2 Reports DESCRIPTION: Expression used to exclude the parent organization unit from displaying in the report table. This code checks if the current row's organization unit is not the parent unit. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-report-functionality.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: java CODE: ``` $F{organisation_unit_is_parent}.equals("No") ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Prometheus User DESCRIPTION: Command to create a system user for running Prometheus service. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/monitoring.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` useradd -rs /bin/false prometheus ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving User-Specific Top Favorites DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to retrieve the top favorites for a specific user. This request includes the username parameter to limit results to favorites of that particular user. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_55 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/dataStatistics/favorites?eventType=CHART_VIEW&pageSize=25&sortOrder=ASC&username=admin ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown Table - Chart Display Options DESCRIPTION: Table listing all available chart customization options including data, axes, and general display settings SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/using-the-event-visualizer-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Option | Description || |---|---|---| | **Data** | **Show values** | Displays values as numbers on top of each series. | || **Use 100% stacked values** | Displays 100 % stacked values in column charts. | || **Use cumulative values** | Displays cumulative values in line charts. | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Logging out of DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Instructions for logging out of DHIS2 using the user interface. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/about-demo-server-live-package-and-database-design.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` Just click on the Profile and the click "Log out" the top-right corner of the DHIS2 menu. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Table of Program Metadata Objects in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to create a markdown table listing various program metadata objects in the DHIS2 Maintenance app, including their descriptions and available functions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Object type | Description | Available functions | |---|---|---| | Event program | A program to record single event without registration | Create, edit, share, delete, show details and translate | | Tracker program | A program to record single or multiple events with registration | Create, edit, share, delete, show details and translate | | Program indicator | An expression based on data elements and attributes of tracked entities which you use to calculate values based on a formula. | Create, edit, clone, share, delete, show details and translate | | Program rule | Allows you to create and control dynamic behaviour of the user interface in the **Tracker Capture** and **Event Capture** apps. | Create, edit, clone, delete, show details and translate | | Program rule variable | Variables you use to create program rule expressions. | Create, edit, clone, delete, show details and translate | | Relationship type | Defines the relationship between tracked entity A and tracked entity B, for example mother and child. | Create, edit, clone, share, delete, show details and translate | | Tracked entity type | Types of entities which can be tracked through the system. Can be anything from persons to commodities, for example a medicine or a person.

A program must have one tracked entity. To enrol a tracked entity instance into a program, the tracked entity of an entity and tracked entity of a program must be the same.

**Note**

A program must be specified with only one tracked entity. Only tracked entity as same as the tracked entity of program can enroll into that program. | Create, edit, clone, share, delete, show details and translate | | Tracked entity attribute | Used to register extra information for a tracked entity.

Can be shared between programs. | Create, edit, clone, share, delete, show details and translate | | Program | A program consist of program stages. | Create, edit, share, delete, assign to organisation units, show details and translate | | Program stage | A program stage defines which actions should be taken at each stage. | Create, edit, share, change sort order, delete, show details and translate | | Program indicator group | A group of program indicators | Create, edit, clone, share, delete, show details and translate | | Validation rule | A validation rule is based on an expression which defines a relationship between data element values. | Create, edit, clone, share, delete, show details and translate | | Program notification | Automated message reminder

Set reminders to be automatically sent to enrolled tracked entity instances before scheduled appointments and after missed visits. | Create, edit and delete | | Program stage notification | Automated message reminder

Set reminders to be automatically sent whenever a program stage is completed, or before or after the due date. | Create, edit and delete | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Parsing Audit Entries from Log File with jq DESCRIPTION: Command to extract and format audit entries from dhis-audit.log using grep and jq for JSON formatting. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/concepts/audit.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` $ grep "auditType" dhis-audit.log | jq -r . ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Downloading Prometheus Binary DESCRIPTION: Command to download the Prometheus release package from GitHub. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/monitoring.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` wget https://github.com/prometheus/prometheus/releases/download/v2.15.2/prometheus-2.15.2.linux-amd64.tar.gz ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Listing Job Queue Names in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This endpoint lists the unique names of existing job queues. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_17 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/scheduler/queues ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Tracked Entity Geometry Example DESCRIPTION: Example of GeoJSON geometry property for tracked entities SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/tracker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "type": "POINT", "coordinates": [123.0, 123.0] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Cleaning PostgreSQL log file for DHIS 2 DESCRIPTION: This bash command filters out long-running analytics queries from the PostgreSQL log file to focus on other potential issues. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/analysing-postgresql-logs-using-pgbadger.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` cat pg.log | grep -viE "create index|insert into analytics|vacuum analyze analytics" > pg_clean.log ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Measuring Disk Performance for PostgreSQL with DD Command in Linux DESCRIPTION: This command tests disk latency by writing 1000 blocks of 512 bytes each with synchronized I/O, which is important for evaluating PostgreSQL performance. It's used to detect potential disk performance issues, with latency exceeding 3 seconds indicating possible problems. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/hosting/physical-hosting.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` dd if=/dev/zero of=/tmp/test2.img bs=512 count=1000 oflag=dsync ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Value Types for Data Elements in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This snippet provides a table of various value types that can be assigned to data elements in DHIS2. It includes descriptions for each value type, helping users understand the appropriate usage for different data scenarios. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Value type | Description | |---|---| | Age | Dates rendered as calendar widget OR by entering number of years, months and/or days which calculates the date value based on current date. The date will be saved in the backend. | | Coordinate | A point coordinate specified as longitude and latitude in decimal degrees. All coordinate should be specified in the format [-19.23 , 56.42] with brackets and a comma separating the longitude and latitude. | | Date | Dates rendered as calendar widget in data entry. | | Date & time | Is a combination of the **DATE** and **TIME** data elements. | | Email | Email. | | File | A file resource where you can store external files, for example documents and photos. | | Image | A file resource where you can store photos.

Unlike the **FILE** data element, the **IMAGE** data element can display the uploaded image directly in forms. | | Integer | Any whole number (positive and negative), including zero. | | Letter | A single letter. | | Long text | Textual value. Renders as text area with no length constraint in forms. | | Negative integer | Any whole number less than (but not including) zero. | | Number | Any real numeric value with a single decimal point. Thousands separators and scientific notation is not supported. | | Percentage | Whole numbers inclusive between 0 and 100. | | Phone number | Phone number. | | Positive integer | Any whole number greater than (but not including) zero. | | Positive or zero integer | Any positive whole number, including zero. | | Organisation unit | Organisation units rendered as a hierarchy tree widget.

If the user has assigned "search organisation units", these will be displayed instead of the assigned organisation units. | | Unit interval | Any real number greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 1. | | Text | Textual value. The maximum number of allowed characters per value is 50,000. | | Time | Time is stored in HH:mm format.

HH is a number between 0 and 23

mm is a number between 00 and 59 | | Tracker associate | Tracked entity instance. Rendered as dialog with a list of tracked entity instances and a search field. | | Username | DHIS2 user. Rendered as a dialog with a list of users and a search field. The user will need the "View User" authority to be able to utilise this data type | | Yes/No | Boolean values, renders as drop-down lists in data entry. | | Yes only | True values, renders as check-boxes in data entry. | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Grafana DESCRIPTION: Commands for installing Grafana on Ubuntu/Debian systems including repository setup and package installation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/monitoring.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` apt-get install -y apt-transport-https wget -q -O - "https://packages.grafana.com/gpg.key" | sudo apt-key add - add-apt-repository "deb https://packages.grafana.com/oss/deb stable main" apt-get update apt-get install grafana ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a Legend Table in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to create a table in Markdown format to represent legend items with their start and end values. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_29 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Legend item | Start value | End value | |---|---|---| | Low bad | 0 | 50 | | Medium | 50 | 80 | | High good | 80 | 100 | | Too high | 100 | 1000 | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Monitoring PostgreSQL Logs DESCRIPTION: Command to monitor PostgreSQL log file in real-time using tail command. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/how-to/PostgreSQL-setup.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo tail -f /var/log/postgresql/postgresql-16-main.log ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Extracting Prometheus Archive DESCRIPTION: Command to extract the downloaded Prometheus archive file. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/monitoring.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` tar xvzf prometheus-2.15.2.linux-amd64.tar.gz ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Server Disk Space in Linux DESCRIPTION: Command to check available disk space on a Linux server, useful for ensuring sufficient storage for backups. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/concepts/Upgrade-Guide.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` df -h ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Conditional Standard Deviation Calculation in DHIS2 Expressions DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates handling the special case of a single sample by conditionally returning 0 instead of a standard deviation calculation in DHIS2 predictor expressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_40 LANGUAGE: Expression Language CODE: ``` if(count(#{T7OyqQpUpNd}) == 1, 0, stddevSamp(#{T7OyqQpUpNd})) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Geo Features Using Custom Coordinate Field DESCRIPTION: Shows how to retrieve geospatial features using a custom coordinate field from an Organization Unit attribute. The coordinateField parameter specifies which attribute to use for coordinates instead of the default geometry property. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_63 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/geoFeatures.json?ou=ou:LEVEL-3&coordinateField=tJqtSV4quLb ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using File Includes in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use !INCLUDE directives to include the contents of another markdown file into the current document using relative paths. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` !INCLUDE "../other_directory/other_file.md" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Redis Keyspace Events DESCRIPTION: Redis server configuration to enable keyspace event notifications required for optimal cluster performance. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/how-to/tomcat-clustering.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` notify-keyspace-events Egx ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building DHIS2 Documentation Docker Image DESCRIPTION: Command to build the Docker image for DHIS2 documentation. This creates the container image that includes all necessary dependencies for building the documentation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/docker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` docker build -t dhis2/dhis2-docs-builder . ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Restarting PostgreSQL Service DESCRIPTION: Restarts the PostgreSQL service to apply configuration changes. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/postgresql.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo systemctl restart postgresql ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing pgbadger from GitHub release DESCRIPTION: These commands download, extract, and install pgbadger from a GitHub release. Adjust the version number in the filename as needed. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/analysing-postgresql-logs-using-pgbadger.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` tar xvf pgbadger-6.4.tar.gz cd pgbadger-6.4 perl Makefile.PL make && sudo make install ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Data Items API Empty Results Response DESCRIPTION: JSON response example from the Data Items API when no results are found. It returns a successful status code (200) but with an empty data items array. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_28 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "pager": { "page": 1, "pageCount": 1, "total": 0, "pageSize": 50 }, "dataItems": [ ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Formatting Bibliography Entry in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This code snippet demonstrates how to format a bibliography entry in Markdown. It includes the author's name, title of the work, publication details, and a URL link to the resource. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/bibliography.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` [AlSaid2010] Said Salah Eldin Al Said. *The health information system in Sudan.* The University of Oslo. 2010. http://urn.nb.no/URN:NBN:no-27062. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Report Types Table in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows a markdown table listing different report types available in the Tracker Capture app, including their descriptions. It covers Program summary, Program statistics, Upcoming events, and Overdue events reports. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/using-the-tracker-capture-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Report type | Description | |---|---| | Program summary | A summary report for a particular program, organisation unit and time frame. The report consist of a list of TEIs and their records organised based on program stages. | | Program statistics | A statistics report for a particular program. The report provides for example an overview of drop-outs or completion rates in a given time frame at a particular organisation unit. | | Upcoming events | A tabular report showing tracked entity instances and their upcoming events for a selected program and time. You can sort the columns and search the values. Show/hide operations are possible on the columns. You can also export the table to Microsoft Excel. | | Overdue events | A list of events for a selected program. The report displays a list of TEIs and their events that are not completed on time. You can sort the columns and search the values You can also export the table to Microsoft Excel. | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Response for Favorite Statistics DESCRIPTION: Shows the structure of the JSON response when retrieving statistics for a specific favorite. The response contains a single property indicating the number of views for that favorite. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_60 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "views": 3 } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown API Experimental Tag DESCRIPTION: Example showing how experimental API sections are marked using backticks. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/common/about-this-guide.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` `(Experimental)` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Verifying Java Installation DESCRIPTION: Command to verify that Java has been installed correctly by checking the installed version. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` java -version ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Log Warning Example - Code Clash DESCRIPTION: Example log output when a data integrity check code is already in use SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-validation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_22 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` 09:48:43.138 WARN o.h.d.d.DefaultDataIntegrityService: Data Integrity Check `my_custom_check` not added as a check with the code `MCC` already exists ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Validation Rule Functions Table in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Markdown table showing validation rule functions with their arguments and descriptions for use in DHIS2 validation rules. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_27 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Validation Rule Function | Arguments | Description | |---|---|---| | contains | (expr, sub1, ...) | Searches an expression for one or more substrings. Returns true if the expression contains all the substrings. For example, the following are all true: contains("abcd", "abcd"); contains("abcd", "b"); and contains("abcd", "ab", "bc"). Comparisons are case-sensitive. | | containsItems | (expr, item1, ...) | Searches an expression for one or more items. The expression is made up of comma-separated elements. containsItems returns true if every item exactly matches an element in the expression. For example, containsItems("abcd", "abcd") and containsItems("ab,cd", "ab", "cd") are true, but containsItems("abcd", "b") and containsItems("abcd", "ab", "bc") are false. Comparisons are case-sensitive. containsItems can be used for multi-valued data elements to see if an item is contained in the data element values. | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring MkDocs Template in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Front matter configuration specifying the home.html template for the MkDocs documentation page. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/termsofuse.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` --- template: home.html --- ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Listing Ansible Connection Plugins for DHIS2 Deployment DESCRIPTION: Terminal command to display all available connection plugins in Ansible that can be used for DHIS2 deployment. This command helps users understand the various connection options available when using the dhis2-server-tools. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/dhis2-tools.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ansible-doc -t connection --list ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: File Path Example for Google Auth JSON DESCRIPTION: Example file path showing where to place the Google authentication JSON file in the DHIS2_HOME directory alongside dhis.conf SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/google-service-account-config.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` /home/dhis/config/dhis-google-auth.json ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example User Lookup by ID in DHIS2 Web API DESCRIPTION: Example of an API request for looking up a user with the identifier 'QqvaU7JjkUV'. Returns minimal information about the user including ID, username, name details, and display name. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` /api/userLookup/QqvaU7JjkUV ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Remove Metadata Proposal JSON Format in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example JSON payload for proposing the removal of an existing metadata object. Requires the object type and target ID to identify which object should be removed. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_109 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "type": "REMOVE", "target": "ORGANISATION_UNIT", "targetId": "" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering Audit Events by Date Range with jq DESCRIPTION: Command to filter audit events within a specific date range (January to June 2022) from the log file using grep and jq. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/concepts/audit.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` $ grep "auditType" dhis-audit.log | jq -r '.[] | select ( (.datetime >="2022-01-01") and (.datetime <= "2022-06-30") )' ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Table Structure - Missing Value Strategy Options DESCRIPTION: Markdown table defining the missing value strategy options for validation rules, including skip conditions and descriptions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_28 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Option | Description | |---|---| | Skip if any value is missing | The validation rule will be skipped if any of the values which compose the expression are missing. This is the default option.

Always select this option you use the **Exclusive pair** or **Compulsory pair** operator. | | Skip if all values are missing | The validation rule will be skipped only if all of the operands which compose it are missing. | | Never skip | The validation rule will never be skipped in case of missing data, and all missing operands will be treated effectively as a zero. | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Weight-for-Height/Length Reference Data (Boys) DESCRIPTION: CSV formatted table containing weight-for-height/length reference values for boys. The data includes height measurements from 45.0-119.5 cm with corresponding weight values at different standard deviation scores (SD3neg through SD3). SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/resources/txt-files/zScoreWFH-boys-table.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: csv CODE: ``` Height,SD3neg,SD2neg,SD1neg,SD0,SD1,SD2,SD3 45.0,1.877,2.043,2.230,2.441,2.680,2.951,3.261 45.5,1.942,2.114,2.307,2.524,2.771,3.050,3.37 46.0,2.008,2.185,2.384,2.608,2.861,3.149,3.477 [...additional rows omitted for brevity...] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Opening PostgreSQL Configuration File DESCRIPTION: Command to open the PostgreSQL configuration file for editing SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` sudo nano /etc/postgresql/12/main/postgresql.conf ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Dimension Recommendations DESCRIPTION: Endpoint to get dimension recommendations for specific data elements. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/33/dimensions/recommendations?fields=id&dimension=dx:fbfJHSPpUQD ``` LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/33/dimensions/recommendations?fields=id&dimension=dx:fbfJHSPpUQD;JuTpJ2Ywq5b ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Complete Visualization Object in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: Example response showing the complete structure of a visualization object from DHIS2. Contains metadata like creation date, access settings, dimensions, axes configuration, and data element references. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "lastUpdated": "2020-02-06T11:57:09.678", "href": "http://my-domain/dhis/api/visualizations/hQxZGXqnLS9", "id": "hQxZGXqnLS9", "created": "2017-05-19T17:22:00.785", "name": "ANC: ANC 1st visits last 12 months cumulative values", "publicAccess": "rw------", "userOrganisationUnitChildren": false, "type": "LINE", "access": {}, "reportingParams": { "parentOrganisationUnit": false, "reportingPeriod": false, "organisationUnit": false, "grandParentOrganisationUnit": false }, "dataElementGroupSetDimensions": [], "attributeDimensions": [], "yearlySeries": [], "axes": [ { "index": 0, "type": "RANGE", "title": { "textMode": "CUSTOM", "text": "Any Title" } } ], "filterDimensions": [ "dx" ], "columns": [ { "id": "ou" } ], "dataElementDimensions": [], "categoryDimensions": [], "rowDimensions": [ "pe" ], "columnDimensions": [ "ou" ], "dataDimensionItems": [ { "dataDimensionItemType": "DATA_ELEMENT", "dataElement": { "id": "fbfJHSPpUQD" } } ], "filters": [ { "id": "dx" } ], "rows": [ { "id": "pe" } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Error Response for Message Removal in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Illustrates the JSON response format when a message removal operation fails due to an invalid user ID. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "message" : "No user with uid: dMV6G0tPAEa" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown Table - Available Download Formats DESCRIPTION: A markdown table showing the different formats available for downloading event report data, including HTML, JSON, XML, Microsoft Excel and CSV formats. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/using-the-event-reports-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Format | Description | |---|---| | HTML | Creates HTML table based on selected meta data | | JSON | Downloads data values in JSON format based on selected meta data | | XML | Downloads data values in XML format based on selected meta data | | Microsoft Excel | Downloads data values in Microsoft Excel format based on selected meta data | | CSV | Downloads data values in CSV format based on selected meta data | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Editing PostgreSQL Configuration File DESCRIPTION: Command to open the PostgreSQL configuration file for editing using nano text editor. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/concepts/PostgreSQL-performance-tuning.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo nano /etc/postgresql/12/main/postgresql.conf ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Cache Statistics Documentation DESCRIPTION: Documentation section explaining the cache statistics functionality for system administrators SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/data-administration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## Cache Statistics { #data_admin_cache_statistics } This option is for system administrators only to use. The cache statistics shows the status of the application level cache. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example JSON Response for Single Field Query in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Shows the structure of a JSON response when requesting a single field (surname) for multiple users, including pagination information. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata-gist.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "pager": { "page": 1, "pageSize": 50 }, "users": [ "Kamara", "Wakiki", "Nana", "Malai", ... ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running pgbadger analysis DESCRIPTION: This command runs pgbadger analysis on the cleaned log file, utilizing 4 CPU cores for faster processing. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/analysing-postgresql-logs-using-pgbadger.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pgbadger -j 4 pg_clean.log ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Markdown Documentation Table DESCRIPTION: A markdown table that organizes DHIS2 documentation links by task categories, showing relationships between user tasks, documentation links, and related applications. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/getting-started-help-to-navigate-the-user-guide.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | What do you want to do? || Link to documentation | Related app(s) | |---|---|---|---| | Enter data | Enter aggregate data | [Using the Data Entry app](https://docs.dhis2.org/master/en/user/html/data_entry_app.html) | **Data Entry** | || Enter data for a program without registration (event program) | [Using the Capture app](https://docs.dhis2.org/master/en/user/html/capture_app.html) | **Capture** | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Extracting Right Substring Using d2:right Function DESCRIPTION: This example shows how to extract the rightmost 2 characters from a text variable using the d2:right function. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_52 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2:right(#{variableWithText}, 2) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: DHIS2 Distributed Deployment Command DESCRIPTION: Ansible playbook execution command for deploying DHIS2 in a distributed architecture. The command includes parameters for SSH user authentication and privilege escalation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/concepts/architecture.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ansible-playbook dhis2.yml -u= -Kk ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Managing Visible Columns in Metadata Object Lists (Markdown) DESCRIPTION: Instructions for customizing which columns are displayed in metadata object lists. This includes steps for adding, reordering, and removing columns. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` 1. Click the ![](resources/images/maintenance/icon_settings.png) icon to the top right of the list of objects you want to configure. 2. A dropdown-menu will appear, select **Manage columns**. 3. A dialog will appear, with the default columns selected. 3. Click any column-name in the list of **Available columns** to add them to the list of selected columns. 4. You may reorder the selected columns by drag-and-dropping the ![](resources/images/maintenance/icon_reorder.png) icon. 5. You may also remove any column from the view by clicking the X-icon next to the name. 6. Click **Save** once you are satisified with your changes. You may easily reset to the default values by clicking the **Reset to default** button. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: GoAccess Configuration Settings DESCRIPTION: Required configuration settings for GoAccess to properly parse nginx log files, including time format, date format, and log format specifications. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/analysing-nginx-logs-using-goaccess.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: conf CODE: ``` time-format %T date-format %d/%b/%Y log-format %h %^[%d:%t %^] "%r" %s %b "%R" "%u" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Formatting JSON Response for Organization Units Gist API DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the structure of a JSON response from the organization units gist API endpoint. It includes a pager object with pagination details and an array of organization units. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata-gist.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "pager": { "page": 1, "pageSize": 50, "nextPage": "/organisationUnits/gist?page=2" }, "organisationUnits": [ ... ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown Authentication Header DESCRIPTION: Simple markdown header defining the authentication section SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/reference/authentication.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` # authentication ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Event Registration Format DESCRIPTION: Format for registering anonymous events using EVENT_REGISTRATION_PARSER. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/mobile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` birth A=1,B=2,G=Male ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example Filter Using Analytics Period End Variable in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: A filter expression that uses the 'Analytics period end' variable to only include women who have a Last Menstrual Period (LMP) that would be in the first trimester, checking if days between the LMP and the end of the analytics period is less than or equal to 84 days. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_26 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` d2:daysBetween(#{WZbXY0S00lP.w4ky6EkVahL}, V{analytics_period_end}) <= 84 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Comments in DHIS2 Program Indicator Expressions DESCRIPTION: Examples demonstrating how to add single-line and multi-line comments in program indicator expressions or filters. Comments are denoted using /* */ syntax. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-programs-in-the-maintenance-app.md#2025-04-22_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: SQL CODE: ``` d2:hasValue(#{mCXR7u4kNBW.NFkjsNiQ9PH}) /* this is comment */ d2:hasValue(#{mCXR7u4kNBW.NFkjsNiQ9PH}) && /* this is comment */ d2:daysBetween(V{enrollment_date},PS_EVENTDATE:mCXR7u4kNBW) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Opening GoAccess Configuration File DESCRIPTION: Command to edit the GoAccess configuration file using vi editor. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/analysing-nginx-logs-using-goaccess.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo vi /etc/goaccess.conf ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sending JSON Message with cURL DESCRIPTION: cURL command to send a JSON message stored in 'message.json' to the DHIS2 API version 33, authenticating as the admin user. The command posts to the messageConversations endpoint. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -d @message.json "https://play.dhis2.org/demo/api/33/messageConversations" -H "Content-Type:application/json" -u admin:district -X POST ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: User Replication Command in DHIS2 API (Bash) DESCRIPTION: Example of a curl command to replicate a user using the DHIS2 API. Requires admin credentials and user UID. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/users.md#2025-04-22_snippet_27 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` curl -d @replica.json "localhost/api/33/users/N3PZBUlN8vq/replica" -H "Content-Type:application/json" -u admin:district ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating Custom Icon Payload in JSON DESCRIPTION: JSON payload for updating an existing custom icon in DHIS2. The request requires the icon key for identification and can include updated description and keywords. Partial updates are supported where only specified fields will be modified. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_42 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "key": "iconKey", "description": "new description", "keywords": ["new keyword 1", "new keyword 2"] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sample Data Elements Output from DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Example output showing the structure of the data elements data frame retrieved from the DHIS2 API, with names and IDs. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/dhis2-and-r-integration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: r CODE: ``` name id 2 Accute Flaccid Paralysis (Deaths < 5 yrs) FTRrcoaog83 210 Acute Flaccid Paralysis (AFP) follow-up P3jJH5Tu5VC 3 Acute Flaccid Paralysis (AFP) new FQ2o8UBlcrS 4 Acute Flaccid Paralysis (AFP) referrals M62VHgYT2n0 5 Additional notes related to facility uF1DLnZNlWe 6 Admission Date eMyVanycQSC ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Program Stage Data Entry Format DESCRIPTION: Format for entering program stage data using PROGRAM_STAGE_DATAENTRY_PARSER. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/mobile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` programstage bcgd=1|opvd=2|wght=34 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Message for User Groups in XML DESCRIPTION: XML payload format for sending a message to all users in multiple user groups in DHIS2. This structure includes subject, text content, and a list of user group IDs. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/messaging.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` This is the subject This is the text ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Category Options in CSV Format DESCRIPTION: Example CSV file showing the simple format for importing category options. Includes only the essential fields: name, uid, code, and shortname. This format demonstrates minimal required data for successful import. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_90 LANGUAGE: csv CODE: ``` name,uid,code,shortname "Male",,"MALE" "Female",,"FEMALE" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Data Items API Error Response DESCRIPTION: JSON error response example from the Data Items API when an invalid query is submitted. It returns a conflict status code (409) with details about the error. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/visualizations.md#2025-04-22_snippet_29 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Conflict", "httpStatusCode": 409, "status": "ERROR", "message": "Unable to parse element `INVALID_TYPE` on filter dimensionItemType`. The values available are: [INDICATOR, DATA_ELEMENT, DATA_ELEMENT_OPERAND, DATA_SET, PROGRAM_INDICATOR, PROGRAM_DATA_ELEMENT, PROGRAM_ATTRIBUTE]", "errorCode": "E2016" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Scheduler Listing in DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: This endpoint retrieves the complete scheduler listing, which includes both job configurations and job queues. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/scheduling.md#2025-04-22_snippet_22 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` GET /api/scheduler ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Error Response Format for Event Analytics API DESCRIPTION: Example of the JSON error response returned when constraints are violated in the event analytics API. Shows the structure including HTTP status, code, and error message. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/analytics.md#2025-04-22_snippet_36 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "httpStatus": "Conflict", "httpStatusCode": 409, "status": "ERROR", "message": "At least one organisation unit must be specified", "errorCode": "E7200" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown Table: Healthcare Position Authority Matrix DESCRIPTION: A structured table defining common healthcare positions, their typical tasks, and recommended system authorities in DHIS2. Includes guidance for system administrators, health managers, and data entry staff. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/manage-users-user-roles-and-user-groups.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Position | Typical tasks | Recommended authorities | Comment | |---|---|---|---| | System administrators | Set up the basic structure (metadata) of the system. | Add, update and delete the core elements of the system, for example data elements, indicators and data sets. | Only system administrators should modify metadata.
If you allow users outside the system administrators team to modify the metadata, it might lead to problems with coordination.

Updates to the system should only be performed by the administrators of the system. | | National health managers

Province health managers | Monitor and analyse data | Access to the reports module, the **GIS**, **Data Quality** apps and the dashboard. | Don't need access to enter data, modify data elements or data sets. | | National health information system division officers (HISO)

District health records and information officers (DHRIO)

Facility health records and information officers (HRIO) | Enter data that comes from facilities which are not able to do so directly

Monitor, evaluate and analyse data | Access to all the analysis and validation apps

Access to the **Data Entry** app. | - | | Data entry clerks | - | - | - | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Category Objects and Available Functions (Markdown) DESCRIPTION: Table describing the available functions for different category objects in the Maintenance app. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-metadata.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Object type | Available functions | |---|---| | Category option | Create, edit, clone, share, delete, show details and translate | | Category | Create, edit, clone, share, delete, show details and translate | | Category combination | Create, edit, clone, share, delete, show details and translate | | Category option combination | Edit and show details | | Category option group | Create, edit, clone, share, delete, show details and translate | | Category option group set | Create, edit, clone, share, delete, show details and translate | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Organisation Unit Image File in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: API endpoint for retrieving the actual image file content for an organisation unit using the file resource ID. The Content-Type header will reflect the image format (JPG, JPEG, or PNG). SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/organisation-unit-profile.md#2025-04-22_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` GET /api/fileResources/{id}/data ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating Ubuntu Package Lists for Redis Installation DESCRIPTION: Command to update the package lists after adding the Redis repository. This ensures the system recognizes the newly added repository before installation. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/how-to/installing-redis.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo apt update ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Token Constraints DESCRIPTION: JSON request body for modifying token constraints including IP allowlist and method restrictions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/overview.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "version": 1, "type": "PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN", "expire": 163465349603200, "attributes": [ { "type": "IpAllowedList", "allowedIps": ["192.168.0.1"] }, { "type": "MethodAllowedList", "allowedMethods": ["GET"] } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Allowed Metadata Sync Remote Servers DESCRIPTION: Property to set the allowed list of servers for metadata pull functionality. It accepts comma-separated values, and it's recommended that each server URL ends with a '/' for enhanced security. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_40 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` metadata.sync.remote_servers_allowed = https://server1.org/,https://server2.org/ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updated Entry with Rolling Array Example DESCRIPTION: Example JSON showing nested data structure with arrays that can be updated using the roll functionality. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/data-store.md#2025-04-22_snippet_26 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "name": "wisker", "favFood": [ "fish", "rabbit" ], "type": { "breed": ["shorthair"] } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Multiple DHIS2 Instances DESCRIPTION: Example configuration for running multiple DHIS2 instances on the same server using LXD containers. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-automated-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` [instances] dhis ansible_host=172.19.1.11 database_host=postgres # your first instance hmis ansible_host=172.19.1.12 database_host=postgres # your second instance ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Accessing DHIS2 Demo Server DESCRIPTION: Instructions for accessing the DHIS2 demo server at play.dhis2.org/demo with provided login credentials. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/about-demo-server-live-package-and-database-design.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` The DHIS2 team maintains a demonstration server at . This is by far the easiest way to try out DHIS2. Simply open the link in your web browser and login with username = admin and password = district. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Enabling SQL View Write Permissions DESCRIPTION: Property to enable or disable write permissions for SQL views in DHIS2. This prohibits SQL views from performing underlying writes when disabled. Enabling is not recommended. Default is 'off'. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_38 LANGUAGE: properties CODE: ``` system.system.sql_view_write_enabled = on | off ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Tomcat User Package in Linux DESCRIPTION: Install the Tomcat user package, which allows creating new Tomcat instances. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_17 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` sudo apt-get install -y tomcat9-user ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting DHIS2 Configuration File Permissions DESCRIPTION: Command to set secure permissions on the DHIS2 configuration file SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/installation.md#2025-04-22_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` chmod 600 dhis.conf ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Monitoring DHIS2 Logs DESCRIPTION: View the DHIS2 logs in real-time using the tail command. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/sysadmin/getting-started/linux-manual-install.md#2025-04-22_snippet_25 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` tail -f /home/dhis/tomcat-dhis/logs/catalina.out ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring a Webhook Target with API Token Authentication DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration for a webhook target that sends event data to a specified URL using API token authentication. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/event-hooks.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "type": "webhook", "url": "http://localhost:3000/api/gateway", "headers": {}, "auth": { "type": "api-token", "token": "EB3F6799-AA5A-47E8-B6B7-97EA54EB3873" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Retrieving Tracked Entity Audits with DHIS2 API DESCRIPTION: Endpoint for accessing audit logs for tracked entities. This endpoint is available when auditing is enabled for tracked entities and logs read and search operations. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/web-api/audit.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: http CODE: ``` /api/audits/trackedEntity ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Data Statistics Section DESCRIPTION: Documentation section explaining the data statistics functionality that provides overview of objects stored in DHIS2 database SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/data-administration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## Data statistics { #data_admin__data_statistics } The data statistics module provides an overview of the number of objects stored in the DHIS2 database. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: DHIS2 Data Administration Table Schema DESCRIPTION: Markdown table showing various data maintenance functions available in the DHIS2 Data Administration app with their descriptions. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/data-administration.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Function | Description | |---|---| | Clear analytics tables | Completely empties the analytics tables. These tables are used to generate aggregate data for the pivot tables, GIS and reports. | | Analyze analytics tables | Performs a PostgreSQL `analyze` operation on all analytics tables. | | Remove zero data values | Removes zero data values from the database. Values registered for data elements with aggregation operator average is not removed, as such values will be significant when aggregating the data, contrary to values registered for data elements with aggregation operator sum. | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Filtering Organization Units in Java DESCRIPTION: Expression to filter out organization units that start with '[' character from the report results. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/configure-report-functionality.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: java CODE: ``` ($F{organisationunitname}.charAt( 0 ) != '[') ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Generating Persistent HTML Report with History DESCRIPTION: Advanced command to generate an HTML report while maintaining historical data using database persistence. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/tutorials/analysing-nginx-logs-using-goaccess.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` goaccess /var/log/nginx/access.log -o report.html --log-format=COMBINED --restore --persist --db-path /path/to/goaccess/db/ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding temporary dependency to pom.xml for version tagging DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the module entry that needs to be temporarily added to the root pom.xml before using the Maven versions plugin to set a new release version. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/developer/development-infrastructure.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: xml CODE: ``` dhis-web ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Generating Organization-Specific Weekly Sequential IDs in DHIS2 DESCRIPTION: This TextPattern combines organization unit code, current date (year and week), and a sequential number to create unique identifiers. It allows for 99,999 values per organization unit per week. SOURCE: https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-docs/blob/master/src/user/dhis2-tutorials.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` ORG_UNIT_CODE(...) + "-" + CURRENT_DATE(yyyyww) + "-" + SEQUENTIAL(#####) ```
